120a7(mdo): bdag cag deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spya ngar sems tshe gcig pas yang dag pa'i yi dam bca'o// bdag cag der slan chad 'khor bar 'khor ba 'di phan chad nas nam rnam par grol ba ma thob kyi bar du de lta bu'i
120a8(mdo): sdig pa'i grogs po dang myi 'jal pa dang / de lta bu'i sdig pa'i las myi bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi dam pa'i chos la myi bskur ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i gang zag la gnod pa myi bgyid pa dang / sems can
120a9(mdo): gyi chos kyi myig myi 'byend pa dang / dkon mchog gi gdung rgyun myi gcad par dam bcas/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs bache ba'i slad du dam bcas pa de dag rjes su gzung du gsol// de'i tshe 'jo
120b1(mdo): kyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na/ sems can blo dang ldan pa tshad myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong snyed stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
120b2(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spya ngar bsam pa nges par dam bca' bar 'tshal te/ 'khor bar 'khor ba 'di phan chad nas
120b3(mdo): nam chos kyi bzod pa ma thob kyi bar du rgyal por ma gyur dacig/ blon por ma gyur cig/ yul gyi stonang par ma gyur da cig/ grong rdal dang / grong khyer grong 'dab kyi bdag por mu gyur da cig/ dmag
120b4(mdo): la dbang ba'i bdag por ma gyur da cig/ tshong dpon du ma gyur da cig/ mchod pa dang / gtsug laH/ khang la dbang byed pa'i bdag por ma gyur da cig/ tshong
120b5(mdo): dpon dngakhyim bdag dang dge sbyong gi bdag por ma gyur da cig/ slob dpon dang bla ma gyur cig/ khyi ma pa'i lus su ma gyur cig/ zhal che gcod pa'i dbang
120b6(mdo): por ma gyur da cig phyug pa dang bcan pa'i dbang por ma gyur da cig/ bdag cag chos kyi bzod pa ma thob par de lta bu'i gnas su skyes nas/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa
120b7(mdo): sa myi dge ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba zhes bya ste/ kha ra ma tho ba'i sdig pa chen po byed pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing bskur pa zhes bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa
120b8(mdo): rab tu byung zas 'che zhing gnod pa bgyid pa'o// sems can mang po'i chos kyi myig 'byi rad pa'o// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gcod pa'o// sems can tshad myong ba la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba bgyid
120b9(mdo): pa'o/ de'i dbang gis gdon myi 'tshal bar mtshams myed pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ ngan song du 'khor ba las tha rad pa'i dus ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse
121a1(mdo): ba'i slad du smon lam 'di dag byin gyis brlab par gsol/ de'i tshe 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i sgra dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa la stsogs pa thams cad
121a2(mdo): stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi blo phyag 'tshal nas/ mchi ma blags te/ thal mo sbyard pa btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag
121a3(mdo): cag thog ma mchis pa nas 'khor zhing glen pa dang / myi shes pa dang / nga rgyal gyi dbang gis myi dge ba'i las thams cad bskyed de/ lus kyi las myi dge ba dang / ngag gi las myi dge ba dang / yid kyi las myi
121a4(mdo): dge ba bdag gis bgyis pa dang / gzhan la bgyid du stsal da pa dang / mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rjes su yi ra nga ba'i sdig pa de dag thams cad deng / bcom ldan 'das kyi
121a5(mdo): skya ngar shi nad tu 'dzem pa dang / myi 'chab pa'i sems kyis so sor gshegs pas slan cad myi bgyid par yongs su bsrung ba dang / ma mchis pa'i dus kyi sgrib par 'gyur ba'i sdig pa byang bar gyur
121a6(mdo): cig/ de bzhin du lan cig lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du brjod do// deng slan chad 'khor ba'i mtha' gtugasapa'i bar du rtag tu sdig pa'i grogs po dang myi dge ba'i dbang du
121a7(mdo): ma gyur da cig/ gal te phrad na yang de'i rjes su myi 'jug par bsam pa nyes pas dam bca' bar 'tshal lo// sdig pa'i las de dag thams cad bgyid par ma gyur da cig/ bdag cag yun ring por sdug
121a8(mdo): bsngal myong bar 'gyur cig/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs bache ba'i srad du smon lam 'di dag rjes su 'azung bar gsos// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad
121a9(mdo): la bka' stsal pa legs so// legs so// khyed ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal gis 'jigs pa dang / 'dzem pas so sor gshegs pa legs so// khyed 'khor ba'i chu ba chen po las bsgral pa dang /
121b1(mdo): 'jigs pa myed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i spyod lam btab pa legs so// rigs kyi bu chos rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
121b2(mdo): dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i las skyon myed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang
121b3(mdo): gi sus la myi gnas/ phyi rol kyi lus la myi gnas/ phyi nang gi sus su myi gnas/ 'das pa'i lus la myi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i lus la myi gnas/ da ltar gyi lus la myi gnas pa ste/
121b4(mdo): chos dang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon myed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
121b5(mdo): sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi tshor ba la myi gnas/ phyi rol kyi tshor ba la myi gnas/ phyi nang gnyi ka'i tshor ba la myi gnas/ 'das pa'i tshor ba la myi gnas
121b6(mdo): 'ongs pa'i tshor ba la myi gnas da ltar gyi tshor ba la myi gnas pa ste/ chos gnyis po 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon myed pa'i
121b7(mdo): chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kAng nang gi 'du shes lo mye gnas/ phyi rol kyi
121b8(mdo): 'du shes la myi gnas phyi nang gnyi ka'i 'du shes pa myi gnas 'das pa'i 'du shes la myi gnas ma 'ongs pa'i 'du shes la myi gnas/ ra sbyar gyi 'du shes
121b9(mdo): la myi gnas pa ste/ chos gsum po 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la yang dag pa'i lam skyor myed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur/
122a1(mdo): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi 'du byed la myi gnas/ phyi rol kyi 'du byed la myi gnas/ phyi nang gnyi ka'i 'du byed la myi gnas/ 'das pa'i 'du
122a2(mdo): byed la myi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'du byed la myi gnas/ da ltar gyi 'du byed la myi gnas pa ste/ chos bzhi pa 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam gyi skyon myed pa'i chos kyi bzod
122a3(mdo): pa 'thob bo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang nang gi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas/ phyi rol kyi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas/ phyi rang gnyi ka'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas
122a4(mdo): 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa'i la myi gnas/ ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa la myi gnas/ da ltar gyi rnam par shes pa la myi gnas pa ste/ chos lnga po 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122a5(mdo): po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon myed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang 'jig rten 'di la myi gnas
122a6(mdo): pa ste/ chos drug po 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon myed pa'i chos kyi bzod par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
122a7(mdo): chen po rnams gang 'jig rten pha rol la myi gnas pa ste/ chos bdun po 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam sbyor byed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs
122a8(mdo): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas pa ste/ chos brgyad po 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam smyon
122a9(mdo): myed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gang gzugs yod pa'i khams la myi gnas pa ste/ chos dgu pa 'dis na byang chub sem
122b1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag pa'i lam skyon myed par chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gzugs myed pa'i khams la myi
122b2(mdo): gnas pa ste/ chos bcu po 'dis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnaMs yang dag pa'i lam skyon myed pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi rnam grangs
122b3(mdo): 'das bshar ba'i tshe/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong bdun cu rtsa gnyis snyed myi skye ba'i chos kyi 'bod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
122b4(mdo): brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi snyed kyis chos kyi rjes su bzod pa / ba bo// nyan thos tshad myed pa brgya stong snyed kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su bcad pa nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du thob par 'gyur//
122b5(mdo): to// sems can khrag khrig brgya stong snyed sngon ma bskyed pa'i bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes la phyir ldog pa'i sa la gam
122b6(mdo): par gyur da to// sems can grangs myed chad myed pa snyed sngon rang sangs rgyas kyi sems skyed pa de sems bskyed par gyur da to// gzhan yang sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa snyed sngon nyan
122b7(mdo): chos kyi sems ma skyed pa skye par 'gyur ro// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po la bka' stsal pa sems can gang chos kyi bzod pa thob pas ni rgyal rigs rgyal thabs spyi bos nas dbang
122b8(mdo): bsku rang ba'i gnas su gnas par byas te/ nor bu rin po chen rnam pa sna tshogs la longs spyod cing bdag nyid chen po'i gnas su longs spyad par ngas gnang gyi// sems can gzhan ni ma yin no// byang chub
122b9(mdo): sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems cad gang chos kyi bzod pa ma thob par rgyal ba bas spyi bor nas dbang skur ba'i gnas su gnas
123a1(mdo): nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod pa dang / bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su gnas par nges par ma gnang ngam/ 'on te gnang ba'i skabs kyang chis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
123a2(mdo): stsal pa/ sems can gang chos kyi bzod pa ma thob kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod la sems can gzhan yang slob tu bcug na/ de yang ngas rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas
123a3(mdo): su nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su 'dug cing longs spyod du gnang ngo // sems can gang chos kyi bzod pa yang ma thob la/ dge ba bcu'i lam yang
123a4(mdo): myi spyod de/ sems can gzhan yang slob pa la myi 'jud la dbang chen po dang nan tan gyis rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal po byed de/ nor bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang bdag nyid chen
123a5(mdo): po'i gnas su long spyod pa dag ni rgyal rigs gdol pa can dang gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su long spyod pa'i ga/ dol pa can gyi bdag po zhes bya ste/ glen pa gti mug
123a6(mdo): can nga rgyal gyis mngon par zin dI nges pa'i chos shi nad tu zab mo 'jigs par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung gcod cing yang dag pa'i chos kyi sgron ma myed par byed pa/ nga'i
123a7(mdo): bstand pa la rab tu byung ba dag la gnod pa dang / 'tshe ba rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa/ 'chog pa dang gzhu ba dang chad pas gcod pa dang / chos gos dang / lhung zed dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad 'phrog pa dang /
123a8(mdo): chos gos phrogs te khyim par phag nas las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug pa/ bcings pa dang btson du bzung ba nas/ 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba dang / nga'i bstand pa'i dam pa'i chos la 'phya zhing bsku rad pa dang
123a9(mdo): bar du gcod cing 'gegs byed cing yongs su rgyas pa mye byed pa dang / mchod rteran dang dge 'dun gyi nor 'phrog par byed pa'i gang zag de ni gdon gyi za bar mtshams myed pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ste/ snyug
123b1(mdo): bsngal chen po myong zhing / ngan song gi gnas su 'khor zhing tha rad pa'i dus myed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang chos kyi bzod pa yang ma thob/ dge
123b2(mdo): ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang myi spyod/ sems can gzhan yang spyod par myi skul bar dbang chen po dang / nan gyis rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i gnas su rgyal po bgyid cing // rdo rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gzhan
123b3(mdo): yang bdag nyid che ba'i gnas su gnas pa la rgyu gzhan dang / thabs gzhan gyis mtshams myed pa'i sems can dmyal ba las gdon cing / ngan song gzhan gyi sdug bsngal las tha rad par bgyi ba ma mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das
123b4(mdo): kyis bka' stsal du ba/ cha gzhan dang thabs gzhan gyis bka' stsa khang ba/ rgyu gzhan dang thabs gzhan gyis gdon du rung ba yod de sems can kang rgyal thabs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i rgyal por
123b5(mdo): zhugs la longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod pa chos kyi bzod pa/ yang ma thob// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang myi ldan/ dad / pa'i mthu dang ldan te/ dkon mchog gsum la rim gro dang / sti
123b6(mdo): snang byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa'i theg pa gsum dang / ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam la yang 'phya zhing bskur ba 'am/ bar du gcod pa 'am bgegs
123b7(mdo): myi byed/ sangs rgyas kyi bstand pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas/ tshul khrims nyams pa 'am tshul khrims myed kyang rung / skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smyig gyon pa thams cad la 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa dang /
123b8(mdo): gzhu ba dang / 'chog pa dang / chad pas gcod pa dang / chos gos dang / lhung bzed dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad phrogs pa dang / chos gos phrogs te khyim par phab nas las byed du bcug pa dang / btson
123b9(mdo): rar bcug pa nas 'tsho ba'i dbang po dang phral ba'i bar du myi byed la/ mchod rten dang dge 'dun gyi nor mya 'phrogs pa dang / ngan pa sdig pa can dag rab tu byung ba la 'tshe ba dang / gnod pa byed du myi 'dzud pa dang /
124a1(mdo): dkon mchog gsum gyi nor la 'phrog cing spyod du 'dzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa theg pa gsum dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos la sti stang dang bcas pa'i nyand cing gzungs su 'dzin dpa' dang /
124a2(mdo): mnyan te gzungs su bzung nas kyang / ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su brtson 'grus dang nan tan byed pa dang / ngas bstand pa theg pa gsum gyi 'phags pa'i nye gnas dag la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur dang /
124a3(mdo): sti stang dang bcas pas g.yog byed pa dang / theg pa chen po la shi nad tu brtan pa'i yi dam bcas te/ the tsom dang phyir la ldog pa'i sems myi bsnyad pa dang / gzhan yang sems can dag theg pa chen po la dad cing yid
124a4(mdo): ches pa dang / gzungs 'dzind pa dang / slob pa nan tan byed du bcug na rgyal rigs gdol pa can 'di dang gzhan yang bdag nyid che ba'i gdol pa can dag ni/ snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyis kyang rgyal thabs
124a5(mdo): gis dbang bskur zhing longs spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs la spyod du gan nga ngo // gzhan yang grong dang grong khyer dang nor dbyigs thams cad la longs spyod kyang mtshams myed pa'i sems can dmyal bar myi ltung
124a6(mdo): ba nas/ ngan song gzhan gyi bar du yang ltung bar myi 'gyur ro// de ni ngas rgyal thabs kyis dbang bskur zhing longs spyod rnam pa sna tshog / sa la spyod du gnang ngo // de ltar grong dang grong khyer la spyod kyang
124a7(mdo): mtshams myed pa'i sems can dmyal bar myi ltung ba nas ngan song gzhan du yang myi ltung ngo // sems can gang sdig pa'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus par byang bar 'dod na ngas bstand pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
124a8(mdo): 'di la nan tan du bslab cing gzungs su bzung bar bya'o// gang gis de sbyar dge 'dun gyi mngon gsum du gyur pa la shi nang tu 'dzem pa dang / ngo tsha ba'i sems kyis sdig pa'i las so sor gshegs na/ sngon gyi dus
124a9(mdo): ra byas pa'i sdig pa'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par byang bar gyur to// bam pa / de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos yang bcom ldan
124b1(mdo): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na nyan thog gi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa
124b2(mdo): ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po la 'khrus pas
124b3(mdo): mchis pa lags/ ji skar na theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongs su 'phel bar bgyis pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs par/
124b4(mdo): bstand pa la rab tu byung ba'i chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma lags pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu 'tshal zhing / skra dang kha spu bregs pa thams cad la 'khrul pa ma mchis pa lags/ ji ltar na theg pa chen po'i
124b5(mdo): chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba lags// ji lta po'i shes papa dang / bamod nams kyi tha pas ga tu mya ning 'phel bar 'gyur ba lags// ji ste pan ti la rked dang / gsus dang mayod pa dang / sa nes pa nga du gyu na gyi gyi ga par 'gyur sa/
124b6(mdo): tatanatatu dge ba'i shes gnyen dang 'jas ci'i rjes su 'thun par 'gyur la kes/ ji ltar na rtag tu sangs rgyas mas cad mthong ba dang phyi brel zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos ky-i nye gnas dang / myi khrel ba dang / chos yol pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyid
124b7(mdo): pa dang myi 'bral bar bgyid par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar na dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rab tu brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa lags/ ji ltar na byang chub kyi spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs la sems myi ngoms pa lags
124b8(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de/ byang chub
124b9(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor so 'acu po 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul ba skyed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'phrul pa skyed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
125a1(mdo): 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par
125a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rtag par yongs su 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu byung ba'i chos kyi snod tam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi
125a3(mdo): tshal du gyon cing / sgra dang kha spu bregs pa/ thams cad la 'khrul pa myed pa thob par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams
125a4(mdo): kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes
125a5(mdo): gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa'// dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang /
125a6(mdo): thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun pa mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad la brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa dang / byang chub
125a7(mdo): kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms pa dang / sngon sdig pa myi dge ba'i las ci byas pa thams cad 'phags pa'i chos kyi ye shes rdo rje ltar sra la rno bas lhag ma ma lus par bcom
125a8(mdo): ste/ rnam par smyin pa'i 'bras bu myi myong ba dang / gsar du sdig pa myi dge ba'i las thams cad myi byed pa dang / skyo ba dang sgyid lug pa myed pa'i sems kyis bla na myed pa'i sems kyis bla na myed pa'i chos kyi
125a9(mdo): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun nan tan byed pa la skyo zhing sgyid lug pa myed pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i nang rnams 'jil ba la skyo zhing sgyid lug pa myed pa'i
125b1(mdo): sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi rtend dang / gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba yin no// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa ni gar 'gro yang
125b2(mdo): rin po che'i 'khor lo thog mar 'gro ste rin po che gzhan de'i phyi bzhin 'brang ngo // gling bzhi kun tu rgyu zhing sems can thams cad kyi lus dang / sems kyi rnyog pa thams cad bsal te// sems
125b3(mdo): can thams cad kyi lus dang sems kyi bde ba yang skye zhing 'phel bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang de bzhin du 'khor lo bcu po 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed
125b4(mdo): pa nas sems can thams cad kyi rten dang gnas su 'gyur zhing nye bar 'tsho ba'i bar du thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ shing rta chen po na'i'akhor lo bzhi dang ldan te
125b5(mdo): myi mang po de'i nang na 'dug nas lam chen por 'gro'o// lam de na bong pa 'am/ rtse mo 'am/ gseg ma 'am pA 'am shing ngam lo ma 'am/ yal ka 'am
125b6(mdo): me tog gam 'bras bu ji snyed yod pa thams cad shing rtade'i 'khor lo'i 'og tu song na thams cad chag cing grug sa te nor du myi rung bar byed do// de bzhin du byang chub
125b7(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rngam pa bcu dang ldan / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su bcom ste/ rnam par sbyin par myi ser bar
125b8(mdo): byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste/ 'khor lo nor po ni thong cig 'phangs pas pas rgol ba'i dgra'i mgo bo dang yan lag bcad de spyod pa'i mthu sbed par byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems das
125b9(mdo): chen po yang / 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan me/ rgyud lngar 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chen po thams cad 'joms pa dang / nyon mongs pa dang / sdig pa'i las thams cad yongs su bcad de rna par sbyin par len par
126a1(mdo): myi byedado// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mye'i bskal pa byung ba'i tshe/ nyi ma lnga cig car shar nas gling bzhi'i klu dang / mtsho dang / chu bo dang / chu'i khams su gtogs pa gsher ba thams cad gang yang myi
126a2(mdo): skyems pa myed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dang ldan na rgyu bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang chos kyi
126a3(mdo): sgrib pa dang sdug bsngal gyi rtsa ba sbyin par thams cad yongs su skyems par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ cung gi bskal ba byung ba'i tshe/ phyogs bzhi nas rlung chen po dus cig tu langs pas 'jig rten
126a4(mdo): gyi khams thams cad na ri bo che chung dang / sa chen po rnams thams cad 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa bcu dang ldan na/ 'jig
126a5(mdo): rten gyi phyi nad ci log bzhi dang / nga rgyal gyi ri thams cad myi shigs pa gang yang myed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs ba'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi slob pa dang / chos
126a6(mdo): kyi sgrib pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rnam par sbyind pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang 'jig cing 'thor bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste seng ge'i rgyal po ral pa can gyi skad thang cig byung bas
126a7(mdo): gcan zan thams cad dang / 'phur ba dang 'gro ba thams cad skrag cing 'gul myi nus par 'argyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan
126a8(mdo): pa'i chos kyi sgra thang cig bsngags pas mu stegs can dang / log par stor pa sdig pa'i grogs su gyur da ba thams cad 'jigs skrag nas/ spa ba'i tshig 'khrul cing 'dri ba dang / rgol myi nus
126a9(mdo): par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di sa ste/ brgya byid pa'i dbang po lnga ma yin dang 'bab pa'i tshis li dmas gis bskor cing la kaun rdo rje thogs te g.yul tu zhugs ra/ lha ma yin thams cad bras
126b1(mdo): pas ldog par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na/ log pam lta ba'i mu stegs can thams cad dang / log par stonang pa sdig pa'i grogs po
126b2(mdo): thams cad skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la btags na/ rin po chernam pa sna tshogs car bzhin du 'bab ste/ dbul 'phong
126b3(mdo): pa'i sems can thams cad la sbyir ba byed do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te/ rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyal mtshas
126b4(mdo): la gnas na/ chos chen po'i cher rab tu 'bebs pas sem sa can chad myed pa snyed thams cad la sbyin par byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mtshan mo'i dus su 'jig rten
126b5(mdo): kun mun par gyur da pas 'thom zhing 'brog pa spad ba nas zla ba nya ba sha ra ba na mun pa thams cad bsal te// 'phrog pa slad ba rnams kyi lam mtshon par 'gyur ba de bzhin du byang chub ses
126b6(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang / 'khor lo rnam pa 'di bcu dang ldan na sems can gang ma rig pa'i mun pas ldongs te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad sto rad pa rnams la byang chub sems
126b7(mdo): dpas dam pa'i chos bshad de/ ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad bsal nas chos kyi snang ba skyes pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam layan lag brgyad mngon tu gyur te/ zag pa thams cad bcad nas/ stug
126b8(mdo): bsngal gyi mtha' zad par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ nyi ma'i dkyis 'khor chen po 'jig rten du shar pa na lo tog thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/ me tog dang / lo ma thams cad rgyas pa dang / mnam zhing
126b9(mdo): bcog pa thams cad selang ba dang / lo tog gi 'bru dang / sman gyi 'bras bu thams cad smin pa dang / gangs kyi ri bo kun zhugs 'ba' chu kun thug ste/ rim gyis rgya mtsho chen por 'bab par 'gyur ro/
127a1(mdo): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 'khor lo nam pa 'di bcu dang ldan te/ lhag pa'i sbyin pa la gnas shing dul ba'i tshul khrims dang / bde ba'i bzod pa dang / bcon bkrum dang
127a2(mdo): bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang / spobs pa'i yon tan shin pa tu rgyas shing sems can thams cad la dam pa'i chos stonang to// chos de'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyis sems can
127a3(mdo): thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba lhag pa'i lo tog rnam pa sna tshogs skye zhing 'phel ba dang / lhag pa'i spyod pa dam pa'i me tog dang / lo sa rnam pa sna tshogs shi nang tu rgyas pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i las ngan pa thams cad yongs su
127a4(mdo): se lang pa dang / mtho ris dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i 'bras bu yongs su smin par 'gyur ba dang / log par lta ba dang / nga rgyal kyi ri bo thams cad zhu zhing 'bub pas yang dag pa'i dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thob pa pa
127a5(mdo): dang / gtong ba dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzind gyi chu rim gyis 'bab cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i rgya mchu 'gengs pa dang / sems can thams cad yid bzhin du 'jigs pa myed pa mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du 'jug par
127a6(mdo): 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che po'i 'khor lo bcu pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'khor lo bcu zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan la gyi gdags kyi/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam nyid yin par
127a7(mdo): shes par bya'o// 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pas naH/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ste/ sdig pa'i thams cad las rnam par grol ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yid bzhin du
127a8(mdo): rdzogs pa dang / myur du mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i rgya mtshol yongs su 'gengs pa dang / thabs mkhas pa chen po'i ye shes kyi 'od kyis skye bo thams cad yongs su smir bar byed cing thams cad phan pa dang / bde ba yongs su
127a9(mdo): thob par byed do// de ci'i phyir zhem/ rigs kyi bu snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis kya kyi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su spangs so/ dge bcu'i las kyi lam 'di la yongs su
127b1(mdo): bsngags pas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur to// de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bshad pa 'di dag las dga' zhing nam 'tsho'i bar tu ma nyams par srung na/ 'bras bu khyad par can mchog tu gyur pa thams cad thob pa ni
127b2(mdo): ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mtsho'i bar du srog gcod pa yongs su spangs na/ de nyid seMs can thams cad la myi 'jigs pa sbyin pa yin te// sems can dag
127b3(mdo): la 'jigs shing bag tsha bar myi byed par de'i 'jigs pa'i sdug bsngal myi skyed pa'i dbang gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad myur du yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma byed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lnga'i 'khor lo 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho bying
127b4(mdo): pa thog gcod pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig pa myi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yid rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems
127b5(mdo): can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / tshe'i sgrib pas sgribs pa ra gyu ra to// 'di ltar srog gcod pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor/ los de dag lhag ma ya lus par yongs su bcom zhing rnyis pas
127b6(mdo): rnam par smind pa'i 'bras bu myi myong bar byed do// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang myi la stsogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dgos pa myi skye ba da nga/ lus dang / sems las su bde zhing yu ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro//
127b7(mdo): 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis myi gdung 'ing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chungs dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor pas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shi nang tu 'jigs pa gshin
127b8(mdo): rdo'i pho nya mthong bar gyi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis 'dul ba'i tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang 'brang de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang /
127b9(mdo): de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shinang tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// yang tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir gyi rang du skye ste/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par nad myed pa dang / tshe rings pa
128a1(mdo): dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis 'dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing
128a2(mdo): yang dag pa dang 'phrang de de'i rjes su slob pa dang srog gcod pa yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / thes
128a3(mdo): pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad la yim gyis gzhol zhing shi nang du yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob
128a4(mdo): pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing mchoms myed pa dang / ragra dang 'tshe ba'i phyir gyi grags pa dang / 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral te rab tu bde skyid pa dang / nang byed pa dang / tshe ring ba'i bzhin du sems
128a5(mdo): can dag skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag/ tu byed de/ sems can dag cis btung ba bzhin tu dam pa'i chos ston / to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring
128a6(mdo): du gnas shing / sems can tshad mye la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed pa ra 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog bcod pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo ste dang po'o// byang chub sems
128a7(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed pa'i 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ rang sangs
128a8(mdo): rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin
128a9(mdo): gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg chen po'i chos la dgos nas gong du
128b1(mdo): 'phar zhing gyi ldog pa dang / no pa'i shes rab dang / bsod rnams kyi khyad par rtag tu rtse zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzim dang / gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang /
128b2(mdo): rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrang cing rjes su 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mye 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang rtsi 'bral ba dang / chos thob
128b3(mdo): pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rtsol ba la brtson par sems kyi ngoms pa dang byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pas
128b4(mdo): tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji ltar rgyas par bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen gang nam mtsho'i bar du ma byim le rang /
128b5(mdo): pa yongs su spangs nas/ de nyid sems can thams cad myi 'jigasapa sbyin pa yin te/ yongs su gdung ba myed pa dang / 'tshe ba myed pa dang / bdag nyid tshul bzhin du rnyed pa'i nor gyis chog shes par
128b6(mdo): gnas kyi chos ma yin pa'i nor bu dang / khye la re ba myed pa'i de'i dbang gis rtsa ba thams kyang yongs su rdzogs pa 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'khor zhing 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho byed par 'gyur ba yang /
128b7(mdo): byin par le nang ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngagra dang yid kyis myi dge ba'i las rnams pa dag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems
128b8(mdo): na gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / rin po che dang / nor la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar ma byin par le nang pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo lhag sa sa lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par spyir
128b9(mdo): ba'i 'bras bu kyi gyong te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lA dang kyil sogs pa kun dga' zhing yid tu 'ong bas ngogs pa gyi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / nor rin po che thams cad dang ldang bar 'gyur ro// nam
129a1(mdo): 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang sus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis kyi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chungs dang 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas mchi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi shi nang tu 'jigs pa
129a2(mdo): gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang / yon tan dang ldan par gsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang 'phrad de lus dang sems
129a3(mdo): rab tu dka' ba dang / de la bkur sti dang bcas pas dang pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir myi'i nang du skyes te/ dbang yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par longs spyod
129a4(mdo): chen po dang ldan zhing byang gzugs bzang ba dang yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skying pa dang / 'jigs pa lnga dang / nor bdun thun mong du myi 'gyur ro// phyir yid yid du 'ong ba'i ngege par shes gnyen
129a5(mdo): chos kyis rdul batshul khrims dang yon tan dul dbug so par thus nga yon tan dang ldan pa/ gsong rnams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phyung/ de/ ri'i rje su rmo bcing la byin par len pa yong su spong ba dang /
129a6(mdo): sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thos cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'
129a7(mdo): smon lam dang spyor pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shi nang du yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho las 'jug pa nas bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi bar du thob par 'gyur ro// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che rnam pa snga
129a8(mdo): tshogs kyis brgyan pa dang rin po che'i shing dang rin po che'i rdzid dang rin po che gzhal myed khang la stsogs pas yongs su gang ba dang / bdag dang bdag gir 'dzi nad pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis dkod pa dang ldan pa'i zhing der
129a9(mdo): sems can dag skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos so nang to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du
129b1(mdo): gnas shing sems cad tshad myed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyis 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma byin par len pa yongs su spangs pa 'khor lo gnyis pa'o// byang chub sems
129b2(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan ma/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/
129b3(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa byed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// dkom mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su
129b4(mdo): 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstanang pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdod dam/ chos kyi sdong ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngunachos gos kyi chal bu gyon cing sba dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khru 'byed par/
129b5(mdo): 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang rdo ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad parag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting 'dzin dang / gzungs dang /
129b6(mdo): bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams can la dbangadu gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi bral
129b7(mdo): zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang rtsi 'bral ba dang chos thos par da kyi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang sen bskung byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / e la mas cad chol
129b8(mdo): la brtson pas sems kyi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems kyi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu thob pa dag kyang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin mo// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang
129b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nas mche ba'i bar du 'dod pas log par g.yem pa yongs su spangs na/ de nyid sems can thams cad 'dod pa'i klung gis g.yengs pa las 'jigs pa myed pa phrag
130a1(mdo): dog myed pa 'tshe ba myed pa yongs su gdung ba skyed pa 'khrug pa myed pa'i sbyin pa yin te/ bdag gi chung mas chos shes shing gzhan gi chung ma/ la re ba myed pas de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs/
130a2(mdo): su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor pa'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang 'dod pas log par g.yem pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dge ba'i las dag kyang byed la gzhan yang
130a3(mdo): byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / chung ma'i sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar 'dod pas los
130a4(mdo): par g.yem pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu myi lend te/ lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang myi la stsogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong bas dogs
130a5(mdo): pa myi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / chung ma 'dod pa dang bcas pa ma yin par 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa/ na yang / lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis myi gdungs shing yid
130a6(mdo): 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shi nang tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya ni mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'i
130a7(mdo): dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang de la bkur sti dang bcas pas de la shin tu ngad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos
130a8(mdo): nas kyang phyir myi'i nang du skye ste/ dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing
130a9(mdo): skyid pa dang / phyir yang shi na tu yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba'i tshul khrims dang / yon tan du ldan pa gsod na sam kyi zhing yang dag pa dang 'phrad de de'i rjes su slob cing 'dod pas log par g.yem
130b1(mdo): ba yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos kyang par cad thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang
130b2(mdo): chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol bzhin shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing byar
130b3(mdo): myed byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / g.yem pa myed pa tshangs par spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa'i sems can dag zhing der skye ste/ de dag thams cad rdzu ste skye'i/ myi gartsang ba'i mngal nas skye ba ni ma yin no// de bzhin
130b4(mdo): gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de sems can dag la cis 'dra la ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos stonang to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing / sems can tshad myed
130b5(mdo): pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod pas lo// ka bar g.yem pa yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o//
130b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan ma nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul ba myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi zer
130b7(mdo): la 'khrul pa byed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'bul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po la 'khrul ba sbed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// dkom mchog gsum
130b8(mdo): gi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas kyi chos kyi snod dam chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing sma dang tha spu bregs pa la 'khrul
130b9(mdo): pa myed par 'gyur// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / gsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod pa dang /
131a1(mdo): sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing rjes su mthun par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing / byang chub
131a2(mdo): sems dpa' nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la
131a3(mdo): brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms pa dang 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang
131a4(mdo): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du rdzun du smra ba yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur ba dang / tshig gzigs pa tshad mar 'gyur ba dang / tshig tu kun nyan cing
131a5(mdo): gus pa dang dogs pa myi skye bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge pa'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'khor bar 'khor/ rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang brdzun du
131a6(mdo): smra ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig pa myi dge ba'i las dag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rje su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi
131a7(mdo): sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / tshig gzigs pa la sgrib pas sgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar brdzun du smras yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par spyi nang pa'i 'bras bu
131a8(mdo): myi lend par 'gyur ro// lus 'di nyid la lha dang myi la bstsogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang dogs pa myi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig smra ba thams cad la gzhan yid ches shing nyan par 'gyur
131a9(mdo): ro// 'chi 'phos pa'i dus byed pa na yang lus rang sems sdug bsngal gyis kyi gdung zhing yid 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma rang 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor pas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed kyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshen rje'i
131b1(mdo): pho nya ni mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang yid du 'ong ba'o dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis rul ba'i tshul khrims dang / yon tan du ldan pas gson nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad do// lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba
131b2(mdo): dang / de la bkur sti dang bcas shi nang tu dang pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang myi'i lus su skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang / ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes par tshig gtsigs pa dang /
131b3(mdo): byang gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / bde zhing srid pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis rul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa gsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su
131b4(mdo): slob pa dang / brdzun du sba ba yongasu spangs pa dang / sdig pa myi dge pa'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i chos khyad par can thams cadardzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad chol
131b5(mdo): pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol ba dang / shi nad tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs
131b6(mdo): rgyas kyi zhing thams cad bden par smra ba rgyu dang bral ba lha'i gsung gis yongs su brgyan pa dang / slu ba myed cing sems kyi spyod pa drang ba dang / ye nga dag pa'i spyod pa rnam par dkar ba'i chos 'ba' shig spyod pa'i lha'i
131b7(mdo): gos gsung tsam gyon pa rin po che'i rgyan gyis bkod pa'i sems can dag zhing der rtse bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de/ sems cam ngag cis 'dul ba bzhin du chos stonang to// yongs su rtsa
131b8(mdo): ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad myed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzun du smra ba yongs su
131b9(mdo): spangs pa'i 'khor lo bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur
132a1(mdo): #// ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'phrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i
132a2(mdo): gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu 'byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdod dam chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu
132a3(mdo): na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon zhing / sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa byed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos la gos nas gong du 'phar zhing / phyir myi ldog par 'gyur ba dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad
132a4(mdo): par rtag tu 'phel zhing skye ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dpa gdungs dang gzod pa dang sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / ga tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad cing / de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang
132a5(mdo): rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang / myi 'bral ba dang chos tho/ sa pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen
132a6(mdo): bkur byed pa dang rtsi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad shin tu chol pa la brtson pas sems kyi ngongs pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang sngon la ma nam sna tshogs kyis sems kyi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu
132a7(mdo): gzhan 'thob pa yang ji ltar bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'tsho'i bar du phra ma yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis rtag tu bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang /
132a8(mdo): tshig tu smra ba thams cad gzhan gyis mnyan pa dang mdun pa dang / dogs pa myi skye bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
132a9(mdo): 'byung ba yang phra ma byas pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi myi dge ba'i las ngag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'jug cing mthong ba dang / thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i dang / sems can
132b1(mdo): gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / 'dum pa sgrib pas bsgribs par gyur pa to// 'di ltar phra ma'i tshig yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu myi lend par byed
132b2(mdo): do// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang myi las stsogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa myi skye ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cam la nyan cing 'dum par 'gyur ro// 'chi 'phos
132b3(mdo): ba'i dus byed po na yang lus dang sems la sdug sngal gyis kyi gdung zhing yid du 'ong bu'i bu dang chung ma dpa' khor thams cad kyi yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shi nang tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong
132b4(mdo): par skye 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dpa 'phra ra re/ lus dang / sems rab tu dga' ba dang / bkur sti dang bcas
132b5(mdo): pas shim tu ngang pa skye bar 'gyur/ tshi 'phos nas kyang phyir myi'i nang du/ skyes te dbang po yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas yang na skyes par smra ba'i tshig 'jam zhipa 'dum pa dang /
132b6(mdo): byang gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing sring pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul bar/ tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing
132b7(mdo): yang dag pa dang zad de/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang / phra ma'i tshig dang / yongs su thal bas sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyang par can thams cad rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen
132b8(mdo): po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon las dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing / ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//
132b9(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu bstan pa sra ba myi shigs pa dang / la rdzas bzang pos yongs su brgyan par 'gyur ba dang 'thun pa gyi rtsod pa shinang tu dul zhing 'dum pa dge ba'i chos tshol ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye bar 'gyu
133a1(mdo): ro/ rtag tu 'dum zhing gus pas dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de/ sems can dag ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las
133a2(mdo): 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring tu gnam shing / sems can tshang byed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phra ma yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor
133a3(mdo): lnga'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan ma/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'phrul
133a4(mdo): pa byed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa byed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi
133a5(mdo): gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa lar ba tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdod ngam/ chos kyi sdong ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang la spu bregs
133a6(mdo): pa la 'phrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos la kong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa
133a7(mdo): dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshen dang 'phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang gyi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye
133a8(mdo): gnas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bskur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pa sems kyi ngoms pa dang / byang chub
133a9(mdo): kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob par yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma mtsho'i bar du
133b1(mdo): gcod pa'i tshig thams cad yongs su spangs ma/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing tha mar byed pa dang / cig tu smra bkur la pha rol po kur dga' zhing nyan pas dogs pa byed par 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba
133b2(mdo): khams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma byed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba yang khe gcod pa'i tshig gi dbang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dge ba'i las rag kyang byed la gzham yang
133b3(mdo): byed du 'jud cing sa po pa dang / zos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i tshon mo ngas pa'i sgrib pa dang dan pacom ga'i du 'dul ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di sar khe gcod pa'i tshis yongs su
133b4(mdo): spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pa'i dang rang gis rnam par dasti rang ba'i 'bras bu yongs kyi le da te/ sus la de nyin la yang lha dang kyi la sogs pa kun dga' bas dogs pa myi rtse
133b5(mdo): ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba rang tshig sba ba thams cad pa ro lang gyi ying du 'ong ba dang snyan par 'gyur ro// nam mchi 'phro ba'i rus rtse ra pan yang lus dang sems sdug bsngal gyis ma gdungs shing nyon gyi
133b6(mdo): mongs pa dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bu rang chung ma dang 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shi nang tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes
133b7(mdo): gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrang de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang / de bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// 'phos nas kyang myi'i
133b8(mdo): nang du skyes na yang dbang yongs su rdzogs shing yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skye bar tshig 'jam po smra ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid
133b9(mdo): du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes nyen chos kyis rul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de de'i rjes su slob pa dang / zhe gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos
134a1(mdo): thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang
134a2(mdo): spyod pa thams cad rim gyis gzhol shi nad tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na myed pa'i byang chub kyi bar du 'thob pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yid du myi 'ong ba'i sgra thams cad dang bral te/ yid du 'ong
134a3(mdo): sba snyan pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang / chos kyi skus zhing de yongs su gang ba dang / dran pa dang blo gros su ldan pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs can shin tu dul ba'i sems can dag zhing der skye ba dang / rtag tu tshig 'jam po'i gcig la
134a4(mdo): bskur bar byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de/ sems can dag ces 'dul ba bzhin du chos ston pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing
134a5(mdo): sems can tshad myed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// / rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zha gcod pa'i tshig yongs su spong ba'i 'khor lo drug pa'o// byang chub
134a6(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
134a7(mdo): 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur theg pa chen po'i gang zag la myed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
134a8(mdo): yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos gi tshel bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/
134a9(mdo): theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'bar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs dang thob pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dang
134b1(mdo): du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'phrad cing rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gas
134b2(mdo): mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa dang / byang chub
134b3(mdo): kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang na ma ya/
134b4(mdo): bar du tshig kyal ba yongs su spangs pas sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing tha mar byed pa dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad don tu 'gyur zhing tshig thos pa rnams nyan cing gus pas dogs pa myed par 'gyur/
134b5(mdo): de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'a bying ba yang tshig kyal ba smras pa'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi
134b6(mdo): dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang / thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / don tu smra bas sgrib
134b7(mdo): pas bsgrib par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar tshig kyal ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu myi len par byed do// lus 'di nyid la lha dang myi la stsogs pa kun dag
134b8(mdo): zhing yid du 'ong bas ngogs pa myed par 'gyur ba dang / sus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / tshig tu smra ba thams cad don tu 'gyur ba dang / 'chi 'pho ba'i 'dus byed pa na yang / lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis myi
134b9(mdo): gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bzhes gnyen
135a1(mdo): kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang de la bkur sti dang bcas shing shin tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phag
135a2(mdo): nas kyang phyir myi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skye bar phan pa dang / don tu 'gyur ba'i cho ga smras pa dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu
135a3(mdo): bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang / tshig kyal bar sla/
135a4(mdo): ba yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang /
135a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi
135a6(mdo): zhing don myed pa'i tshig thams cad dang bral te/ byang chub sems da pa'i sde snod du gtogs pa chos chen po'i sgra mchog dam pa rnam pa mang bos zhing de yongs su khyab pa dang / bdag myed pa'i smon lam dang ye
135a7(mdo): shes dam pa phun sum tshogs pas chos kyi don dam pa sna tshogs 'chad pa la mkhas pa'i sems can de lta dag zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba
135a8(mdo): bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can chad myed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i dor byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems da /
135a9(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig kyal ba yongs su spong ba'i 'khor lo bdun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ nyan
135b1(mdo): thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la
135b2(mdo): 'phrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la zhul ba myed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi chos kyi snod
135b3(mdo): dam chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing sgra dang kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i chos gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab
135b4(mdo): dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du gyur da cing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bzhes
135b5(mdo): gnyen dang phrad cing de'i rjes su 'gro ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang
135b6(mdo): myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems
135b7(mdo): myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam mtsho'i bar du chags sems yongs su spangs na/ sems
135b8(mdo): can thams cad kyis bkur zhing btsun par byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa dang bral te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yong su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud sngar 'a
135b9(mdo): bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang chags sems kyi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid sdig pa myi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs
136a1(mdo): pa'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / 'dod sems myed pa la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'dod sems yongs su spong ba'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par
136a2(mdo): yongs su bcom pas rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi len to// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang myi la stsogs pa kun dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang / dogs pa myed par 'gyur ba dang / lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang /
136a3(mdo): sems rnam par dag cing rnyog pa myed par 'gyur ro// 'chi 'phos pa'i dus byed pa na yang / lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis myi gdung ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor gyis yongs su bskor bas
136a4(mdo): 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi shi nang tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa
136a5(mdo): bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ lus dang sems ra/ ba tu dga' ba dang / de la bkur sti dang / bcas pas shin tu dang / pa skye bar 'gyur ro// tshe 'phos nas kyang phyir myi'i nang du skye zheng
136a6(mdo): dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du skyes pa der sems can rnam par dag cing / rnyog pa myed pa dang / bya da gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing
136a7(mdo): skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul bar tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su slob pa dang chags sems yongs su spong ba dang / skye
136a8(mdo): dge ba'i chos yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang / spyod pa thams cad
136a9(mdo): la rim gyis gzhol zhing / shi nang tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing lag mthil bzhin du mnyam la rin po che rnam pa mang pos
136b1(mdo): yongs su gang ba dang / rin po che'i shing rnam pa sna tshogs dkris pa dang / rin po che'i gos dang / rin po che'i rgyan kyi yo byad dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gdugs dang /
136b2(mdo): gser dang / dngul dang / mu tig gi dra ba dang / shing la stsogs pas yongs su gang ba dang / shi nad tu yid du 'ong zhing blta na sdug pa nga rgyal yongs su spangs pa byad gzugs shi nang tu mdzes pa dang /
136b3(mdo): dbang po ma nyams pa sems mnyam pa'i sems can dga' zhing der skye bar 'gyur te/ chags sems myed pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang
136b4(mdo): dpag tu myed de/ sems can dag cis 'dul ba bzhin du/ dam pa'i chos stond to// yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ kyang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad
136b5(mdo): myed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// ri/ gas kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chag/ sa sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor lo brgyad pa'o//
136b6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'thul ba myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'phrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang
136b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i
136b8(mdo): gang zag la 'khrul ba myed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu byung ba'i nya gnas chos kyi snod dam/
136b9(mdo): chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / skra dang / kha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur//
137a1(mdo): // theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzind dang gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams
137a2(mdo): cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing / phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'thad cing rjes su 'thun par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi
137a3(mdo): nye gnas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa dang /
137a4(mdo): byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad du bcad pa bzhin no// // rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
137a5(mdo): nam 'tsho' bar du gnod sems yongs su spangs na/ sems can thams cad kyis bkur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / sems rnam pa/ ra dag pa dang dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i na pa
137a6(mdo): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud ltar 'khor bar 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'byir ba yang gnod sems kyi dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid myi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la
137a7(mdo): gzhan la yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba nyon mongs po'i sgrib pa dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / gnod sems myed pa la bsgrib pas bsgribs par gyur to//
137a8(mdo): 'di ltar gnod sems yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma lus par yongs su bcom pas rnam par spyan pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi len to// lus 'di nyid la yang lha myi la stsogs pa kun dka' zheng yid du 'ong ba dang
137a9(mdo): dogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / sems rnam par dag pa dang / dri ma dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis myi gdungs shing / yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang chung ma dang 'khor thams
137b1(mdo): cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi/ shi nad tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong bar myi 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang / yon tan/
137b2(mdo): du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa phrad de lus dang sems rab tu dka' ba dang / de la bkur sti dang bcas pas shin tu dad pa skyes par 'gyur ro// che 'phos nas kyang phyir myi'i nang du skye zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa ya
137b3(mdo): lag dang ldan pa gang nas gang du skyes pa sems can rnam par dag cing dri ma dang bral ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing skyid pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gzhan
137b4(mdo): chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan tu ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang phrad de/ de'i rjes su mthun par slob pa dang / gnod sems yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams
137b5(mdo): cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs tha/ mas cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam dang spyod pa
137b6(mdo): thams cad la rim gyis gzhol zhing / shi nad tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas bla na myed pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnyog pa dang / skye ba dang / sprid dang khug rlangs
137b7(mdo): dang / rdul dang dri ma dang / myi sdug pa myi mdzes pa thams cad dang bral te/ rin po che mang pos shin tu brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba dang / nga rgyal dang bral ba gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa dbang po ma nyams pa sems rtag tu zhi bzhi ma
137b8(mdo): can dag cing skyes te/ byams pa dang snying rje dang yon tan phun sum tshogs pas brgyan par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de/ sems can nag cis 'dul bzhin du dam pa'i chos ston to// yongs su
137b9(mdo): mya ngan las 'das kyang dam pa'i chos yun rang du gnas shing sems can tshad myed pa la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don byed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems yongs su spangs
138a1(mdo): pa'i 'khor lo dku' pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro//
138a2(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ theg pa chen po'i gang zag la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// /
138a3(mdo): dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstand pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi snod dam/ chos kyi snod ma yin pa yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu gyon cing / smra dang la
138a4(mdo): spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang maM/ ting nge 'dzin
138a5(mdo): dang / gzungs dang bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang / du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen da nga phrad cing / de'i rjes su slob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong
138a6(mdo): ba dang myi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye ba nas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang /
138a7(mdo): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la brtson pas sems myi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan dag thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin no//
138a8(mdo): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nam 'chol bar du log ltab yongs su spangs na sems can thams cad kyis bskur zhing bla mar byed pa dang / sems rnam par dag cing log par rtog pa dang bral bar
138a9(mdo): 'gyur te/ de'i dbang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thog ma myed pa'i mtha' nas rgyud lngar 'khor ba 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor 'bying ba yang log par lta ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid
138b1(mdo): sdig pa myi dge ba'i las bdag kyang byed la gzhan yang byed du 'dzud cing mthong ba dang / thos pa'i rjes su yi rang ba las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sgri ba dang / sems can gyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / yang dag/
138b2(mdo): par lta ba la sgrib pas bsgribs par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar log par lta ba yongs su spangs pa'i 'khor los lhag ma ma lus par bcom pas rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu yongs su myi len te// lus 'di nyid la yang lha dang /
138b3(mdo): myi la sogs pa kun dka' zhing yid du 'ong ba dang dogs pa myed par 'gyur ba dang lus dang sems rab tu bde ba dang / sems rnam par dag cing log par lta ba dang / bral bar 'gyur ro// 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed pa na yang lus
138b4(mdo): dang sems la sdug bsngal gyis myi gdung zhing yid du 'ong ba'i bu dang rungs dang / 'khor thams cad kyis yongs su bskor bas 'chi 'pho ba'i dus byed par 'gyur gyi// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mthong
138b5(mdo): mya 'gyur ro// yid du 'ong ba'i bshes gnyen chos kyis dul 'tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa dang pra/ nga de lus dang sems rab tu dga' ba dang bkur sti dang bcas pas shin/
138b6(mdo): tu dad pa skye bar 'gyur ro// che 'phos nas kyang phyir myi li nang du skyes zhing dbang po yongs su rdzogs pa yan lag dang ldan pa dang / gang nas gang du smras pa der/ sems rnam par dag cing / log par lta ba dang bral
138b7(mdo): ba dang / byad gzugs bzang ba dang / yid gzhungs pa dang / rab tu bde zhing spring pa dang / phyir yang yid du 'ong ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyem chos kyis dul ba tshul khrims dang yon tan du ldan pa/ bsod nams kyi 'di
138b8(mdo): yang dag pa dang zad de/ de'i rjes su 'thun par slob pa dang / log par lta ba'i chos yongs su spong ba dang / sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su gcod pa dang / dge ba'i chos khyad par can thams cad yongs
138b9(mdo): su rdzogs pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad tshol ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang spyod lam thams cad rim gyis gzhol zhing shin tu yangs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa nas/
139a1(mdo): na myed pa'i byang chub 'thob pa'i bar du 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang bral ba dang / lha'i bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang bral ba dang / mu stegs can kyi 'khor
139a2(mdo): thams cad dang bral ba dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / yang dag par lta ba dang ldan zhing ngo mtshar dang / bkra shas dang / tshul ngan pa'i lta ba sna tshogs dang / rtag par lta ba dang / chad
139a3(mdo): par lta ba dang / bdag dang bdag gi bar lta ba thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i sems can dag zhing der skyes te/ shin tu tshe ring ba dang / theg pa chen po'i ro gcig la yongs su spyod par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
139a4(mdo): pa'i tshe'i tshad kyang dpag tu myed de sems can cis 'dul ba bzhin du cho su stond pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas shing sems can tshad myed pa la phan pa dang bde ba'i don tu
139a5(mdo): ro gcig pa'i chos bstand pa la rtson pa myed pas yongs su rgyas par byed cing bgegs dang bar chad myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba yongs
139a6(mdo): su spangs pa'i 'khor lo bcu pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnam par bcu po 'di dang ldan pas nyan thos kyi theg pa la' khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa
139a7(mdo): myed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gang zag la 'khrul pa byed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po'i gang zas
139a8(mdo): la 'khrul pa myed par 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung yongs su 'phel ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ba'i nye gnas chos kyi sdod dam chos kyi snod ma yin yang rung / chung ngu na chos gos kyi tshal bu kyod
139a9(mdo): cing sgra dpakha spu bregs pa la 'khrul pa myed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i chos la gong nas gong du 'phar zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rno ba'i shes rab dang / bsod nams kyi khyad par rtag tu skye zhing 'phel ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang
139b1(mdo): gzungs dang / bzod pa dang / sa rnams thams cad la dbang du 'gyur zhing phyir myi ldog pa dang / rtag tu dge ba'i bshe gnyen da phrad cing rjes su slob pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang myi 'bral zhing / byang chub sems/
139b2(mdo): dpa' dang nyan thos kyi nye gnas dang mthong ba dang / myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang myi 'bral ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad tshol ba la brtson pas sems/
139b3(mdo): myi ngoms pa dang / byang chub kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam dang pha rol tu phyind pa drug la sems myi ngoms par 'gyur te/ 'bras bu gzhan thob pa yang ji skad bshad pa bzhin du// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
139b4(mdo): po 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snga ma 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
139b5(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyang myi dge ba bcu'i/ las yongs su spangs nas/ thams cad kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi sdug bsngal spangs shing bstod de/ sems can thams cad la
139b6(mdo): bde ba dang phan pa'i don dang / byang chub kyi lam skye zhing 'phel ba ra bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal lhag ma ma lus par bsal bar bya ba dang / ngan song
139b7(mdo): gsum bskam par bya ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung bsab par bya ba dang / khams gsum gyi srid pa yongs su bskam par bya ba dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched gcad par bya ba dang / thams cad myur du 'a
139b8(mdo): pa myed pa'i mya ngan las 'da' ba'i grong khyer du gzung ba'i phyir ji skad bshad pa bzhin du myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi 'bras bu yongs su spang ngo // de bas na rigs kyi bu gal te yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las 'di ma bsdu
139b9(mdo): par mngon par 'tshang rgya ba 'am/ chung ngu na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'ga' tsam yang myi srung bar nga ni theg pa chen po yang dag par spyod pa'o zhe 'am/ da ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
140a1(mdo): sgrub pa'o zhes zer na/ gang zag de ni shin tu brdzun par smra ba ste/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spya ngar 'jig rten slu ba dang / 'dzem pa dang ngo tsha ba myed pa stong par smra zhing chad par lta ba glen pa/
140a2(mdo): myi shes pa slu ba can yin te/ de tshe 'phos nas ngan song du ltung bar shes par bya'o// rigs kyi bu gang tshig tu brjod pa 'am/ mnyan pa tsam gyis mchog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bsgom pa 'am/ nan tan bya myi dgos
140a3(mdo): par byang chub dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob du zin na ni bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sems can byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya ste/ mya
140a4(mdo): ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ni de lta bu'i gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni theg pa chen po'i rtsa ba yi na te/ byang chub kyi rgyu dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i them sbas lta bu'o//
