140a5(mdo): rigs kyi bu gal te sems bskyed tsam 'am smon lam btab pa tsam/ gyis chog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam goms par nan tan bya mya dgos par byang chub sems dpa' dang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar
140a6(mdo): 'thob tu zin na ni/ bskal pa gcig la yud tsam thang cig gis phyog sa bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sa'i khams kyi rdul phra mo snyed kyi sa mas can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing mya ngan
140a7(mdo): las 'da' ba 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ni de lta bu'i gnas myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam ni 'jig rten las 'da' ba'i khyad par dang yon tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gal te dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
140a8(mdo): la nan tan ma byas na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo snyad kyi skal bar bdag gi theg pa chen po pa'o zhes zer te 'chad dam nyan tam/ sems bskyed dam/ smon lam btab kyang / byang chub dang mya
140a9(mdo): ngan las 'da' ba 'thob par myi 'gyur la/ gzhan yang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las gnon myi nus so// rigs kyi bu dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byas pas 'jig rten na rgyal rigs dang bram ze la stsogs pa
140b1(mdo): rigs chen po dang / rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha nas 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched stengs kyi bar du yod pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byad
140b2(mdo): chub kyi bar du yang yod par 'gyur te/ de dag kun kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la nan tan byed pa'i khyad par dang bye brag las gyur to// de bas na rigs kyi bu gang myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par/
140b3(mdo): 'dod na/ dge ba bcu'i lam la nan tan gyi brgyan gyis brgyan te myi dge ba bcu'i sdom pa la myi gnas na bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// gang myur du theg pa chen po'i spyod yul chud par 'dod dam/
140b4(mdo): myur du bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod dam// myur du dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'dod na/ sngar dge ba bcu'i sam 'i nang tu bsrung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi
140b5(mdo): lam gyis ni dge ba'i chos thams cad dang / yon tan rnam par gzhag pa'i gzhi dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu mchog thob par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// de bas na dge ba bcu'i lam la
140b6(mdo): shin tu nan tan bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de gsungs pa// srid pa 'i sdug bsngal kun gcod cing / byang chub chen po thob 'dod pa/ dge
140b7(mdo): bcu'i 'khor lo'i nan tan la// le lo ma byed brtson par gyis// theg pa gsum gyi dam chos dang // theg pa rnam gsum gang zag dang // rab tu byung ba thams cad la// 'khrul pa myed par thob par 'gyur// theg chen spyod la dang mos zhing
140b8(mdo): thams cad 'khor gyi dbugs 'byin pa// chos mchog rtogs nas zhing dag der// byang chub chen por myur du 'thob// gal te srog gcod yongs spangs ma// kun gyis bkur zhing bla mar byed// rtag tu nar myed che yang ring // bde zhing snying
140b9(mdo): la gnod pa myed// skye ba'i gnas mi thams cad du// sangs rgyas spyod yul lam la mos// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // myur du bla myed byang chub 'thob// ma byin len pa yongs spangs na// mkhas pas bkur zhing bla mar byed//
141a1(mdo): 'dod chags skye ba'i las kun zhi// 'dod chags myed pa skye bar 'gyur// skye ba kun tu yongs spyad ldan// sbyin bdag chen por de 'gyur te// rin chen mang pos brgyan pa dang // yid 'ong sangs rgyas zhing yang 'thob//
141a2(mdo): 'dod pas log g.yem yongs spangs na// nyon mongs dri ma zhi bar 'gyur// 'dod chags sred pa'i rgya mtsho skams// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing 'gyur 'thob// sems can rnam pa mang po yang // 'dod pa'i 'dam las 'byin par
141a3(mdo): 'gyur// theg chen la ni rab bkod nas// tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod du btsud// brdzun du smra ba yongs spangs na// 'phags pa'i dbang dang ye shes 'thob// rtag tu bden la smra bar dka'// brdzun du 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal 'jil// tshig cig
141a4(mdo): tshad mar btsugs pas na// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun mthong // brdzun myi smra ba bsgoms pas na// byang chub chen po myur du 'thob// phra ma'i tshig smra/ yongs spangs na// dge ba'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur// sangs rgyas chos dang
141a5(mdo): dge 'dun mthong // chad par lta ba yongs myi 'gyur// 'phags pa'i cha/ gas myed dga' ba dang // rin chen gter gyi gzungs 'thob cing // zab mo/ chos kyi rgya mtsho reg// myur du bla myed byang chub 'thob// gal te zhe gcod
141a6(mdo): tshig spangs te// 'jam zhing mnyen pa'i tshig smras na// sems can kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur// snga ma'i myi dge las kyang zhi// 'khor rnams rtag tu dang / 'a ba dang // byang chub sems dpa'i ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang
141a7(mdo): po'i spyod yul shes// sa bcu las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur// kyal bar smra ba yongs spangs na// mkhas pas bskur zhing bla mar byed// gzhan la tshig tu smra ba kun// yon tan rnam lnga 'thob par 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa'i tshig nyan
141a8(mdo): cing // 'phags pa'i lam chol spro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs rdzogs shing // thams cad mkhyend pa myur du 'thob// gal te chags sems yongs spangs te// 'phags pa rnams la myi spyod cing // dur smrig gyon la mchod pa byed//
141a9(mdo): theg pa gsum gyi byang chub sgrub// rtag tu rnam dag zhing du skye// ston pa'i gnas su gnas par 'gyur// bla myed theg pa la zhon te// rgyal ba'i ye shes myur du 'thob// gal te gnod sems yongs spangs te// gcig tu byams pa'i sems
141b1(mdo): bsgoms na// mnyam par gzhag pa'ang myur du 'thob// 'phags pa'i spyod yul mos par 'gyur// rnam dag sangs rgyas zhing du skye// nyes pa'i skyon rnams kun dang bral// de la gnas na byang chub 'thob// gnod sems thams
141b2(mdo): cad spang bar bya// ngan par lta ba yongs spangs te// rnam dag dad pa'i sems snyoms na// theg gsum ston la mos byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa byed// ngan song kun las yongs thar te// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun
141b3(mdo): rnams dang phrad // byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan ldan// ye shes mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// dge ba bcu'i las lam gyi// byang chub mchog thob 'gyur zhes gsungs// snyoms par 'jug dang gzungs
141b4(mdo): rnams dang // sa dang bzod pa skye bar 'gyur// bdag nyid che ba 'i 'khor lo 'dis// ngan song thams cad rab bcom nas// sdig pa'i sgrib pa kun kyang choms// myur du byang chub chen po 'thob//
141b5(mdo): 'phags pa'i shi nad tu rgyas pa chen po'i sa'i snying po 'khor lo ba cu pa zhes bya ba las dge ba'i las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drA ka pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
141b6(mdo): dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yo da do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di da nga ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su
141b7(mdo): bas yang te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams
141b8(mdo): cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen 'dun byed par 'gyur ro// bcu kyang zhen/ 'di ste/ rnam pa lnga tshogs kyi zas dang / gom dang / gos dang / rin po 'i rgyun dang / bal skang dang / rta pazhi d+hA dang /
141b9(mdo): kyi yan lag dang / rkang pa dang / lag pa dang / rna ba dang sna dang / mgo dang myig dang / rkang dang klad pa dang / pags pa dang / rus pa dang sha dang khrag dang yul dang / srid dang / bu dang chung ma dang / bran po dang /
142a1(mdo): bran mo dang / zhang khyim dang / zhing 'brog las stsogs pa de dag thams cad sbyin pa de re re byed pa na lus dang srog la myi lta zhing bdag gcig pu 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bde ba dang 'dod pa'i phyir
142a2(mdo): sems bskyed de/ sbyin pa byed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i myu gu bskyed pa'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// thabs mkhas pa dang shes rab mchog bskyed pa'i sbyin pa'i sems
142a3(mdo): bskyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// gzhan yang spag go snyam pa myed pa'i sems
142a4(mdo): dang / brlang ba myed pa'i sems dang / phrag dog myed pa'i sems dang ser sna dang zhum pa myed pa'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin no// gang sbyin pa'i dngo sa po che yang rung chung yang rung chung na zan cing cig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na ya
142a5(mdo): rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la myi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems skyed do// nyan thos kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la myi re bar sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskye/ da do// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i 'bras bu la myi re bar sbyin pa sbyin
142a6(mdo): ba'i sems bskyed do// gang sbyin pa'i dngos po de che yang rung chung yang rung chung ngu na zan cang cig tsam gyi sbyin pa byas na yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyend pa 'i ye shes su bsngo zhing / sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed do// rigs
142a7(mdo): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu po de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa na 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
142a8(mdo): las shin tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang yongs su bsrung bar
142a9(mdo): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis sbyin pa sbyin pa'i sems bskyed pa ni byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems myed kyi/ bdag gi dbul ba de spang ba dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal las tha rad pa dang /
142b1(mdo): bdag bde ba thob par bya ba dang / bdag mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir sbyin pa byed de/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir sbyin pa byed pa ni ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa ni byams pa dang /
142b2(mdo): snying rje chen po'i sems kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs pa spong ba dang / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las gnod pa dang / sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las
142b3(mdo): bzla ba'i phyir/ sbyin pa byed kyi bdag 'ba' shig gi phyir sbyin pa spyod pa ma yin no// de lta bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi
142b4(mdo): zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed cing yongs su bsdu nga bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
142b5(mdo): zang zing gi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa rnam lnga'i mchog la sems myi chags te/ bdag nyid dbang ba bde ba'i// yo byad thams cad sems can kun la sbyin pa byed de/ sems
142b6(mdo): can thams cad yongs su sdud ba'i sems dang / bdag gi sdug bsngal thams cad la dri gyi snyam pa'i bzod pa'i sems dang / sem sa can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i sems dang /
142b7(mdo): sems can thams cad la bde ba'i sbyin pa'i sems dang / sems can thams cad mya ngan las bzla ba'i sems gnas te sbyin pa byed do// de bas na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shinang tu 'das pa dang / nyan
142b8(mdo): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dbar nga sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur dang bsrung ba myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gas te 'dod
142b9(mdo): lnga la sems myi chags shing byams pa dang snying rje chen pos sbyin pa byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa zhes bya'o//
143a1(mdo): gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yang ma spangs la byams pa dang snying rje chen po yang myed par sbyin par byin na/ sbyin pa'i dngos po tshad myed dpag tu myed pa btang yang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
143a2(mdo): po zhes myi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin pas sbyin pas 'di ni 'phags pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab pa ma yin no// de bas na 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa spangs te byams pa dang /
143a3(mdo): snying rje chen po dang ldan pas sbyin pa bya'o// gal te 'jig rten gyi 'dod pa lnga yang ma spangs la/ byams pa dang snying rje chen po yang myed par sbyin par byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes kyang myi bya la/ bsod nams kyi zhing yang
143a4(mdo): dag pa yang ma yin no// rigs kyi bu 'dod pa rnam lnga chags pas sbyin pa byed na bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal gyi cha chung zad kyang zhi bar myi 'gyur na/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal tshad myed pa bsald pa lta ci smos de nas
143a5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshig / su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ zang zing sbyin pa'i 'khor lo ldan pa// mkhas pa bsam pa dag pa'i mos pas// 'dod pa rnam lnga dag ni
143a6(mdo): spangs te/ sems can kun la phan pa bde byed// sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir gyi// rnam sbyin 'bras bu de phyir ma yin// sbyin pa 'i dngos po byin pa chung yang // yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur//
143a7(mdo): sbyin pa'i dngos po mang du byas kyang / 'dod pa rnam lnga dag la gnas na// 'phags pa dag gi phyag rgyas mi btab ma nges pa'i tshogs la gnas 'gyur/ sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po chung yang // 'dod pa lnga la myi gnas pa ni// /
143a8(mdo): nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur/ de bas 'dod pa rnam lnga spangs la// rtag tu rnam dag sbyin pa byed cing // sems can kun la bde ba byas na// yang dag bsod nams zhing du de 'gyur// rigs
143a9(mdo): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi sbyin pa'i go ca chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu yod de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo de dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed nas
143b1(mdo): 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal ba'i phyir// myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nang tu 'das pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad
143b2(mdo): kyi bsod nams chen po'i zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
143b3(mdo): nams kyis bstan pa dam pa'i chos nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa dam pa'i chos dang / theg pa chen po dang ldan pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / 'jig rten gyi chos dang /
143b4(mdo): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos dang / zag pa zad pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos dang / gnyis su myed pa'i chos rnams te/ byang chub
143b5(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa bcu po 'di la dad ci dgus par byed pa dang / ji skad thos pa rnams ji nus su gzungs su 'dzin cing yid la byed do// rab tu rtog go// mtha' khong du
143b6(mdo): chud par byed cing / gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par ston par byed do// nam chos ston pa'i tshe/ phra dog myed pa'i sems dang / ser sna myed pa'i sems dang / nga rgyal myed pa'i sems dang / rnyed pa myi re ba'i sems dang / kazha/
143b7(mdo): gyi myi spong ba'i sems dang / bdag myi spyod pa'i sems dang / sti stang dang bcas pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang / byams pa chen po'i sems dang / snying rje chen po'i sems su bya'o// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang
143b8(mdo): la ni nyan thos kyi chos ston cing 'chad de/ de la rang sangs rgyas kyi chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag la ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos sngon kyi/ 1
143b9(mdo): thos kyi theg pa'i chos sam/ theg pa chen po'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i gang zag la ni theg pa chen po'i chos ston gyi/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyis ma yin pa dang / sems
144a1(mdo): can gyi dbang po dang / snod ji lta ba bzhin du dam pa'i chos stond kyi dbang po dang snod du ma gyur pa la cho kyi stond to// gang theg pa chen po'i sems can la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa spyod cig par ram/ nyan
144a2(mdo): kyi theg pa spyod cig par myi skul lo// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la skabs kha cig du theg pa chen po spyad pa la nan tan byos shig ces skul ba'i skabs ni yod do// nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi sems can la
144a3(mdo): skabs kha cig tu rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i spyod pa dang / theg pa chen po'i spyod pa la nan tan gyis shig ces skul ba'i skabs kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstand pa'i dam pa'i chos chung ngu na tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/
144a4(mdo): tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam la yang shi nang tu dad cing bkur sti byed kyi/ de la 'phya ba'am/ bskur ba 'am bgegs sam/ bar chad myi byed de/ chos stond pa la sangs rgyas dang 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / chos nyan
144a5(mdo): ba'i 'khor rnams la nad pa dang / 'dra bar 'du shes pa dang / gang 'chad pa'i chos rnams la sman bzang po dang 'dra bar 'du shes shing / 'do da pa rnam lnga yongs su bcad de/ re ba myed pas dam pa'i chos
144a6(mdo): stond to// rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo rnam pa bcu zhes// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na 'dod pa lnga
144a7(mdo): yongs su bsal te/ myur du nyi ma'i sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzind thob cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nad tu 'das pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur
144a8(mdo): pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka
144a9(mdo): stsal pa// mkhas pa chos kyi sbyin pa spyod pa dag/ snod bzhin theg pa gsum gyi chos stond te// theg pa gzhan dag de la ston myi byed// thos nas de la 'phya zhing skur myi 'gyur// dbang po snod bzhin dam pa'i chos
144b1(mdo): ston gyi// dbang po snod myin dag la ma yin no// so sor ji ltar ji la mos pa bzhin// de dang de'i chos ston mgu bar byed// theg pa chen po spyod pa'i gang zag la// theg pa rnam pa gnyis kyi chos myi bstan// bar bar theg/
144b2(mdo): pa gnyis kyi gang zag la// theg pa 'bring dang rab kyi chos ston to// shin tu dad cing gus par chos mnyan gyi// de la 'phya zhing bskur bar myi bya'o// chos smra ba la mchod par byed pa ni// sangs rgyas 'dra bar de la 'du shes skyed
144b3(mdo): kun nas nyon mongs pa'i nad bsal phyir// dam pa'i chos kyi sman dag nyan par skul// khye dang grags pa shi nang tu rang spangs te// dam pa'i chos dag bstan cing bshad par bya/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
144b4(mdo): dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims rnam dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos
144b5(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / hA thos dang rang sngas rgyas kyi theg pa pa tha sa rbad kyis mchod pa dA/ bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na tshul khrims
144b6(mdo): rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhen/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa rnam pa gnyis te/ thun mong ba dang / thun mong ba ma yin no// de la ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'/
144b7(mdo): tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba zhe na/ khang khyim na gnas pa dge bsnyed dang / dge bsnyen mo'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa blangs pa'am/ yang na rab tu byung ba'i so sor tha rad pa'i tshul khrims kyis bsnyen par
144b8(mdo): rdzogs pa ste/ sdom pa 'di dang so sor tha rad pa'i tshul khrims 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i 'khor lo thun mong ba ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin no// byang
144b9(mdo): chub sems dpa' sa tshul khrims kyi 'khor lo rnam par dag pa 'di'i dbang gis sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa chod par ram/ log par lta ba sel ba 'am/ las kyi sgrib pa dang 'khor ba las grol
145a1(mdo): bar myi 'gyur te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes kyang myi bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang myi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin
145a2(mdo): no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i thun mong ma yin zhe na/ gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems dang / gnod
145a3(mdo): pa myed pa'i sems dang / khon tu 'dzind pa myed pa'i sems kyis rnam par dag pa'i tshul khrims srung ngo // tshul khrims dang tshul khrims ngan pa can dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang /
145a4(mdo): brtson 'grus dang / le lo can rab 'bring tha ma kun la bye brag myi 'byed pa'i sems dang / khyad par myed pa'i 'du shes kyis tshul khri mas yongasu srung ngo // khams gsum gyi sems can thams
145a5(mdo): cad la zhe sdang myed pa dang / khong khro ba myed pa dang / ngan par spyod/ pa myed pas tshul khrims yongs su srung ngo // srid pa gsum gyis nga po dang / khams dang skye mched la rnam par rtog pa myed pas tshul
145a6(mdo): khrims yongs su srung ngo // 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // gzugs yod pa'i khams la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // gzugs myed pa'i khams la myi gnas par tshul khrims su
145a7(mdo): srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // rnyed pa dang myi rnyed pa la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ngo // 'du byed rnams la myi gnas par tshul khrims srung ste// 'di dag ni byang chub
145a8(mdo): sems dpa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo thun thong ma yin pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i go cha chen po'i 'di 'khor lo 'di dang
145a9(mdo): ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bcas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs/
145b1(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das sa 'di dag gas/
145b2(mdo): bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal ba/ khyim na gnas shing sdom pa len pa/ rab 'byung so sor tha rad pa'i tshul khrims// theg pa gnyis dang thun mong yin te/ byang chub chen po zhes ni myi bya// mkhas
145b3(mdo): pa stong pa nyid chos bsgom pa/ 'jig rten kun sa myi rten myi gnas// sred pa kun la gnas ma yin par// rnam par dag pa ni tshul khrims srung ngo // mtshan ma spong ba'i tshul khrims dag ni// chags pa myed de zag
145b4(mdo): pa kun myed// tshul khrims 'di ltar srung ba dag ni// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya/ rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i go cha'i 'khor
145b5(mdo): chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
145b6(mdo): thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sa ngas rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang /
145b7(mdo): bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa la mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis te/ gang zhe na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
145b8(mdo): pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i bzod pa zhe na/ de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ste/ sems can la dmyigs pa len pa dang bcas pa'i mtshan ma dang bcas/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la /
145b9(mdo): pa/ bsod nams kyi se la rten ta/ bzod par byed pa'o// gzhan yang bdag gi gzungs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg bya la brten nas bzod par byed do// 'jug pa dang bcas pa'i bzod pa ji myi snyam pa myed pa'i bzod pa dang / mthu zhan pa'i
146a1(mdo): bzod pa'i sems can gtong ba'i bzod pa dang / g.yo dang sbyar bcas pa'i bzod pa dang pha rol la 'drid pa'i bzod pa dang / bde ba'i don byed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bzod pa zhes bya ste/ brjod
146a2(mdo): pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la stsogs pa dang thun mong pa ma yin gyi/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes myi bya'o// de lta ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chen po yang ma yin te/ nyan thos dang sa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing
146a3(mdo): yang dag pa zhes kyang myi bya'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ zag pa myed pa'i bzod pa ste/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi chos chen po'i 'od kyis sems can thams
146a4(mdo): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir chags pa myed pa'i bzod pa dang / bya ba 'i dngos po thams cad dang tshig tu smra ba dang / rgyu dang mtshan ma dang / yi ge dang swa skad thas cad yongs su bcad pa'i skye mched la brten pa'i bzod pa spyod do//
146a5(mdo): bzod pa 'di bsgoms pas kun nas nyon mongs pa gsuM dang / bskal pa rna/ pa gsum dang / mtshan nyid gsum dang / dus gsum dang / srid pa gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum dang / myi dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum dang / chu bo bzhi dang /
146a6(mdo): bdud rnam bzhi dang / nye bar len pa bzhi dang / lus kyi 'dud pa rnam bzhi sa sa stsogs pa yongs su bcad pas/ bzod pa 'di bsgoms pa'i tshe/ sems dang yid rab tu zhig 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
146a7(mdo): cha chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo'i bzod pa de dang ldan pas/ thog ma sems bskyed pa na/ 'dod pa lnga rnams yongs su bsal ba'i phyir/ byang chub se
146a8(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
146a9(mdo): thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshig su bcad de bka' stsas pa/ bzod pa la ni rnam pa gnyis te/ mtshan ma
146b1(mdo): bcas dang mtshan myed pa// mtshan mar bcas pa'i bzod pa chags yod// mkhas pa dag ni de la myi stong/ 'du byed rnam sum phung po khams dang // skye mched la brten bzod pa bsgom pa// de ni zag bcas bzod pa yin te// byang chub se/
146b2(mdo): dpa' chen po ma yin// phyin ci log pa rnam bzhi bsal nas/ chags pa myed pa'i bzod pa'i skom zhing / 'du byed rnam pa gsum dag zhe na/ bzod pa 'di la thams cad stod 'gyur/ 'du byed thams cad rab tu zhi zhing // rtog pa thams cad/
146b3(mdo): yongs su spangs te// sems ni nam mkha' 'dra bar mnyam pa// bzod pa 'di la thams cad stong 'gyur// thams cad chos la ro gcig mthun par// stong pa mtshan ma myed pa'i zhib// sems ni rtsi la 'ang myi gnas myi chags// bzod/
146b4(mdo): 'dzin phan yon che 'gyur// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan/
146b5(mdo): na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyam/ thos dang rang sangs rgyas thas cad kyi bsod nas kyi zhing chen por 'gyur
146b6(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na brtson 'gru sa kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i
146b7(mdo): 'grus la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// des ji skar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtsod 'grus she na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams shin tu 'bad pa'i sartson 'grus kyis 'jig rten
146b8(mdo): bsad rnams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsums nan tan byed do// gsum gang zhen 'dri sa ste/ sbyin 'byed pa'i bas de rnams kyis sa dang / tshul khrims bsrung ba'i bsod nams kyi las dang / bsgom pa'i bsod nams byed pa'i mas
146b9(mdo): las 'di dag byed pa ni brtson 'grus ne pa gsum zhes bya ste/ brtson 'grus na pa 'di dag ni sems cad la dmyig pa'i zag pa dang bcas pa nye bar sen pa dang bcas pa/ rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la rten pa bsod nas kyolas da be
147a1(mdo): de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i brtson 'grus shes bya'o// brtson 'grus 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la stsogs pa dang thun mong ba yin te/ ko cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes myi bya/ byang chub
147a2(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang myi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus
147a3(mdo): kyi go cha chen po 'khor lo zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' dag shi nad tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs pa'i las dang sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba ste/ brtson 'grus
147a4(mdo): 'di 'phags pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa zag pa myed pa/ nye bar len pa myed pa/ rten dang gnas myed de/ brtson 'grus dang / le lo dang / sbyin pa dang / ser sna dang / tshul khrims dang / @
147a5(mdo): ngan pa'i tshul khrims can dang / byams pa dang / zhe sdang dang / sems can rab dang / 'bring dang / tha ma kun la myi 'byed pa'i se mas dang / bye brag myed pa'i 'du shes kyis shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson
147a6(mdo): 'grus rtsom mo// khams gsum gyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid dang / dmyigs pa myed pas bya ba'i las byed de/ smra ba dang / rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i gnas thams cad la myi gnas pa'i sems kyis shin
147a7(mdo): tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom mo// srid pa gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la rnam par rtog pa myed pas shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ 'dod pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus
147a8(mdo): dang gzugs yod pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang gzugs myed pa'i khams la myi gnas pa'i 'bang ba'i brtson 'grus dang // de pa'i rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu thams cad la myi rtog pa'i 'bad pa'i
147a9(mdo): brtson 'grus dang / rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa kun la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'du byed rnams la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i bcom 'grus dang / 'jig rten gyi bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po gsum la myi gnas
147b1(mdo): pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la myi gnas pa'i 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams
147b2(mdo): kyi las kyi dngos po rnam pa gsum la shi nad tu brtson 'grus rtsom pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po la 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
147b3(mdo): dpa' chen po gang brtson 'grus kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang
147b4(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgya sa kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen
147b5(mdo): bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag ga sal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsald pa// dbang po drug la shin tu chags pa'i// bus pa chu bo lngas ni khyer ba/ she nad
147b6(mdo): tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom yang / mkhas pa rnams kyis de la spro ra 'gyur// sems can dmyigs shing zag dang bcas la/ len parabyas shing brtson 'grus rtsom yang / yang dag bsod rnams zhing
147b7(mdo): ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po ma yin/ mkhas pa brtson 'grus rtsom pa dag ni// chags pa thams cad ring du spangs te/ sems ni ji la'ang myi gnas kyi chags// yang dag bsod nams zhing zhes de bya// myi dang
147b8(mdo): gzugs la chags pa myed cing // phung po khams dang skye mched spangs te// thams cad 'khor gyi rten du 'gyur ba// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po// 'jig rten spyod kyang rung chu zla bzhin te// 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i mthar
147b9(mdo): phyin 'khor lo 'di'i sa yongs su bcom pa// skye bo'i kun nas nyon mongs bcings pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a bsam gtan gi go chen po'i 'khor lo yod do// byang chub mes dpa' mos dpa' chen po k+Sha nya khor lo 'di dang ldanan mos
148a1(mdo): bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa snga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan
148a2(mdo): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar ma bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan
148a3(mdo): la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi bsam gtan zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po la gnas nas/ bsam gtan sgom pa dang
148a4(mdo): khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / skye mched la gan sa nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams la gnas nas pas gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs yod pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan
148a5(mdo): sgom pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gta/ na sgom pa dang / sdom pa gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par grol ba gsum la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom
148a6(mdo): pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la gnas nas bsam gtan
148a7(mdo): sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i mi yan lag brgyad
148a8(mdo): pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chu'i zhams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / mye'i khams la gnas nas bsam btan sgom pa dang / rlung gi
148a9(mdo): khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshol ba la gnas nas bsam
148b1(mdo): gtan sgom pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde ba'i ya pa ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
148b2(mdo): mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / chung zad myed myin skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed
148b3(mdo): myin skye mched la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten 'di la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol da la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu la gnas nas bsam gtan
148b4(mdo): sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes tshad myed pa la gnas nas bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan de dag zag pa dang bcas pa/ nye bar len pa dang bcas/
148b5(mdo): chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po/ 'i 'jig rten dang bcas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya'o// bsam sa/ tan 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba
148b6(mdo): zhes bya ste/ go sa chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la
148b7(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan zhe na 'di lta ste rtsa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams phung po dang bral bar bsam gtan bsgom pa dang / khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
148b8(mdo): skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'dod pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzugs kyi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / gzug gyid ba'i rnams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
148b9(mdo): ba dang / sdom pa gsum dang bral bar bsas gtan sgom pa dang / rnam par b.rang pa gsum dang bral bar bas pa gtan thob pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan nom pa dang / yang dag par mo
149a1(mdo): ba bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / dbang po lnga dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / stobs lnga dang bral bar bsam
149a2(mdo): gtan sgom pa dang / byang chub kyi yan las bdun dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang
149a3(mdo): chu'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / mye'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rlung gi khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mkha'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa
149a4(mdo): dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / bde bar tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug pa sngal du tshor ba dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / sdug
149a5(mdo): bsngal yang ma yin pa bde ba yang ma yin par tshor ba dang bral bar ba sam gtan sgom pa dang / nam mazha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas
149a6(mdo): skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / cung zad myed pa'i skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang /
149a7(mdo): 'jig rten 'di dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'jig rten pha rol dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chung ngu dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa dang / 'du shes chen po dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom
149a8(mdo): pa dang / 'du shes tshad myed pa dang bral bar bsam gtan sgom pa ste/ bsam gtan 'di ni 'phags pa'i 'od zer chen po skyed pa zag pa myed pa/ nye bar len pa myed pa dang / chags pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub
149a9(mdo): sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bsam gtan gyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems
149b1(mdo): bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsal te// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod
149b2(mdo): nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'ad dang gsal bar bzlas pa'i
149b3(mdo): phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lad pa/ bdag gi khur lci spong ba'i phyir na/ dmyigs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin sgom ste// bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs gcod 'dod// yang dag mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin// snod la
149b4(mdo): rten cing rtog dang bcas pa// rnam par grol 'dod cing ting 'dzin sgom yang tshu rol pha rol mu la gnas na// sems can dag la phan don byed myin// sems can kun la phan dang bde phyir// ting 'dzin sgom zhing khur lci
149b5(mdo): spong ste// kun nas nyon mongs thams cad sel ba/ de ni yang dag/ mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid/ sems can thams cad sim par byed phyir// / myi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom ste// 'dod pa'i srid pa thams
149b6(mdo): cad gcod pa// de ni blo gros chen po zhes bya// srid pas bcings pa tha ma sa cad dkrol te// 'jigs pa myed pa'i grong du gzung phyir/ rab tu zhi ba 'i ting 'dzin sgom pa// de ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po'o//
149b7(mdo): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba yod de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo de dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa/ 'dod
149b8(mdo): pa lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa
149b9(mdo): thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang / bsten bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na shes rab kyi go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab la na rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig
149'a1(mdo): rten// dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i shes rab ce na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams theg pa gsum gyi dam pa'i chos klog pa dang / 'don pa dang /
149'a2(mdo): gleg bam du 'dri ba dang / nyan pa dang pha rol la ston cing 'chad pa 'ba' shig la rten te/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi shes rab kyi sgron ma 'byung ba'i phyir/ de
149'a3(mdo): bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la shin tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis klog pa dang / 'dun pa dang nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad pa dang
149'a4(mdo): yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyi nan tan byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos la klog pa da nga/ 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang /
149'a5(mdo): gzhan dag la ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus/ kye nan tan du spyod do// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i theg pa che/ na po dang ldan pa'i chos la brtson 'grus su klog pa dang / 'don pa
149'a6(mdo): dang / nyan pa dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan la yang rgyas bar ston cing 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus kyis nan tan byed pa / 'amags pa'i chags byed ji las kyi yan lag chos lam yin/ 'phags pa'i chol la ma yin/ 'phags pa
149'a7(mdo): lam du rtogs pa ni rnam par grol ba'i tshol ba ma yin/ rab tu zhi ba yang dag pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed pa yin te/ rtag tu lta ba dang bcas pa dang bcas pa mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i shes rab la nan tan byed do// de ltar
149'a8(mdo): len pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa'i zhes rab ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi shes rab ces bya'o// shes rab de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i
149'a9(mdo): 'khor lo zhes kyi bya/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes kyang kyi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'dzin
149'b1(mdo): ten las 'das pa'i shes rab ce na 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam la brtsod 'grus su nan tan byed pa nA/ cinas su theg pa gsum gyi yang dag pa'i chos la klog pa dang 'don pa dang / nyan pa
149'b2(mdo): dang / glegs bam du 'dri ba dang / gzhan dag la rgyas par ston cing 'chad kyang de la dmyigs su myed pa'i sbyor ba la gnas te/ myi g.yo ba dang / myi rtog pa dang / ngo bo nyid myed pa dang / nam mkha'i lta bu'i sems
149'b3(mdo): dang rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang 'phel ba dang 'grib pa myed pa'i shes rab dang / chags pa myed pa'i sems dang / skye ba dang 'gog pa myed pa'i sems kyis/ phyir myi ldog pa'i sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyi sems
149'b4(mdo): dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i sems dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sems dang / bdag myed pa'i sems dang / rnam par myi rtog pa'i sems dang rab tu zhi ba'i dang / bzod pa dang / rtog pa dang bral ba'i sems
149'b5(mdo): kyis grub pa dang / 'jig pa'i byed pa'i sa la shin tu thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa dang / myi gnas pa/ myi chags pa'i mtsho/ ka dam pa'i blo gros sa la thabs mkhas pas bde bar gnas pa ste
149'b6(mdo): shes rab 'di ni len pa myed la chags pa myed pas byang chub sems dpa 'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi go cha chen po la 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
149'b7(mdo): po shes rab kyi go cha chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas 'dod pa yongs su bsal ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi las shin tu
149'b8(mdo): 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
149'b9(mdo): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mazhes pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga
150a1(mdo): yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang
150a2(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i thabs mkhas pa
150a3(mdo): la rnam pa gnyis te/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don nam/
150a4(mdo): gzhan gyi don dam/ gnyi ga'i don la bdag dang gzhan du rtog cing bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bdag dang gzhan gyi don yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /
150a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / nyan thos la mchod pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / pha dang ma dang nad pa da da/ nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / rten myed pa dang / gnod
150a6(mdo): pa mang pos sdug bsngal bar gyur par mthong na/ shi nang tu thabs mazhes pas sgrol zhing / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongasu smyin par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i de dag theg pa chen po la gnas
150a7(mdo): pas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa chen po'i snod ma yin pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi dbang po yongs su ma sbyin pa la shand tu phra ba zab pa'i chos ston du te/ slob du
150a8(mdo): gzhug pa dang / 'phags pa'i bsam gtan la nan tan byed du gzhug go// gzhan yang don dam pa'i dben pa bstan te/ nan tan byed du gzhug pa dang / phyin ci log bzhi las bzla zhing myi ldog pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid
150a9(mdo): rig par bya ba dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la gzhol bar bya ba nas/ gzhan yang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang
150b1(mdo): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / lhag ma ma lus pa'i lam dang / lam gyi 'bras bu'i bar du 'jug par bya ba la mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis yongs su
150b2(mdo): sbyin par byed do// sems can gang khye dang grags pa dang / longs spyod la chags te/ dbang po rgod pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma sbyin pa la ni mdo sde dang / 'dul ba dang / ma mo klog pa dang / 'don pa byed du gzhug
150b3(mdo): bo dang sangs rgyas gzhan gis bshad pa las gzhan pa rnam par grol ba dang / 'dun pa'i gtsug lag klog cing 'don tu bcug ste/ yongs su sbyin par byed do// sems can gang sbyin par byed pa la myi mos pa ni/ nor rin
150b4(mdo): po che dang nor dbyig rnam pa sna tshogs gtong bar skul pas yongs su sbyin par byed do// sems can gang gtum pa gyi nges pa'i rang bzhin can la tshangs pa'i gnas pazhi slob du skul pa dang / sems can gang zhe sdang can brjod
150b5(mdo): pa slob par skul ba dang / sems can gang le lo can la ni brtson 'dakyus slob du skul ba dang / sems can gang sems g.yengs pa la ni bsam gtan sgom par skul ba dang / sems can gang 'chal pa'i shes
150b6(mdo): rab can la ni yang dag pa'i chos ston pas bka' lung brda sprod cing lung 'bog pa la thabs mazhes pas yongs su sbyin par byed do// sem sa can kang dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad cing myi gnas pa dang
150b7(mdo): gyi spyod pa can la ni dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang / dge bsnyen pa'i sdom pa bslab pa dang / dge bsnyen ma'i sdom pa bslab pas yongs su sbyin par byed do// gzhan yang bzo
150b8(mdo): dang sgyu rtsa la rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gnas la slob cing spyod du btsud pas yongs su sbyin par byed do// de la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i shin tu thabs mthus pa'i ye shes kyi rnam pa ni chu klung kang
150b9(mdo): ga'i bye ma snyed pas mang ngo // de ltar yi ge dang / gtsug lag dang / bzo dang sgyu rtsal gyi las thams cad la lhag pa'i spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes kyis mu stegs can dang / ston pa gzhan la zhugs
150'a1(mdo): pa thams cad 'dul ba de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten pa'i thabs mazhes pa'o// thabs mazhes pa 'di ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
150'a2(mdo): gnas pa'i rgyur gyur pa thabs mazhes pa spyod pa'i gnas su gyur da pa/ shin tu thabs mazhes pa lhun kyis grub pas rtog pa myed pa ldog pa myed pa'i chos su gyur da pa'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang
150'a3(mdo): ston pa mkhas pa la 'ang myi rten dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'ang myi ltos par 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas pa la nA ta byed na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'jig rten gyi thabs mazhes pas rmongs pa yin te/ ngan song du ltung
150'a4(mdo): bar 'gyur ro// de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pas ye shes la gzhol zhing gnas par yang myi nus la thams cad kyi bso/ da nams kyi zhing yang dag pa yang ma yin no// shin tu thabs mkhas
150'a5(mdo): pas sems can gyi dbang po dang / spyod pa'i khyad par yang myi shes/ la/ shi nad tu thabs mkhas pas la 'ang rmongs par gyur da pas nyan thos kyi theg pa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang / theg pa
150'a6(mdo): chen po'i snod ma yin pa dang / theg pa chen po'i dbang por ma sbyin ba dag la theg pa chen po'i ston pa dang / slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go gang theg pa chen po'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can
150'a7(mdo): la ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go// gang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyurd pa'i sems
150'a8(mdo): can la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos ston cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa la slob cing nan tan byed du bcug go// gang nyan thos kyi theg pa'i chos kyi snod du gyur pa'i sems can la ni 'azhor ba'i chos la bde ba dang dka'
150'a9(mdo): bar ston to/ 'azhor ba'i chos la skyo ba skyed par myi ston to// gzhan yA shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas/ sems can gang srog gcod pa la dka' ba nas/ de bzhin du log par lta bo'i b.radu/
150'b1(mdo): mos pa dag la ni shin tu zab pa theg pa chen po'i chos ston to// de la 'khor 'di nas shi 'phos nas pha rol tu skye zhing sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu rnam par sbyin pa myong ba la skyo zhing 'jigs pa dang / sdig pa myi dge
150'b2(mdo): ba'i chos spong ba myi stond to// gzhan yang shin tu thabs mkhas pa la rmongs pas sems can gang tshul khrims srung bar mos pa la ni sbyin pa spyod du 'jug go// sems can gang bzod pa sgom par mos pa la ni bzod pa
150'b3(mdo): spong ba ston cing / tshul khrims srung du bcug go// sems can gang brtson 'grus sgom par mos pa la ni/ brtson 'grus spong ba ston cing bzod pa spyod du 'jug go// sems can gang bsam gtan sgom par
150'b4(mdo): mos pa la ni/ bsam gtan spong ba ston cing / brtson 'a grus la nan tan byed du bcug go// sems can gang shes rab sgom par mos pa la ni/ shes rab spong ba ston cing bsam gtan sgom
150'b5(mdo): du bcug go/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi tha/ bas mkhas pa la rmos pas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du se// mas can la phan pa dang bde ba'i don byed myi nus ste/ sems
150'b6(mdo): can thams cad kyi sdig pa'i grogs por gyur to// thabs mthas pa 'di ni dmyigs pa dang bcas pa/ chags pa dang bcas pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten gyi thabs mkhas
150'b7(mdo): pa zhes bya'o// de ltar 'jig rten gyi thabs mazhes pa 'di ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ba yin te/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
150'b8(mdo): kyang myi bya ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing yang dag pa ma yin no// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shin tu thabs mkhas pa yin zhe na/ 'di
150'b9(mdo): lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag gi don btang ste/ gzhan gyi don lhur byed pas bzo dang sgyu rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par ston pas yongs su smyin par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
151a1(mdo): dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang pa dang ma la bsnyen bkur dang / mchod pa dang / nad pa dang phongs pa dang / nyam thag pa dang / mgon dang / skyabs myed pa dang /
151a2(mdo): dashin tu sdug bsngal rnam pa mang pos gzir ba la thabs kyis sgrol pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su smyin par byed de/ ci la mos pa dang dbang po dang sdod ji lta ba bzhin du sems can la
151a3(mdo): dam pa'i chos stond to// gzhan yang rim gyis nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa slob cing / nan tan byed par skul ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa ni theg pa chen po slob cing nan
151a4(mdo): tan byed par skul ba dang / gal te nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi the ga par dbang po ma sbyin pa la ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi chos kyis skyo ba ston cing 'khor bar skyo ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba tshol bar
151a5(mdo): skul lo// sems can gang srog gcod pa la mos pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du chags pa la ni dbang po dang rang bzhin du 'a/ khor bar 'khor ba'i chos stond pa dang / 'jig rten 'di
151a6(mdo): nas 'chi 'phos nas pha rold kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu myong ba bstan te sdig pa myi dge ba'i chos kyis 'jigs pa dang / skye ba ston to// kha cig la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan
151a7(mdo): ba'i dam pa'i chos ston to// kha cig la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos stond to// zha cig la ni bla na myed pa'i theg pa'i chos yang dag pa bstan te/ khad kyis slob tu 'jug go// sems can
151a8(mdo): gang sbyin pa la mos par gyur da pa rnams la ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mchog srung bar stond pa dang de bzhin du/ rgyas par sems can gang bsam gtan la mos par gyur da pa la ni zag pa myed pa/ 'phags
151a9(mdo): pa'i lam gyi mchog gis bsdus pa dang / shes rab bla na myed pa ston cing nan tan byed du bcug ste/ shind tu thabs mkhas pa 'di ni dmyigs pa byed pa dang / chags pa myed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems
151b1(mdo): dpa'i 'jig rten 'das 'das pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shin tu thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na
151b2(mdo): thog ma sems bskyed nas 'dod pa de lnga yongs su bsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shinang tu 'das shing / nyan thos dang rang
151b3(mdo): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don
151b4(mdo): de dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir// tshigs su bcad de bka' sra la pa shes rab nan tan rnam gnyis te/ 'jig rten bcas dang 'jig rten 'das/ chags pa de ni 'jig rten
151b5(mdo): bcas// chags myed de ni 'jig rten 'das// shi nang tu thab/ sa mkhas nan tan ni// khyad par rnam pa gnyis la gnas// dmyigs pa yod pa 'jig rten bcas// dmyigs myed de ni
151b6(mdo): 'jig rten 'das// gang zhig theg pa cig ston pa// de ni leg sa par chos ston myin// bdag kyang yongs su myi sbyin na// gzhan ki don tu ka la 'gyur// gcig tu myi dge sems can la/
151b7(mdo): theg pa gsum gyi chos ston na// de ni gti mug rmongs ma ste// byang chub chen po de ma yin// theg pa gsum la 'jug spro zhing // yang dag pa'i chos 'dod pa// 'khor bar spro ba'i chos ston na/ mkhas
151b8(mdo): pa'i rang bzhin de ma yin// tshe gcig blo 'as rab brtags te/ 'dod dang mos pa bzhin du stonang // 'di ni shi nang tu thabs mazhes pas// mkhas pa rnams kyis de la bsngags// sems can sdig
151b9(mdo): pa dag spyod kyang // theg pa gsum gyi snod 'gyur na// dbang po'i snod bzhin chos bstan te/ sdig pa kun las grol bar byed// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
151'a1(mdo): po byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam pa lnga yongs
151'a2(mdo): su bsal te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shi nad tu 'das nas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
151'a3(mdo): theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / srung ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa la rnam pa gnyis te
151'a4(mdo): chos la dbyigs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa'o// chos la dbyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams ra pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o// sems
151'a5(mdo): can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ byams pa chen po'i go cha zhe sa myi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang
151'a6(mdo): thun mong du gyur pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir// sems can la dmyin/ sa pa'i bzod pa la nan tan byed pa'o// nyan thos dang rang
151'a7(mdo): sangs rgyas ni bdag zhi ba dang bdag mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / bdag sgrib pa gsal ba dang / bdag gi kun nas nyon mongs pa bcad pa'i phyir sems can la dmyigs pa'i byams pas brtson 'grus la nan tan byed
151'a8(mdo): pa ma yin no// de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po zhes myi bya ste/ go cha chen po ma yin no// chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang thun mong ma yin gyi/
151'a9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'ba' shig gis nan tan byed nus par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don tu brtson 'grus
151'b1(mdo): kyi sbyor bas chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa 'di la nan tan byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad rab tu zhi ba'i yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs
151'b2(mdo): su gcad pa'i phyir shi nang tu 'bad pa'i brtson 'grus kyis chos la dmyigs pa'i nan tan byed do// de bas na byams pa 'di ni byams pa chen po'i ko cha chen po zhes bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos la
151'b3(mdo): dmyigs pa'i byams pa la nan tan byed pa ni phung po la myi gnas skye mched la myi gnas khams la myi gnas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la myi gnas pa nas/ byang chub kyi yan lag gi bar du myi gnas so//
151'b4(mdo): 'dod pa'i khams la gyi gnas/ gzugs kyi khams la gyi gan sa gzugs byed pa'i 'ams la myi gnas/ 'jig rten la dril gyi gnas/ 'jig rten pa rol ngal gyi gnas/
151'b5(mdo): rol gyi mu la myi gnas pha rol gyi mu la myi gnas/ myigs pa la myi gnas/ myi dmyigs pa la myi gnas te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' chos la dmyigs pa'i byams
151'b6(mdo): pa la nan tan byed pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi theg pa'i sa las shin tu 'das te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos la dmyigs pa'i byams pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i
151'b7(mdo): 'azhor lo zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang byams pa chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan
151'b8(mdo): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod
151'b9(mdo): pa dang bsrung ba bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir/ rigs su bcad de bka' stsa lad pa// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal ba/ sems
152a1(mdo): can dmyigs pa'i byams sgom pa// sems la bcu gsum skyon 'chang zhing // bdag la phan pa'i don phyir rtsol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen ni// sems can thams cad kun gyi phyir// thun mong
152a2(mdo): ma yin byams chen snyoms// bcu gsum sems kyi skyon rnams spangs// dri ma bcu gsum rab spangs nas// byang chub chen por gzhol bar byed// chos la dmyigs pa'i byams sgoms na// bsod nams zhing grub
152a3(mdo): ring ba myin// bcu gsum stobs la bder gnas na// sems can kun las shi nang tu 'phags// ji ltar seng ge'i rgyal po de// ri dgas kun las 'phags pa bzhin// bcu gsum dgra rnams shind tu btul/
152a4(mdo): rtag dang chad pa'i mthar 'dzin spangs// sems la jis kyang myi gos na// myur du byang chub chen po 'thob// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po'i go cha chen
152a5(mdo): po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kang / 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na thog ma sems bskyed na/ sa 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/ nyan thos
152a6(mdo): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa nyan tho sa dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nas kyi zhing chen por 'gyur zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod
152a7(mdo): pa dang / bsrung ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de ji ltar na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad ni bdag la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don kyi phyir snying rje la spyod kyi/ sems can la phan pa dang
152a8(mdo): bde ba'i don kyi phyir snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na bdag 'ba' shig la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ snying rje chen po bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can
152a9(mdo): thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don kyi phyir snying rje chen po skyed do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po go cha chen po'i 'khor lo dang ldan pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu
152b1(mdo): 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur
152b2(mdo): bya bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don gyi phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po rnam pa bzhis sems can yongs su sbyin par byed do// snying
152b3(mdo): rje chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don kyi phyir sbyin pas yongs su bsdu ba ni 'di lta ste/ rin po che dang nor dang / dbyig pa dang theg pa dang / bran dang las byed pa'i myi dang /
152b4(mdo): yul dang srid dang bu dang chung ma dang / lus dang srog gi bar du yo ngas su gtong ba la ser sna myed do// myi dmyigs pa'i spyod pa la sbyor bas 'dul ba'i sems can yod par myi mthong / sbyin
152b5(mdo): pa byed par myi mthong len par myi mthong / nor gi dngos po ra myi mthong / sbyin pa spyod par myi mthong / sbyin pa byas pa'i 'bras bu myi mthong ba nas/ myi dmyigs pa'i bar
152b6(mdo): du yang myi mthong ste/ de lta bu'i snying rje chen po skyed do// sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don gyi phyir/ ga snyan pa dang / don bsgrub pa dang / don mthun pas
152b7(mdo): ci dang cis 'dul ba bzhin du myi dmyigs pa yang myi mthong ba'i bar du de dang des sangs rgyas par ston cing 'chang ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu mchog dam pa'i sems dang /
152b8(mdo): rab tu zhi ba'i sems dang / tshad myed pa'i sems dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad la mngon par 'du myi byed pa'i sems kyis gang nas gang du skyes kyang g.yo ba myed pa
152b9(mdo): dang / myi gnas pa'i snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'dis snod du gyu rang ba'i sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par byed pa la skye ba myed do// de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i 'khor lo
152'a1(mdo): zhes bya ste/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kang snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na
152'a2(mdo): thog ma sems bskyed nas/ 'dod pa lnga yongs su bsald te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das shing nyan thos dang / rang sangs
152'a3(mdo): rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing du 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
152'a4(mdo): don 'di dag gsal bar bzlas pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsa lad pa shi nad tu zab mo dam pa'i chos dag snying rje chen po'i gzhir ni de 'gyur// shi nad tu dpag dka' nam mkha' 'dra ste//
152'a5(mdo): gnas pa myed de gzugs kyang myed do// byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus chen po// yon tan chen po dang mi ldan te/ rgya la ba'i ye shes snying rje chen pos// dpa' bo 'jig rten
152'a6(mdo): 'da' bar nges 'gyur/ mgon dang skyabs kyad sems can dag na// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnyog pas bcings pa// snying rje chen po'i chu yis bkrus te// sems can rnam par grol
152'a7(mdo): bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje skyed pa// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skyems par byed do// nyan thos theg pa'i 'khor rnams dang ni// rang rgyal theg pa spyod pas ma yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
152'a8(mdo): sems can// ngan song dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba// snying rje chen po'i chu'i sa bkrus te/ sdug bsngal kun las grol bar byed do// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so
152'a9(mdo): so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa shin tu rgya chen po dang ldan pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang /
152'b1(mdo): shin tu brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po/ go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'khor lo 'di dang ldan mthog ma sems bskyed pa nas/ 'dod pa rnam lnga yongs su bsal te/
152'b2(mdo): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing chen por 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa thams cad kyis
152'b3(mdo): mchod pa dang / bsrung ba dang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa tshad myed pa
152'b4(mdo): mtha' yas pa shi nang tu rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi tshe sa thams cad ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shi nang tu brtan pa chen po'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo zhe na/
152'b5(mdo): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos thams cad la shi nad tu rtog pa ni/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od kyis nam mkha' kun tu khyab pa bzhin du sems mnyam par gyur
152'b6(mdo): pa/ mtshan ma myed pa rten myed pa myi gnas pa gos pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa myed pa/ mying dang gzugs dang
152'b7(mdo): myig gi rnam par shes pa dang / myig gi 'dus te reg pa la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba/ sems kyi spyod pa myed pa las myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyend kyis nang gi tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste/
152'b8(mdo): bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin par tshol ba la sems rab tu zhi zhing chags pa myed do// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sma dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /
152'b9(mdo): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna dang dri dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce dang ro dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus dang reg bya dang / lus
153a1(mdo): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar du gzhung de bzhin du rgyas par sems pa dang
153a2(mdo): yid kyi rnam par shes pa thams cad rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa myed do// sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba rnam gsum ste/ bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / bde ba yang
153a3(mdo): ma yin/ sdug bsngal yang ma yin par tshor ba la sems rtag tu zhi zhing chags pa myed do// dus gsum gyi phung po dang / khams dang skye mched rnams kyis rnam pa thams cad la len pa myed pa
153a4(mdo): sems kyi spyod pa myed pa'o// gang ji snyed khams gsum dang 'du byed gsum dang / reg bya gsum dang / tshor ba gsum dang / dbang po gsum dang / theg pa gsum dang / sdom pa gsum
153a5(mdo): dang / rnam par grol ba gsum dang / rnam pa de dag tha/ mas cad la sems rab tu zhi ba gnas myed pa mtshan ma myed pa// / len pa myed pas mnyam pa nyid du gnas so// gang
153a6(mdo): ji snyed sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / pha ro/ lang tu phyind pa thams cad la sems kyi spyod pa myed par rab
153a7(mdo): tu zhi bar gnas so// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
153a8(mdo): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang sems kyis spyod pa myed par rab tu zhi bar gnas so// kang ji snyed mthar kyis snyoms par 'jug pa dku la yang sems kyis spyod pa myed par rab tu
153a9(mdo): zhi bar gnas so// gzhan yang mngon par 'du byed pa gsum dang / chos la sgrib pa myed pa'i ye shes dang / lam gyi yan lag dang / lam gyi yan lag 'dren par byed pa dag la yang len pa myed pa
153b1(mdo): sems kyis spyod pa myed pa kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma yin pa dang / nye bar lend pa dang bcas pa dang / nye bar len pa myed pa dang / zag
153b2(mdo): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa myed pa myed pa dang / tshu rol gyi mu dang / pha rol gyi mu dang / chung ngu dang / chen po dang / tshad myed pa dang / byed pa dang / myi byed pa dang / dge ba dang myi dge ba dang
153b3(mdo): lung du myi ston pa thams cad kyi rnam pa la byed pa dang / sems kyi spyod pa byed par rab tu zhi bar gnas so// gang ji snyed byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / thabs mkhas mas sems can sbyin par
153b4(mdo): byed pa nas bsrung bar bya ba myed pa gsum dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du chos thams cad kyi rnam pa len pa myed pa sems kyi spyod pa
153b5(mdo): myed pa rab tu zhi bar gnas so// byang chub sems dpa' sem sa dpa' chen po dag 'khor lo 'di'i dbang gis tshor ba rnam gsum gyi nyes pa yongs su bsal ba dang / rnam par rtog pa
153b6(mdo): thams cad yongs su zhi ba dang / mtshan ma'i chos thams cad yongs su spong bar 'gyur ro// gzhan yang ji snyed nam mkha' myig dang spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin darnams dang / gzungs
153b7(mdo): rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'dren par 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor lo de la gnas pas gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro
153b8(mdo): mnar myed pa dang / gzhan srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su bsal te/ rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu myi myong bar byed do// gzhan
153b9(mdo): yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ mun pa nag pos nam mtha' thams cad yog pa na nyi ma shar pa'i tshe/ mun pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang tshig so so yang dag par
153'a1(mdo): rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa yangs shi nad tu rgya chen po dang ldan pas/ ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs
153'a2(mdo): rnams dang / shi nad tu rten pa'i bzod pa go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang nam mkha'i myig dang spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa go tsa chen
153'a3(mdo): po'i 'khor lo la gnas pasadapag tu myed pa nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes kyi nyi mas phyin ci log bzhi'i mun pa yongs su bsal te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdug pa myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te
153'a4(mdo): ngan 'gro myod pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus pa ra yongs su bsal te/ rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu myong
153'a5(mdo): bar myi byed do// gzhan yang de'i dbang gis sangs rgya sa kyi chos rnams la dbang thob pa dang phyir myi ldog par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du myi 'gro zhing rjes su myi spyod pa
153'a6(mdo): dang rtag tu sangs rgyas mthong ba dang myi 'bral ba dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos kyi nye gnas mthong ba rang myi 'bral ba dang / chos thos pa dang / kyi
153'a7(mdo): 'bral ba dang / dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / myi 'bral ba dang / yon tan thams cad la sems myi ngoms pa nas/ byang chub kyi bar du rgyun myi 'chad de/ rtag tu sangs
153'a8(mdo): rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / myi 'bral ba ni chung ngu na rmyi lam du yang chad pa myed par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig so so yang dag par rig pas
153'a9(mdo): nam mkha'i dbyings dang / mnyam pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams
153'b1(mdo): dang shi nad tu bstan pa'i bzod pa'i 'khor lo 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan dang po nas bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar d+ha/ snyoms
153'b2(mdo): par 'jug pa dang / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched nas/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched kyi bar du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug ste/ ting
153'b3(mdo): nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed rnam gsum po yongs su gcad de/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang / gso ba'i sems kyi spyod pa myed pa tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / sems
153'b4(mdo): dpa' dang / reg pa dang / yid la byed pa la sogs pa kun gcod par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas zhan/ gcig kam zhag bdun bdun gi bar du bsam gtan gyi
153'b5(mdo): zas za bar 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs na yang sems rab tu zhi ba len pa myed cing lhan ner gnas par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang don dam pa'i mtha' gtugs
153'b6(mdo): pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog go// ting nge 'dzin de la gnas na sems rab tu mnyam khas na/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa myed pa dang / lus kyi ba spu'i
153'b7(mdo): bu ga kun nas zil dar gyi thigs pas skar ma snang ba lta bu mngon par byung bas/ kun nas nyon mongs pas bcings pa'i yongs su gdung ba thams cad seld par 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin de las langs
153'b8(mdo): nas yang dag pa'i dran pa thob ste/ dka' ba khyad par can gyis lus la khyab par gyur pa ni ji ltar lha'i sras po dbang phyug chen po bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad las 'jug pa nas
153'b9(mdo): lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu kun nas rab tu bde ba myong ba bzhin/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de lus la bde bar reg pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pas
154a1(mdo): sangs rgyas mthong ba las mtshan maka'an mthong ba byed do// byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe sangs rgyas gcig yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas gcig mthong ngo // gal te sangs
154a2(mdo): rgyas mang po yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas mang po mthong ngo // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chung bar yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku chung ngu mthong ngo // kal te sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por yid la
154a3(mdo): byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku chen por mthong // gal te sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad myed par yid la byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sku tshad myed par mthong ngo // gal te bdag gi lus sangs rgyas kyi
154a4(mdo): sku'i mtshan dang ldan par yid la byas na/ bdag lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mtho ngango // gal te gzhan gi lus sangs rgyas kyi
154a5(mdo): skur yid la byas nas/ gzhan ki lus sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / 'dra bar phun sum tshogs par mtho / ngo // gal te sems can dang / sems
154a6(mdo): can ma yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang / ldan par yid la byas na sems can dang / sems can ma
154a7(mdo): yin pa dang / ji snyed gzugs su gtogs pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar mtshan phun sum tshogs par mthong gi gzugs gzhan du myi mthong ngo // byang chub sems
154a8(mdo): dpas de'i tshe yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad ni sgyu ma dang / 'dra ba ste/ yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis tshor ba rnam gsum dang / 'du byed
154a9(mdo): gsum la sogs pa chos thams cad lhag ma ma lus par yongs su gcad do// snyam nas 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// ting nge 'dzin de la gnas
154b1(mdo): nas blo sngon du btang bzhin du/ thams cad yongs su bcad de/ ting nge 'dzind kyi ro'i zas kyis tshor ro// gal te na zhag bdun nam zhag bdun gnyis sam/ bdun gsum
154b2(mdo): 'am bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug kam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ gal te bskal pa 'am/ tshad myed pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du ci nus su gnas te/ ting nge
154b3(mdo): 'dzind de las langs nas/ sems rab tu zhi bas ci la yang myi gnas te/ bde bar gnas so// gal te don dam pa'i mtha' gtugs pa'i ting nge 'dzinang du zhugs na yang / sngar
154b4(mdo): ji skad bshad pa'i de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan dang / ldan pa yid la bya ba nas/ chos thams cad dang / gzugs thams cad sgyu ma dang 'dra ste/ yang dag pa
154b5(mdo): ma yin pa'i bar du chud par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'od ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshig so// so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang /
154b6(mdo): mnyam pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang / ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de ting nge 'dzind thams cad dang gzugs thams cad dang / shinang tu brtan pa'i bzod
154b7(mdo): pa chen po'i go cha chen po la 'khor lo zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor lo 'di dang ldan na/ nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la
154b8(mdo): shin tu thabs mkhas pa thams cad lhag ma ma lus pas spangs te/ rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu len par myi byed do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes 'jigs pa byung du nye ba na nyi ma lnga cig car shar te/
155a1(mdo): 'jig rten gyi khams na rdzing chen po dang / 'bab chu dang / 'bab chu chen po dang / mtsho dang mtsho chen po'i chu rnams lhag ma ma lus par thams cad skyems par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
155a2(mdo): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa/ tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa/ yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shin tu
155a3(mdo): brtan pa'i bzod pa chen po/ go ca chen po'i 'khor lo yang mngon par 'dren to// gzhan yang nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang gnas
155a4(mdo): shing 'dren par 'gyur ro// gang 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i lhag mas gnyer te/ ngan 'gro mnar myed pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang / 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las thams cad lhag ma ma lus
155a5(mdo): par yongs su skams te/ rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu myi len par bye/ da do// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten du chu yis la jigs pa byung ba na stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di
155a6(mdo): ni khams chu ngu'i gling chen po bzhi dang / gling bran brgyad khri dang / ri rab ri'i rgyal po dang / ri bran thams cad chu yis dkrugs te/ zheg nas lhag ma ma lus par zad par 'gyur ro// de bzhir byang chub sems dpa' yang /
155a7(mdo): tshig so so yang dag par rig pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa tshad myed pa mtha' yas pa yangs shing rgya che ba dang ldan pa ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad de/ ting nge 'dzind rnams dang / gzungs rnams dang / shi nad tu brtan pa'i/
155a8(mdo): bzod pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo yang 'grub cing 'dren par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i myig dang / spyi bo'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs rnams la thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la gnas shing 'dren par 'gyur
155a9(mdo): bas/ 'das pa'i dus kyi sdig pa myi dge ba'i las kyi lhag mas gnyer te ngan 'gro mnar myed pa dang / gzhan yang srid pa dang 'gro ba rnams su 'khor bar 'khor ba'i las mkhas pa'i go cha chen po'i 'khor lo la yang gnas par
