175a4(mdo): mdzad do// sems nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems yongs su sbyong ba mdzad pas yongs su dag pa dang / de dag gi sems dri ma myed par gyur to// de'i phyir sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
175a5(mdo): nyi ma shar nas ye shes kyi 'od gzer gyis tshim par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa la mngon sum du 'gyu/ ra te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi nas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan
175a6(mdo): lag brgyad pa'i bar la gnas par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la gnas par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad snying rje nyid la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ro// de dag las
175a7(mdo): kyang 'jig rten du dgra bcom pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
175a8(mdo): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems nam mtha' myig la gnas sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// ci myig gi rnam par shes pa la
175a9(mdo): gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// ci myig gis kun tu reg pa la gnas sam/ bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// gang yang nang du myig gis kun tu reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam
175b1(mdo): mkha' gnas sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de bzhin du rna pa dang sna dang sde dang lus la brjod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha' yid la gnas pa nas yid kyis kun
175b2(mdo): ta reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba gsum 'byung ba de la nam mkha'i gnas sam gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems sems can nam mkha' la gnas sam/ gsol pa bcom
175b3(mdo): ldan 'das de ma lags so// rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems nam mkha' sems can la gnas sam// gsold pa bcom ldan 'das de ma lags so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub ses
175b4(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol bad to// bcom ldan 'das gcig la gcig myi rten to// gcig la gA cig spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni
175b5(mdo): rtog pa ma mchis pa/ stong pa nyid de spro ma btags pa yang dag pa 'i mtha'/ de bzhin nyid du rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' ni 'di lta ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid tha myi dpapa
175b6(mdo): myi rtog pa rnam par myi rtog pa myi g.yo ba gsob lags te myu gu ma mchis pa/ sa bon ma mchis pa 'bras bu ma mchis pa/ rnam par smyin pa ma mchis pa/ yi ge ma mchis pa/ rlom sems
175b7(mdo): ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad la de ltar rtogs na myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das
175b8(mdo): bya ba ra dza ma na taka kA ya 'dzi na dza ya dza na ni/ ma mu ni/ ha ra/ a na ya pha la/ mgu na kar b+ha/ ni ya ma su byi na ya/ bu ba sha/ sha ta shA ba/ sha ma sha na/ ta tha ka ma sha mar gu mA tu Sha Sha/
175b9(mdo): sha sa tse ta na ya k+She shAn ta/ sa pa sho sha ne swa hA/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ myig las rgyal bar byed pa/ seng ge'i 'gros kyi phyir bsgyings
176a1(mdo): pa'i gzungs 'dis sems can dag 'chi ba'i tshe/ tha ma'i rnam par shes pa la nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa yod pa sprugs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag
176a2(mdo): bar gtor nus so// khyod ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu myed grangs myed par 'gro ba dang / sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i dbang gis grong dang grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i
176a3(mdo): pho brang du gzugs dang cha lugs dang spyod lam sna tshogs kyis theg pa chen po'i mdo sna tshogs dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba dang / rgyal rigs gdol pa nas dge sbyong gdol pa'i bar du sdig pa'i chos las spang ba dang
176a4(mdo): thams cad dge ba'i chos la gzhag par nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha dang myi'i skye dgu dpag tu myed grangs myed pa dag gis/ ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang bzod pa sna tshogs
176a5(mdo): thob par gyur da to// gzhan dag kyang sa bcu la ye shes skyes/ par gyur da to// srog chags khri ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur da to// sems can rnams kyi rtsod pa gang / ni'ang rung ste
176a6(mdo): de dag gis// gzhi rtsa spangs ma ste kun gyi// gzhi rtsir mya ra du 'gyur ba yin// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lang nas/ dge slong de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang / lnga
176a7(mdo): dang myi dang / snga ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par stod do// 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'o//
176a8(mdo): rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar gi mkhan po shag kya phra ba dang / ban de rang na kA ta sa zhus cing bsgyur da te gtan la phab pa//
176a9(mdo): rgya gar skad du/ a r+ya man du kr-i pri kri di ti/ na ma ma ga yan su tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jas dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
176b1(mdo): dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ril// dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'
176b2(mdo): brgyad stong dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe rgyal po zhab kyi grong khyer chen po na/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba/ gzugs bzang zhing mdzes la/ blta na sdug pa/ kha dog bzang po rgyas
176b3(mdo): pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig 'dug ste/ bu mo de yang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyus lus kyi mdog gser gi kha dog lta bur mngon par grub par gyur da cing / sa'i phyogs gang dag tu bgreng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / 'gro ba'i sa
176b4(mdo): phyogs de dag kyang / gser gi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis snang bar gyu da te// des gos dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ gang dag gyon par gyur pa'i gos de dag thams cad kyang / gser gi kha dog lta bu nyid
176b5(mdo): du kun tu snang ngo // bu mo de yang skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la dga' zhing yid gcugs pa dang / lta bas myi ngoms shing bka' blo/ bde la nges pa dang 'jam pa dang / snyan pa dang dga' bar smra zhing
176b6(mdo): bzhin 'dzum pa dang / shin tu 'thun par 'dzin pa dang / khro ga nyer myed pa dang / myi rtsub pa dang / myi brlang bar gyur da pas/ rgyal po zhab kyi grong khyer chen po de na/ rgyal bu gzho nu rnams dang / blon
176b7(mdo): po 'bu gzho nu rnams dang / tshong dpon gyi bu gzho nu rnams dang / khyim bdag gi bu kang ji snyed pa de dag kyang de la shin tu chags shing yid 'brang bar gyur te/ lta bas chog myi shes so// smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo
176b8(mdo): gser mchog 'od dpal de skyed mos tshal lam 'bab chu 'am/ rdzing bu 'am khyim 'am lam po che 'am/ grong bar ram/ gang gang du 'gro ba de dang / de dag tu skyes pa dang / bud myed dang / khye'u dang / bu mo mang po rnams
176b9(mdo): dang / shin tu ltad mor gyur nas/ kun 'dus te de'i phyir bzhin 'brang zhing 'gro'o// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de/ tshong dpon gi bu 'jigs byin zhes bya ba nor gyis glas te/ skyed mos tshal
177a1(mdo): gyi sar dbyung nas/ rta bzhi dang ldan pa'i shing rta dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dur+ya dang / gser gyis legs par brgyan pa gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sbreng zhing / me tog dang / gdug pa dang /
177a2(mdo): spos dang / phye ma dang / me tog 'phreng gis mdzes par byas pa/ me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng bas/ skar khung byas pa'i nang du/ stan bzang po bshams pa la 'dug nas/ 'di ltar rtse zhing dga' ba'i bsam bas
177a3(mdo): shing rta de'i mdun du ni sil snyan dang / beg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs len pa dag gis drangs/ shing rta de'i phyi bzhin du ni nye bar spyad pa dang / yongs su spyad par thogs pa thams cad rjes su 'brang la/ skye bo 'tshogs chen po
177a4(mdo): ltad mo lta ba'i bsam pa can dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur zhing / skyed mos tshal gyi sar song ngo // de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa/ nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ sems can thams cad la snying rje chen
177a5(mdo): po skyed nas 'di ji snyam du sems te/ su zhig rdzu 'phrul gi cho 'phrul lam/ kun brjod pa'i cho 'phrul lam/ rjes su bstand pa'i cho 'phrul gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can gang sa chen po 'di la
177a6(mdo): yongs su sbyin par bya snyam pa dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'jig sa sbyin dang / lhan cig du shing rta la zhon te/ skyed mos tshal gyi sar
177a7(mdo): 'gro ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang gdul ba'i phyir de'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi bye brag la rnam par ltas na/ de sngon gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan zhing / chos kun shes par bya ba'i nus pa dang / mthu dang /
177a8(mdo): skal ba yod par rig nas/ de nas de'i tshe/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du bya ste/ ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par byas pas/ 'di ltar rang gi lus
177a9(mdo): bstan ma thag tu/ nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od kyang pi ying du brlag par byed na/ sems can gzhan dag gis lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bur rang gi lus mngon par sprul nas/ kos gang gi 'od kyis dpag tshad gcig tsam
177b1(mdo): gi 'khor yug snang bar byed pa'i gos de lta bu yang lus la gyon par kun tu bstan to// rang gi lus rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa yang stond to// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ lus la gos dang / rgyan
177b2(mdo): thams cad kyis legs par brgyan nas/ lam gang nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal yod pa'i lam de'i mdun logs su bsdud do// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ de'i bsdad ma thag tu de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
177b3(mdo): de'i shing rta yang mog mog por 'gyur/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyi lus thams cad kyang mog mog por gyur to// 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi drung du/ sAg tsa'i yug bzhag na/ lam
177b4(mdo): mer myi 'dug/ lgang nger myi 'jug go// de bzhin du 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i lus kyi 'od kyis/ reg pa dang / bu mo de'i lus kyang lham mer myi 'dug/ wAn ner myi 'dug/ lgang nger myi 'dug go// smad 'tshong ma'i
177b5(mdo): bu mo 'od dpal gyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa lha'i bu gzhonu ltar 'dug la lus la brgyan gyis rgyan cing / gsal ba'i gos leg/ sa par gyon de lus kyang 'od 'byung bar mthong ste/ mthong ma thag
177b6(mdo): tu de'i bdag gi lus la brnyas pa'i 'du shes dang / dman pa'i 'du shes skyes shing gos de la yang mngon par 'dod pa dang / gzung ba'i 'du shes skyes nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ tshong dpon gi bu 'dis chog
177b7(mdo): gis/ bdag shing rta 'od las babs la/ 'di dang lhan gcig tu dga' ba dang rtse ba dang / dga' mgur spyad la/ gos 'di yang bslang bar bya'o snyam mo// bu mo des de lta bu'i sems skyed ma thag tu/ de nas 'jam dpal gzho
177b8(mdo): nur gyur pa'i byon kyis rlabs kyis/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bdag nyid myi'i gzugs su mngon par sprul nas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod skyes bu dam pa 'di la kun tu chags pa'i sems ma
177b9(mdo): skyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di'i 'dod pa'i don tu gnyer ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa/ 'odi su zhig yin 'di'i mying ni/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ste/ 'jam dpal
178a1(mdo): gzho nur gyur da pa zhes bya'o// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ de ci lba 'am/ 'on te klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ myi 'am/
178a2(mdo): ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ rgya byin nam/ tshangs pa'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po chen po 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ci zhig yin/ rnam thos kyi bus smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' zhes
178a3(mdo): bya ba de ni/ lha yang ma yin klu yang ma yin/ gnod sbyin yang ma yin/ dri za yang ma yin/ lha ma yin yang ma yin/ nam mkha' lding yang ma yin/ myi 'am ci yang ma yin/ lto 'phye chen po yang ma yin/ brgya byin yang ma yin/
178a4(mdo): tshangs pa yang ma yin/ 'jig rten skyong ba snga ma yin/ rgyal po chen po yang ma yin te/ bu mo de ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa kun yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//
178a5(mdo): 'di ni bslangs pa thams cad sbyin par byed de/ yongasasu myi gtong ba/ ci yang myed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de na/ sa bu mo de 'di snyam du sems te/ de skad grags pa las ni 'dis
178a6(mdo): bdag la gos 'di sbyin par 'gyur ma monas de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal/ shang rta de las babs nas/ 'jam dang la gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gang
178a7(mdo): khyod kyi sku la gsol ba'i nam bza' 'di bdag la stsal du gsol// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di yang smras so// gal te khyod ni byang chub la yang zhugs gyur na// 'jam dbyangs na bza' 'odi ni bdag la stsal du gsol/
178a8(mdo): ser sna can gyi byang chub sems dpa' myi mdzes te/ dper na chab dang bral zhing skams pa'i klu dang mtshungs// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gal te bu mo khyod ni byang chub zhugs gyur na/ kho bos de ring gos 'ang khyod
178a9(mdo): la sbyin par bya gang dag g.yo ba myed par byang chub sems la gnas// de dag 'din lhar bcas 'jig rten mchod 'os yin// bu mos smras pa/ byang chub ces bgyi tshig gi don ni gang zhig lags// de ni gang la 'thob
178b1(mdo): cing su zhig rtsol bar bgyid// tshogs rnams gang dag la ni nges par sten bgyin// mkhas pa ma lags ma rtogs rnams kyis rtog par 'gyur// 'jam dpal gis smras pa// sring mo brjod pa myed pa dang // yi ge myed pa dang /
178b2(mdo): phung po dang khams dang / skye mched dag las rnam par grol ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma dag dang bral ba dang / nyon mongs pa myed pa dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar zhi ba ni/ byang chub ces bya'o// de skad ces
178b3(mdo): smras nas/ yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// sring mo khyod byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / ngas khyod la gos 'di sbyin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub ces bgyi ba de gang lag
178b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ sring mo khyod nyid byang chub yin no// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ma 'tshal na/ ji ltar bdag byang chub lags// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ sring mo
178b5(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba zhig bzhugs pa de 'di skad du/ 'di ltar lus mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang
178b6(mdo): chub mnyam pa nyid kyis lus mnyam pa nyid do// zhes chos ston te// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ khyod kyi lus 'di
178b7(mdo): la phung po dang khams dang / skye mched mngon par grub pa yod dam/ de nas bu mo de snyan pa 'di thos nas de sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bo'i rgyu mthun pas/ chos la snang ba skyes par gyur te/ des snang ba thob nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur
178b8(mdo): gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpa' de ni de lta lags so// bdag gi lus 'di la phung po khams dang / skye mched dag mngon par grub lags// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo 'di ji snyam du sems
178b9(mdo): gzugs la sems pa'am rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang myi sems shing / rnam par shes pa myed de/ sring mo de'i phyir
179a1(mdo): gzugs mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis// gzugs mnyam pa nyid do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// srid
179a2(mdo): mo 'di ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la sems pa'am/ rnam par shes pa yod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mchis so// 'jam dpal
179a3(mdo): gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang myi sems shing rnam par shes pa myed de/ sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa
179a4(mdo): mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang gzugs nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga myed par ram/ gzugs 'di sngon po 'am/ ser
179a5(mdo): po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ le ba rgan nam/ shel dang gdul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes stan par nus sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam
179a6(mdo): dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga myed par ram/ byang chub de sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am
179a7(mdo): leb rgan nam/ shel lam/ dngul gyi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes stan par myi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir gzugs mnyam pa'i nyid kyis byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam
179a8(mdo): ba nyid kyis gzugs mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// srang mo de bzhin du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang ngam/
179a9(mdo): phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga myed par ram/ rnam par shes pa 'di/ sngon po 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel lam/ dngul gi kha dog gam/ yul na gnas pa 'am/
179b1(mdo): phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par nus sam// du mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub kyang nang ngam/ phyi rol lam/ gnyi ga myed pa'am/ byang chub de sngon
179b2(mdo): bo 'am/ ser po 'am/ dmar po 'am/ dkar po 'am/ leb rgan nam/ shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog kam/ yul na gnas pa dang / phyogs na gnas pa zhes bstan par myi nus te/ sring mo de'i phyir rnam par shes pa
179b3(mdo): mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa mnyam pa nyid de// sring mo de'i phyir ras khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang
179b4(mdo): phung po lnga ni sgyu ma stu bu ste/ yod ma yin te/ byin ci log las skyes shing yod pa ma yin pa/ byin ci log gis tha snyad btags pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yod pa ma yin pa/ phyin ci log gis tha
179b5(mdo): snyad btags pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis// sgyu ma ma/ nyam pa nyid do// sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa
179b6(mdo): nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ sgyu ma mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni rmyi lam lta bu ste/
179b7(mdo): shin tu mngon par grub pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang rmyi lam gi rang bzhin yin pas/ shin tu mngon par grub pa ste/ sring mo de'i phyir rmyi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis
179b8(mdo): rgya lam mnyam po nyid do// rmyi lam mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis// rmyi lam mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes
179b9(mdo): spras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni myig rgyu lta bu ste/ 'khrul pa'i las kyis bskyed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang smyig rgyu'i rang bzhin te/ las kyi rnam par sbyin pa myed pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir/ smyig rgyu
180a1(mdo): mnyam pa nyid phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis// smyig rgyu mnyam pa nyid do// smig rgyu mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ smyig rgyu mnyam pa/
180a2(mdo): nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni gzugs gnyen lta bu ste/ 'pho ba myed pa'o// sring mo byang chub kyang gzugs brnyan gyi rang bzhin te/ 'pho
180a3(mdo): ba myed pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis/ phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis// gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid do// gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chub mnyam pa
180a4(mdo): nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis/ gzugs brnyan mnyam pa nyid de// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po lnga ni mying tsam ste/ mying de yang g.yo ba
180a5(mdo): myed po'o// sring mo byang chub kyang mying tsam ste/ mying de yang g.yo de ba myed pa'o// sring mo de'i phyir g.yo ba myed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis phung po mnyam pa nyid do// phung po mnyam pa nyid kyis/ g.yo ba myed
180a6(mdo): pa mnyam pa nyid do// g.yo ba myed pa mnyam pa nyid kyis/ byang chubab mnyam pa nyid do// byang chub mnyam pa nyid kyis// g.yo ba myed/ pa mnyam pa nyid de/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad ces
180a7(mdo): khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams yo byed pa po myed de/ ma byas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la ngo bo nyid myong ngo // ngo bo nyid myed pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'byung ba/
180a8(mdo): myed de/ ma byung ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la rtag pa nyid myed de/ myi rtag pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la bde ba nyid myed de// sdug bsngal ba'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la sdug pa myed de/
180a9(mdo): myi stug po'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la bdag myed de/ bdag myed pa'i don ni byang chub bo// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams la/ mngon par grub pa myed de/ mngon par ma grub pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po
180b1(mdo): rnams ni dben pa ste/ dben pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzung ba myed de// gzung ba myed pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la gzhi myed do// gzhi myed pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams la 'ong ba dang /
180b2(mdo): 'gro ba myed de/ 'ong ba dang 'gro ba myed pa'i don ni byang chub bo// phung po rnams ni da ltar byung ba la myi gnas pa ste/ da ltar byung ba la myi gnas pa'i don ni byang chub bo// sring mo gzhan yang phung po rnams ni/ 'phags pa rnams kyi
180b3(mdo): tha snyad yin pas/ byang chub kyang 'phags pa rnams kyi tha snyad do// phung po rnams ni tha snyad myed pa'i rang bzhin can ste/ byang chub kyang tha snyad myed pa'o// phung po lnga ni rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su
180b4(mdo): chud pa'i chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ste/ de ni byang chub ces bya'o// sring mo de ltar na phung po lnga'i rang bzhin ni byang chub kyi rang bzhin no// bya chub kyi rang bzhin ni chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te/ sring mo phung po snga'i
180b5(mdo): rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni// sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin te/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan
180b6(mdo): yang phung po rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid byang chub yin te/ phung po ma rto/ gas par rtogs pa yang myed la/ byang chub ma rtogs par rtogs pa yang myed pas/ de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo
180b7(mdo): de'i phyir ngas khyod la/ 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/ ji ltar sems can thams cad byang chub tu gtogs pa ltar/ de gtogs pa myed par bstan pa na/
180b8(mdo): byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub pa zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang khyod kyi lus 'di la/ sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / khams bzhi
180b9(mdo): bo dag mngon par grub pa de la sring mo sa'i khams ni bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/
181a1(mdo): skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / mye'i khams dang / rlung gi khams kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// byang chub kyang /
181a2(mdo): bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin no// shin tu nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ sa'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu myed pa'i phyir/ chu'i khams dang byang
181a3(mdo): chub mnyam mo// shin tu myi g.yo ba'i phyir/ mye'i khams dang byang chub mnyam mo// shin tu bstan tu myed pa'i phyir/ rlung gi khams dang / byang chub mnyam mo// sring mo sa'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin
181a4(mdo): gshegs pas mkhyend te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo chu'i khams gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo mye'i zhes
181a5(mdo): gang yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ ma/ don par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo rlung gi khams gang / yin pa'i khams de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ mngon pa
181a6(mdo): rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sring mo sa'i rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / mye'i zhams dang / rlung gi zham sa rtogs pa ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la/ 'di skad
181a7(mdo): du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo sa'i khams kyis chu'i khams yang dag par myi shes so// chu'i khams kyis mye'i khams yang dag par myi shes so// mye'i khams kyis rlung gi khams yang dag par myi shes so//
181a8(mdo): sring mo de ltar na khams kyi mying yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub ces bya ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang gang khyod kyi lus 'di la myig mngon par grub
181a9(mdo): pa dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mngon par grub pa de la/ sring mo myig ni stong pa ste/ myig stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// rna bo na stong pa ste/ rna ba stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni
181b1(mdo): byang chub bo// snga ni stong pa ste/ snga stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sre ni stong pa ste/ sre stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// lus ni song pa ste/ lus stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// yid stong pa ste/ yid stong
181b2(mdo): pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// sring mo de'i phyir/ ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang myig stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs su 'dogs par myi byed de/ gzugs stong pa'i
181b3(mdo): gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid ni byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / sus dang / yid stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos su 'dogs par myi byed de/ chos stong pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid byang chub ste/ srang mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'ang
181b4(mdo): skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// srang mo myig ni gzugs myi len te// byang chub kyang gzugs myi len to// rna ba ni smra myi len to// byang chub kyang sgra myi len to// sna ni dri myi len to// byang chub kyang dri myi len to// lce
181b5(mdo): ni ro myi len te/ byang chub kyang ro mya len to// lus ni reg bya myi len to// byang chub kyang reg bya myi len to// yid ni chos myi len te/ byang chub kyang chos myi len to// sring mo de ci'i phyir zhe na/ myig gzug
181b6(mdo): dang bral ba ni byang chub bo// yid chos dang bral ba'i bar du yang byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de ltar na myig gi rnam par shes pa'i/ khams gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi khams dang / mtshams sbyor
181b7(mdo): ba myed de/ myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ sgra'i khams dang / mtshams sbyor ba myed de/ rna ba'i rnam par
181b8(mdo): shes pa'i khams dang / sgra'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ rol zhams dang mtshams sbyor ba myed de/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / ro'i khams su thal
181b9(mdo): ba ni byang chub bo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ reg bya'i khams dang mtshams sbyor ba myed de/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / reg bya'i khams su bral ba ni byang chub bo// yid kyi ni
182a1(mdo): par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa de ni/ chos kyi khams dang mtshams sbyor ba myed de/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi khams su bral ba ni byang chub ste/ sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad/
182a2(mdo): du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo de ltar na byang chub dang / myig gi khams de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su dbyer myed do// byang chub dang gzugs kyi khams de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su dbyer myed do// byad
182a3(mdo): rku ba dang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su dbyer myed do// byang chub dang yid kyi khams kyi bar de ni gnyis su myed de gnyis su dbyer myed do// byang chub dang chos kyi khams de ni gnyis su myed de
182a4(mdo): gnyis su dbyer myed do// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub po zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang myi rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang
182a5(mdo): yid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring mo myig gi rang bzhin ni stong pa// ste/ rang bzhin stong pa ni byang chub bo// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sA// dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni stong pa ste/ rang
182a6(mdo): bzhin stong pa de ni byang chub bo// sring mo myag ki rang bzhin ni ma cha gas pa myi sdang ma rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / kata mug dang bral ba'i byang chub bo// rna ba dang / sA dang / lce dang / lus
182a7(mdo): dang / yid kyi rang bzhin ni/ ma chags myi snang pa rmongs pa ste/ 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang bral ba ni byang chub bo// sring po myig ni bdag po myed pa/ bdag gi myed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa
182a8(mdo): ste/ byang chub kyang bdag po myed pa/ bdag gi myed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang bdag po myed pa bdag gi myed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa ste/
182a9(mdo): byang chub kyang bdag po myed pa/ bdag gi myed pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa'o// sring mo myag ni skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa mang ba yin/ bud myed kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo
182b1(mdo): byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang skyes pa'i chos dang /
182b2(mdo): mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa'i chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin/ srang la byang chub kyang skyes pa 'chos dang mtshungs pa/
182b3(mdo): ldan pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyi chos dang mtshungs par ldan pa yang ma yin no// sring mo myig ni skyes pa yang ma yin// bud myed kyang ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin no//
182b4(mdo): srang mo yid kyi bar du yang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang skyes pa yang ma yin/ bud myed kyang ma yin no// sring mo de ltar myig gi de bzhin nyid ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su
182b5(mdo): chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du yang / de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud de/ de bzhin nyid rtogs pa ni byang chub bo// sring po de'i phyir ngas khyod la
182b6(mdo): 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan ya nga khyod kyi lus 'di ni/ bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ sro ga ma yin/ skyes bu ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ shed las
182b7(mdo): skyes pa ma yin/ shed bu ma yin/ byed pa po ma yin/ tshor ba po ma yin/ shes pa po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ nyan pa po ma yin/ snom pa po ma yin/ zab pa po ma yin/ reg pa po ma yin/ rnam par shes
182b8(mdo): pa po ma yin no// sring mo byang chub kyang bdag ma yin/ sems can ma yin/ srog ma yin/ gso ba ma yin/ gang zag ma yin/ bdag gi ma yin/ yongs su 'dzind pa ma yin/ byams pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma
182b9(mdo): yin/ gzugs ma yin/ sgra ma yin/ dri ma yin/ ro ma yin/ reg bya ma yin/ rnam par rig pa ma yin te/ sring mo de lta bas na/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub ces bya'o// srang mo gang yang khyod
183a1(mdo): kyi lus ni g.yo ba myed pa/ byed pa myed pa rtag pa myed pa ste/ rtswa dang shing dang shing ljon pa dang / rtsig pa'i tshogs rnams dang / khyad par myed cing tha dad du dbyer myed do// sring mo gang yang nang gi sa'i khams dang / bya/
183a2(mdo): rol gyi sa'i khams ni/ gnyis su myed cing gnyis su dbyer myed de/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid myed par mtshan nyid myed gcig par/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi ye shes kyis/ mngon par rdzogs par thugs su chud do// sra
183a3(mdo): mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du/ khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// sring mo gzhan yang sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa gang gis sems dpa' dang / rnam par shes pa'i sems dang / yid
183a4(mdo): dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa de ni/ skra la gnas pa ma yi na/ spu la gnas pa ma yin/ sha mdog la gnas pa ma yin/ pags pa la gnas pa ma yin/ sha la gnas pa ma yin/ khrag la gnas pa/
183a5(mdo): ma yin/ nus pa la gnas pa ma yin/ chu la gnas pa ma yin/ rkang pa la gnas pa ma yin/ nang na gnas pa ma yin/ phyi rol na ka/ nas pa ma yin/ gnyi ga myed pa la gnas pa ma yin/ myig la gan
183a6(mdo): ba ma yin/ rna ba la gnas pa ma yin/ sna la gnas pa ma yin/ lce la gnas pa ma yin/ lus la gnas pa ma yin/ yid la gnas pa ma yin te/ gnas pa ma yin// myi gnas pa ma yin/ rgyud 'chad
183a7(mdo): pa ma yin/ yul na gnas pa ma yin/ phyogs na gnas pa ma yin/ gzugs myed pa/ stan tu myed pa/ rnam par rig pa myed pa/ gzung ba myed pa/ 'dre ba myed pa/ gzhi myed pa/ dag pa gtsang ba/ 'od gsal ba
183a8(mdo): ste/ sems dang / yid kyi rnam par rig pa de ni/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed pa/ rnam par byang ba myed pa ste/ de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing / 'od gsal la/ lus myed pa'i phyir/ kun nas nyon mongs pa myed/
183a9(mdo): cing / rnam par dag pa myed do// sring mo de ltar na phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi rang bzhin ni byang chub bo// byang chub kyi rang bzhin yang phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams so// sring mo khyod kyi lus 'di la phung
183b1(mdo): po dang / khams dang skye mched gang dag mngon par grub pa de dag ni byang chub ste/ byang chub gzhan ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// byang chub ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams gzhag pa ma yin te/ de dag nyid bu dra/
183b2(mdo): yin pas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo de'i phyir ngas khyod la 'di skad du khyod nyid byang chub bo zhes smras so// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ nam
183b3(mdo): mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i lha'i bu lnga 'bum gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsnyed do// gang dag smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gsar mchog 'od dpal gyi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i skyes pa dang / bud myed dang /
183b4(mdo): khye'u dang / bu mo rnams dang / srog chags nyes brgyas kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang myi drug bcu ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing dri dang bral ba rnam par dag go// smad 'tshong
183b5(mdo): ma'i bu mo/ gser mchog 'od dpal yang / tshim zhing mgu la yi rad sa te/ rab tu dga' nas// dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i rkang
183b6(mdo): pa gnyis la gtugs ste/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la skyabs su song nas tshangs par spyad pa dang / bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te/ lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na myed pa yang
183b7(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdag kyang khyod kyi rjes su bstan pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang / snying rje bas/ sangs rgyas kyi gdung myi 'chad ba dang
183b8(mdo): chos kyi gdung myi 'chad pa dang / dge 'dun gyi gdung myi 'chad pa'i slad du/ khyod kyis bstan pa/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub der/ sems bskyed par bgyi'o// de bzhin du chos rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/ sems
183b9(mdo): can thams cad la chos bstand par yang bgyi'o// nyes par bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang / yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du nongs pa la nongs pa gshegs par bgyi'o// gang na chos thams cad zhi zhing nye bar zhi bar ma rtogs nas/
184a1(mdo): tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa/ sngon du 'gro ba dang / byin ci log gi dbang du mchis pa dang / rang gi lus la mngon par zhen pas/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni/ rlom
184a2(mdo): rnams kyi rang bzhin nyid ma gtogs so// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi 'on kyang / gang dag 'dod chags kyi sbyor ba dang / ldan pa'i sems can de dag kyang / chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di ci 'dra ba de nyid dang ldan no// byang chub ses//
184a3(mdo): dpa' rnams ni/ ldan pa'i chos 'di la slob cing bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ni ji ltar mchis pa lags pa la/ kun brtags pa las 'byung
184a4(mdo): de ltar kun brtags pa yongs su rtogs na/ 'gag par 'gyur bas/ gsog dang 'dra ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal ji ltar khyod kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba' ltar na/ nyon mongs pa rnams ni rang
184a5(mdo): bzhin ma mchis shing / bya ba ma mchis pas/ sprin gyi cho gas dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ skad cig la 'jig cing 'ardu ste/ chu'i chu bur dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni shin tu mngon
184a6(mdo): bar grub pa ma mchis pa ste/ rlung dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnam sa ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa ste/ nam mkha 'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ring du myi gnas pas
184a7(mdo): chu'i ri mo dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma chags pas yid la bgyid pa'i 'jug pa las byung ba ste/ gnod sbyin dang 'byung po dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ma mchis pa la phyin ci log tu mthong /
184a8(mdo): ba las byung ba ste/ sprin dmar dang 'dra'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni kun brtags pa yang 'byung ba ste/ yang dag par ma lags pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni ngar 'dzin pas lhag par chags pa dang 'brel pa'o//
184a9(mdo): nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag gir 'dzind pas dngos por yongs su 'dzind pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni log pas bskyed pas glo bur bu byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni rnam par rtog pa las byung bas/ mtshan
184b1(mdo): ma'i rjes su 'brang ba yin no// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams sna tshogs la/ myi dpyod pa'i tshul gyis bskyed pa ste/ so sor myi rtog pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni sems dang rjes su 'thun pas bskyed pa ste/ nges par myi
184b2(mdo): sems pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni bdag dang gzhan la mngon par zhen pa las byung ba ste/ yid ches par myi bgyi'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni phung po dag len pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni khams rnams la rim par
184b3(mdo): 'dzin pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni skye mched rnams bsdogs pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ mying dang gzugs la rnam par 'byed pa'o// nyon mongs pa rnams ni tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa dag/
184b4(mdo): myi rtogs pa'o// 'jam dpal de lta lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ byang chub kyi phur bu'i gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// nyon
184b5(mdo): mongs pa rnams ni byang chub kyi sa bon te/ nyon mongs pa rtog/ sa pa nyid byang chub lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams ni byang chub rdo rje'i gzhi lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings
184b6(mdo): dbyer ma mchis pa'i tshul gas byang chub ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyis myi phyed pa'i slad du'o/ 5/ 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa rnams ma thod pa ni byang chub ste/ byang chub ni yul thams cad kyi rjes su song //
184b7(mdo): 'jam dpal ji ltar byang chub rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyang / rnam par gnas pa ma mchis pa ste/ skyes nas 'jig cing 'ju bas myi gnas pa'o// 'jam dpal nyon mongs pa
184b8(mdo): rnams ni sems kyi rang bzhin lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal 'di ni/ chags pa 'am/ sdang ba 'am/ rmongs pa zhes sems kyi rang bzhin bstand par myi nus te/ 'jam dpal ji ltar sems
184b9(mdo): bstan par myi nus pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang yul na gnas pa'am/ phyogs na gnas pa zhes nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin bstan par myi nus pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sems
185a1(mdo): dpa' chen pos/ ji lta ji ltar nyon mongs pa de dag rab tu rtogs pa de lta de ltar/ de 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongs su smyin par bgyi ba la sbyor bar myi 'gyur ro// zhe sdang la spyod pa rnams la ma lags
185a2(mdo): ste/ gti mug la spyod pa rnams la ma lags ste/ cha mnyam pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams yongasu sbyin par bgyi ba la sbyor bar myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi 'dod chags ji lta ba de bzhin du/ 'dod chags la
185a3(mdo): spyod pa thams cad kyi/ 'dod chags lo blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi zhe sdang ni lta ba de bzhin du/ zhe sdang la spyod pa thams cad kyi zhe sdang la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi gti mug ci lta
185a4(mdo): ba de bzhin du/ gti mug la spyod pa thams cad kyi/ gti mug la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal da ltar bdag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad la spyod pa'i sems can
185a5(mdo): thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa la blta bar bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'a di lta ste/ dper na/ mye ni rtsa ba dang / shing thams cad kyis/ 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ 'phags
185a6(mdo): pa'i shes rab kyi mye yang / nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba dang / shing thams cad kyis 'jigs pa ma mchis so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/ mun pa mun nag thams cad dang / ldan gcig
185a7(mdo): myi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i shes rab kyang / nyon mongs pa thams dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung dmar ni/ shing ljon pa dang / ri thams nAs myi chags so//
185a8(mdo): 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' yang nyon mongs pa'i yul thams cad la myi chags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha'i khams ni/ sreg pa'i skal pa
185a9(mdo): thams cad kyis chag par mya 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i sreg pa'i bskal pa thams cad kyis tshig par myi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal
185b1(mdo): 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni rdul dang / na bun dang / sprin thams cad dang ldan gcig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa
185b2(mdo): thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni sa dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon
185b3(mdo): mongs pa thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na zhab long ni/ lcags dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs
185b4(mdo): pa thams cad dang lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na ri khor yug ni/ rlung thams cad kyis bskyod par myi nus so// 'jam da pal de bzhin du/ 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i/ byang chub
185b5(mdo): sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis bskyod par myi nus so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na dud 'gro'i skye gnas/ su song ba'i bya ngang pa zhes bgyi ba ni/ 'o ma dang chab bsres pa las
185b6(mdo): 'o ma nyid ni 'tshal gi/ chab ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal de bzhi na du/ 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' ya 8/ 'phags pa'i shes rab dang nyon mongs par 'dres pa dag las shre
185b7(mdo): rab nyid ni len gi/ nyon mongs pa ni ma lags so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na byang gi sgra myi snyan gi gling na nye du 'brel pa'i bud myed rnams la/ shing gi yal ka 'dud par myi bgyid do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ dang
185b8(mdo): po yongs su sbyin pa'i sems can rnams la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i shes rab dang ye shes 'dud par myi bgyid do// 'jam dpal bdag ni da ltar nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 'jigs pa 'am skrag
185b9(mdo): pa ci yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal bdag gis chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben par rtogs pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams na/ 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i go
186a1(mdo): ma bgos pa ste/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na kang dgras 'jigs pa de ni/ dpa' bo zhes kyi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis/ 'jigs pade sang byang chub sem/
186a2(mdo): dpa' zhes myi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na gang dgras bcom pa de ni dpa' bo zhes myi bgyi'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du/ gang nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bcom pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' zhes myi bgyi'o//
186a3(mdo): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po chu bdag ces bgyi ba chab kyi nang du gsal na// gsher bar yang myi 'gyur zhing / chab kyi dri mas kyang myi gos la/ chab kyi rnyog pa thams cad kyang rab tu dang bar bgyid do// 'jam dpa
186a4(mdo): de bzhin du 'phags pa'i shes rab la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang / nyon mongs pa'i nang na gnas kyang / nyon mongs pas gsher ba ra yang myi 'gyur zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dri mas kyang myi gos la/ nyon
186a5(mdo): mongs pa'i rnyog pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid do// de nas swa/ da 'tshong ma'i bu mo/ gser mchog 'od dpal gyis// bstan pa la/ de bshad nas lnga 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
186a6(mdo): smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpal nyon mo/ sa pa ma mchis pa lags// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sring mo byang chub sems dpa'/ gang gis nyon mongs pa skyes pa 'am/ 'gag
186a7(mdo): par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes myi bya'o// sring mo 'di lta ste dper na 'bru mar gyi sgron ma la/ mun pa mun nag snang na/ de 'bru mar gyi sgron ma zhes myi bya'o// sring mo de bzhin du/ byang chub
186a8(mdo): sems dpa' gang gis nyon mongs pa skye ba'am/ 'gag par mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni/ nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes myi bya'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba ni su gang du kun nas nyon mongs pa yang myi
186a9(mdo): mthong rnam par byang ba yang myi mthong ste/ mthong ba dang myi mthong ba dang / sems dang yid dang rnam par rig pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa myed pa'o// sring mo gang dang gang du sems dang yid dang / rnam par rig pa 'jug na/ thas
186b1(mdo): mya ngan las 'das par sems pa yang rung ste/ de thams cad ni nyon mongs pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa myed pa la ni/ sems sam sems pa 'jug pa myed pa'i phyir te/ gang gis dge ba 'am myi dge ba'i dmyigs pa/
186b2(mdo): la/ sems 'jug pa de dag thams cad ni mngon par 'du byed pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa de ni 'khor ba'o// gang 'khor ba de ni 'du byed do// 'du byed thams cad ni 'khor ba ste/ sring mo de dag ni nyon mongs pa yin no//
186b3(mdo): sring mo nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba ste/ myig dang gzugs su sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sgra dang / sna dang / dri dang / lce dang / ro dang / lus dang / reg bya dang / yid dang chos su sbyor ba ni
186b4(mdo): nyon mongs pa'o// tshul khrims la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs pa'o// shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la sbyor ba ni nyon mongs
186b5(mdo): pa'o// rab tu dben pa la sbyor bar sems pa ni/ nyon mongs pa'o// sring mo nyon mongs pa myed pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba myed pa zhes bya ba ni tshig la bla dgas so// de ni spros pa myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla
186b6(mdo): dgas so// de ni grol ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ni kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas ste/ sring mo grangs dang grangs myed pa dang bral ba ni nyon mongs pa myed pa nyid do// sring mo
186b7(mdo): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang bdag la yang nyon mongs pa myed la/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu tha dad par bya ba la yang shin tu brtson pa/ de ni nyon mongs pa myed pa'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsum
186b8(mdo): te/ gzhan dag nyon mongs pa las rab tu thar par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo// sring mos smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul gang lags// 'jam dpal
186b9(mdo): gyis smras pa/ stong pa nyid las so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / lta ba la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mtshan ma myed pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / mtshan ma la spyod pa'i sems can
187a1(mdo): rnams la snying rje ba dang / smon pa myed pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing smon pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa la/ so sor rtog pa'i rjes
187a2(mdo): su 'jug cing / mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / skye ba myed cing 'chi 'pho myed pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'dug cing / rga ba dang shi bar 'du shes pa'i/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang /
187a3(mdo): skye ba myed pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / skye ba dang 'jig par 'du shes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / nyan thos su nges pa la so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog
187a4(mdo): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas su nges pa la/ so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob pa las ldog pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon myed pa la 'jug pa so sor rtog pa'i rjes su 'jug cing /
187a5(mdo): sems can thams cadas lnga snying rje ba dang / sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul lo// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa ni sle'i/ rin po che chen po dag
187a6(mdo): thogs te/ ldog par ni dka'o// srang mo da bzhin du/ stong pa nyid la so sor brtag par ni sla'i thabs la mkhas pa dang bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed
187a7(mdo): pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa dang / skye ba myed pa dang / 'byung ba myed pa dang / nyan thos kyi skyon myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon myed pa la yang / so sor rtog par ni sla'i/ thabs la mkhas pa dang/
187a8(mdo): bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na/ g.yul ngo chen por 'jug pa ni sla'i ma smas ma nyams par brgal bar ni dka'o// sring mo de bzhin du/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum du 'jug
187a9(mdo): pa na sla'i thabs la mkhas pa dang / bral bas ldog par ni dka'o// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal thabs shes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ sring mo thabs shes bya ba ni gang
187b1(mdo): phyogs gnyis myi spong ba ste/ 'di ltar 'khor ba'i phyogs dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyogs so// sring mo thabs shes bya ba ni/ gang sgo gnyis bston par byed pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sgo dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo
187b2(mdo): dang / stong pa nyid kyi sgo dang / lta ba las rab tu tha rad pa'i sgo dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / mtshan ma las rnam par tha dad pa'i sgo dang / smon pa myed pa'i sgo dang / bsam bzhin du skye ba'i sgo dang / mngon par 'du byed pa myed
187b3(mdo): pa'i sgo dang / dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i sgo dang / skye ba myed pa'i sgo dang / skye ba kun ston pa'i sgo dang / 'byung ba myed pa'i sgo dang / phung po dang khams dang skye mched gi sgo dang / skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa'i sgo dang /
187b4(mdo): skye ba dang 'byung ba'i sgo dang / dben pa'i sgo dang / sems can yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i sgo dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo dang / chos thamasaca so sor srung ba'i sgo dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i sgo dang / byang chub
187b5(mdo): sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgo dang / rang byang chub kyi sgo nga/ sangs rgyas kyi chos myi brjed pa'i sgo ste/ sring mo byang chub/ sems dpa' gang sgo gnyis nye bar ston kyang / spro thams cad la/
187b6(mdo): yang chags pa myed pa de ni/ thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi sgo dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sgo dang zhe sdang gi sgo dang / zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sgo dang / gti mug gi sgo dang /
187b7(mdo): gti mug dang bral ba'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgo dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i sgo dang / 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgo dang / 'gro ba myed pa'i sgo dang / sring mo 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa'o// byis
187b8(mdo): pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi spyod pa'i sgo dang / slob pa dang / myi slob pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo gang yin pa de gnyi ga shes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
187b9(mdo): dpa' thabs la mkhas pa zhes bya'o// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i theg pa chen po'i mdo// / yang de'i tshen bcom ldan 'das/ bya rgod
188a1(mdo): phung po'i ri'i ngos kyi sen spongs zhig ma/ zham 'bring byed pa'i dge sbyong / tshe dang ldan pa kum dga' bo dang / thabs gcig tu ring du 'chag pas 'chag cing bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas/ 'jam dpal ka'o//
188a2(mdo): nur gyur da pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus yang dag phul dang / mkhas pa ci skad bstan pa de ni/ de bzhin te/ legs so// legs so// zhes bya ba dang / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des
188a3(mdo): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dbyangs kyis go bar gyur cing / legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra de gnyis kyis/ stong gsum gyi snod chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos pa yang gyur das
188a4(mdo): swa dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam ka lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi 'am myi ma yin pa rna mas dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba mad
188a5(mdo): po dag legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra des bskul nas/ bcom ldan la// des ga la ba der dong ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs
188a6(mdo): gcig tu 'khod nas/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / snga ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldang dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang /
188a7(mdo): 'jig rten skyong ba de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba'i spa gang gis/ stong gsum gi stong chen po la 'jig rten gyi khams dbyangs kyis go bar
188a8(mdo): mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das kyis su la gsal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dpa/ spu'i bu dag de ni 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la'o// sA'i bu rnams kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal
188a9(mdo): gzho nur gyur da pa de da ltar ga na/ mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa ni/ rgyal po'i zhab kyi grong khyer chen po'i/ shar phyogs kyi sgo na smad 'tshong ma'i bu
188b1(mdo): mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba dang / lhan cig tu chos dang ldan pa'i gtam zer zhing 'dug gis lha'i bu dag/ gang dag chos nyan par 'dod dag kyang / der deng shig/ de nas lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ma
188b2(mdo): dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / myi dang myi ma yin pa dang / brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag thams cad lhan cig tu 'dus nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur
188b3(mdo): bkal ba der song ste/ byin pa dang / sus rags par smras nas/ me tog gi char rab tub ba ste/ me tog gi ma des/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong zer 'or yug tu me tog chal par 'akram par gyur to// den sgra rnams kyis kyang /
188b4(mdo): myi rnams kyis kyang / lha rnams mthong ste/ phan tshun smra bar byed do// de ltar rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dag/ me tog de dag gis kyang bskul pa/ lha'i lus reg pa de dag gis
188b5(mdo): bskul nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa ga la ba der dong ngo // rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang bud myed kyi tshogs rnams kyis bskor te/ dbung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang sman cig tu/ rgyal po'i
188b6(mdo): 'byor pa chen po dang / rgyal po'i mthu chen pos 'jam dpal gan nur gyur pa ga la ba de 'khor de dang / rgyal po ma skyes dkra dang / po dang / blon po'i bu rnams dang / tshob dpon dang / khyim bdag
188b7(mdo): gi bu rnams kyis/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal de 'dod chags kyi nyon mongs pa'i kun nas ldang ba dang / bral te/ dbang po dang / spyod lam rab tu zhi zhing / dbang po mya g.yeng la/ ngo tsha shes pa dang /
188b8(mdo): dpal gis legs par brgyan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la phyin chad su yang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa myi skye bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas skye ba'i tshogs chen po de 'dus par rig nas// smad 'tshong
188b9(mdo): ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyis khyod mthong yang phyir zhing chags pa myed na/ khyod kyis nyon mongs pa de dag gang du gzhag/ bu mos smras pa 'jam dpal
189a1(mdo): sems can thams cad ni nyon mongs pa rnams ni/ ye shes dang / rnam par grol ba la gnas pa dang / chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa ste/ de dag kyang ma skyed pa dang / ma bkag pa dang / ma bsgyur bar de ltar
189a2(mdo): bdag gis rtogs so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang lags pa de yang bdag gis rtogs lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin de gang yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rtogs pa ma
189a3(mdo): mchis shing / rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so// tshul bzhin ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa'i rang bzhin ni/ nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin lags so// nyon mongs pa rnams
189a4(mdo): na blo bur te/ stong pa nyid rtogs pa dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa shes pa dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// rang bzhin gis 'od gsal ba dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam
189a5(mdo): dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na dug drag po'i sbrul gdugs pas bltas pa tsam gyis/ skye bo 'gum par 'gyur ba las/ der mya zhig gi/ sa dug thams cad 'jal ba dang / dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar
189a6(mdo): bgyid pa'i sman dag gnod sel ces bgyi ba 'tshal te mchis nas/ de nas sman de bstan ma thag tu/ sbrul gdug pa'i dug de ma mchis pa ra bgyis nas/ de la khye'u dang / bu mo rnams brtse bas rtse zhing
189a7(mdo): khye'u dang / bu mo dag sbrul gdug pa de dang lhan cig tu rtse bar bgyid de/ pang par len cing / glo la se re la 'phreng du btags te/ brgyan du bgyis kyang / tshig par myi bgyid/ za bar myi bgyid/ sdug bsngal du myi bgyid
189a8(mdo): do// 'jam dpal de bzhin du bdag kyang sngon chos 'dul ba ma thos pa na/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa yid la bgyid pa/ phyin ci log la nye bar gnas pa'i/ nyon mongs pas yongs su bsregs pa na/ 'dod chags/
189a9(mdo): gi rang gi lus la chags shing / rang gi gzugs la mngon par zhen te/ gzugs dbu pa lta bur so sor rtog par myi bgyid/ lus sgyu ma'i chos nyid du ma 'tshal/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ro myar ba sprang thigs pa lta bur
189b1(mdo): ma 'tshal srog gi dbang po/ zil ba'i thigs pa lta bur ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad myi rtag par ma 'tshal/ lus myi sdug par ma 'tshal/ 'du byed thams cad shin tu sdug bsngal bar ma 'tshal/ chos thams/
189b2(mdo): cad bdag ma mchis par so sor rtog par / myi bgyid do// bdag kyang mun pa yun nag gis bsgribs shing / gzhan yang mun par bgyid/ bdag kyang btsongs shing gzhan yang 'ching bar bgyid pa las/ 'jam dpal gang gi
189b3(mdo): tshebadag gis khyod pas chos dang ldan pa'i bka' 'ching thos te/ thos kyang mos shing / mos nas kyang rnam par grol te/ de'i slad du/ bdag da star dang slan chad chags pa'i myig gis su la yang blta bar myi
189b4(mdo): bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'jam dpal snang ba ni mun pa dang / lhan cig myi gnas so// 'jam dpal de bzhin du// 'dod chags dang bral ba ni/ su yang nyon mongs pa rnams la chags pa la mchis pa'i slad du'o//
189b5(mdo): denas yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la/ smad 'tshong ma'i bu/ mo gser mchog 'od dpal gyis/ 'di skad ces smras so// rkyen/ 'jam dpal lha'i 'khor da/ myi'i 'khor chen po 'di 'dus
189b6(mdo): kyis gang gis lha dang / mya 'di dag gis nyon mongs pa'i ra nga bzhin de dag rtogs nas/ sems can rnams la snying che bsabla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
189b7(mdo): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi bkal 'ching bgyi bar khyod spobs par mdzod cig/ 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin la ni mos par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sring mo nyon mongs pa'i rang
189b8(mdo): bzhin ni byang chub yin pa'i phyir ro// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper dbye sa snar ba 'i sreg pa'i bdag nyid ma yin do// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang / yongs su btags na/ 'khor ba'i bdag nyid ma yod do// dri
189b9(mdo): mo 'di lta ste/ dper na mye spar pa ni sreg pa'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang yongs su rtags na 'khor ba'i bdag nyid yin no// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na mye ni rgyu yod ma 'bar ro// sri
190a1(mdo): mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba'i rgya yong na khams gsum du 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na mye yi rgya myed ma gyi 'bar ro// sring mo de bzhin du nyon mongs pa rnams kyang lta ba'i kun nas
190a2(mdo): ldang ba'i rgyu myed na/ khams gsum du myi 'bar ro// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na lo stong du 'bar ba'i mye la ni skye ba dang 'bri ba myed do// sring mo de bzhin du bskal pa brgya stong du rgyu ba'i nyon mongs pa yang / skye ba dang 'bri ba myed do//
190a3(mdo): sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na myi shi pa la ni mye zhes myi gdags so// sring mo de bzhin du shes pa zhi ba la yang / nyon mongs pa zhes myi gdags so// sring mo 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mtha' gang la mye 'bar yang / nam
190a4(mdo): mkha'i no mye des tshig par myi nus so// sring mo de bzhin du gang rang ba zhin gyis 'od gsal ba la/ blo bur gi nyon mongs pa 'byung yang / rang bzhin kyis 'od gsal ba de ni// glo bur gi nyon mongs pa des/ kun
190a5(mdo): nas nyon mongs par byed myi nus so// sring mo 'di ltar yang gzu/ gas kyi lus la ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam da/ pa la dper na 'tsho bran gyi chab kyi nang gi chu zla bzhin du'o// 'jam
190a6(mdo): dpal gis spras pa/ bu mo phung po rnams ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mo sa smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo zhes
190a7(mdo): rnams ji ltar blta bar bya bu mos spras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ khams gsum bskal pa'i myes bsregs pa 'gyur ba bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo skye mched rnams ji ltar blta bar
190a8(mdo): bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i las mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos spras pa
190a9(mdo): 'jam dpal dper na/ 'khor 'di ni steng gi nam mkha'imatshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na 'khor
190b1(mdo): 'di ni steng gi nam mkha'i mtshams bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ bu mo khyod nyid ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ bdag gi pha dang ma gnyis phrad pa ma mchis pa bzhin du'o//
190b2(mdo): 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo nga ji ltar blta bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na long ba gzugs la blta ba bzhin du'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mos khyod kyis chos 'di dag zos sam/ bu mos
190b3(mdo): smras pa/ 'jam dpal dper na/ sgyu ma sprul pa'i/ rna ba'i rnam par rig pa'i lta bus thos lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam/
190b4(mdo): dpal bdag nyid byang chub lags te/ yang 'dod par myi bgyid do// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa spyad dam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams
190b5(mdo): cad gtan du yongs su gtang bas spyad lags so// 'jam dpal gis/ smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su/ rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal nam mkha
190b6(mdo): yongs su rdzogs pas/ yongs su rdzogs par bgyis lags so// 2rngam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa da sgoms mas mA/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams
190b7(mdo): cad ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ba ma mchis pas bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa brtsams sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos thams cad thob pa/
190b8(mdo): bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gis brtsams lag so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings gnas pa ma mchis
190b9(mdo): pa'i tshul gis bdag nas lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byas sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal lhag chad ma mchis par yongs su rdzogs
191a1(mdo): par bgyis lags so// 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis byams pa snyoms sam/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad myi srid pa'i tshul gyis bsgoms lags so// 'jam dpal gis/
191a2(mdo): smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po gang nas btsal bar bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpas/ snying rje chen po na sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams las btsal bar bgyi'o
191a3(mdo): 'i slad du zhe na/ gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa ma mchis par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems pa skye bar myi 'gyur pa'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gyis
191a4(mdo): smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba ga las pham par bya/ bu mos spras pa/ lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo gang byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms
191a5(mdo): ci zhig byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i btang snyoms ni sems can thams cad la myi slu ba yongs su rdzo/ dgas par bgyid pa dang / chos thams cad la 'gal ba ma mchis par nye
191a6(mdo): yizhi par bgyid pa'o// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo 'gal ba zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang dag ma mchis pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang ba'i slad du/ byang chub la rab tu
191a7(mdo): zhugs pa dag go// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ de dag gang da nga 'gal/ bu mos smras pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad dang ngo // 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo phas kyi rgol ba gang yin/ bu mos smras
191a8(mdo): pa gang dag bzod pa'i rlom sems kyis/ gzhan la rgol ba dag lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo bzod pa zhes bya ba ga la 'od / bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyis
191a9(mdo): tho batshams pa las 'chi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ tho btsams pa ma mchis na/ bzod pa mi'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ 'jam dpal gang la sems can thams cad kyis tho btsams pa na 'azhugs pa ma
191b1(mdo): mchis shing gnon pa myi bgyid pa de/ bzod pa bsgoms pa lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras so// bu mo 'ong khro ba zhes bya ba ci lta bu yin/ bu mos spras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gise bskal pa brgyar bsags pa'i dge
191b2(mdo): ba'i rtsa ba rnams la gnod par bgyid pa 'di ni/ khong khro ba zhes bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo khong khro ba myed pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi sems la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis
191b3(mdo): shing / yul thams cad la gnod pa myi bgyid pa ste/ de ni bzod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ bu mo ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yul las rnam par rgyal ba yin/ bu mos spa sem
191b4(mdo): 'jam dpal gang chos thams cad la rnam par 'byed kyang / myi dmyig ngas pa lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa// bu mo Na ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ gang
191b5(mdo): bdud thams cad 'dul bar bgyid kyang / nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni phung po/ rnams ston kyang / phung po'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig myi gnas
191b6(mdo): pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyon mongs pa rnam sa ston kyang / rang bzhin chos nyid kyis chags pa ma mchis pa dang / 2ma dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su smyin par bgyi
191b7(mdo): ba'i slad du/ rgab dang 'chi ba ston kyang / chos thams cad la 'chi 'pho ba dang / 'gro ba ma mchis par rab tu rtogs pa dang / 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni lha'i bu dag ston kyang / phrag dog dang rlom sems thams cad dang bral/
191b8(mdo): ba'i slad du'o// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ci ltar sems can yongs su smyin par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' sa/ shes rab dang thabs yongs su bsgom pas
191b9(mdo): sems can yongs su smin par bgyid do// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' ci ltar sems can thams cad ga drung du gnas par bya/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal rang gi sems dang / shes pa yongs su
192a1(mdo): bsgom pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bgyi'o// 'jam dpal gis spras pa/ bu mo 'khor 'di ni khyod la chos nyan par 'dod do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang du/
192a2(mdo): bdag dang / gzhan gi 'du shes 'jug pa de ni/ nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags la/ gang la rna ba'i rnam par rig pas/ rnam par shes pa 'jug pa yang nyan par 'tshal ba ma lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo/
192a3(mdo): chos nyan par 'dod pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu yin/ bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe/ rang gi lus la rmyi lam ki myi lta bur mos pa dang / chos ston pa la rgyu ma'i myi lta bur mos pa dang / bstan pa'i chos de la yang brag cha'i sgra
192a4(mdo): skad lta bur mos shing mos pa dang / rnam par grol ba la yang / gnyis su myi bgyid pa de tsam gyis na/ chos nyan par 'tshal ba lags so// 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ bu mo chos ji ltar mnyam par bya/ bu mos smras pa
192a5(mdo): chos la ston pa la/ nan tan bgyid pas chos nyan par 'gyi'o// de nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba/ bstsags pa'i shes rab kyis/ smad 'tshong ma' bu mo gser mchog 'od
192a6(mdo): dpal gyis/ de lta de ltar chos bstan pa na/ 'khor de las srog chags khri nyis stong gis/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyurd to// byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa
192a7(mdo): sngon dge ba'i za ba bstsags pa'i lha dang / myi lnga brgya ni myi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags sum khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul myed cing / dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// bu mo de yang chos
192a8(mdo): nyan pa'i dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' bas/ chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// des bzod pa thob pas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa'i rkang pa la btugs te/ 'jam dpal thugs brtse pa
192a9(mdo): slad du bdag rab tu dbyung du gsol/ tshul bzhin ma lags pa kun skyed pa/ 'phags pa ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i chos las mnyam par bgyid pa'i lus 'di las tha rad par mdzad du gsol// zhes rab tu dbyung bar
192b1(mdo): gsol ba btab bo// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ sring mo 'di lta ste/ mgo bo'i spu 'dreg pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu dbyung ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bu mo gang sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa gtsang dri
192b2(mdo): phyir brtson pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mo gang gos ngur smrigs 'chang ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo gang bdag nyid kyang bslab pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag
192b3(mdo): par blangs/ tshul khrims 'chal pa'i sems can rnams kyang / tshul khrims kyi sdom pa dang / brtul zhugs la yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba yin no// bu mo gang bdag nyid dben par gnas
192b4(mdo): pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ bu mo 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na rnam par rgyug pa'i sems can rnams dben pa shes pa la dgod par byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya'o// kha dog
192b5(mdo): dang gzugs kyi rtogs dang / spyod sam gyi dbyibs ni/ byang chub se/ mas dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan dang / kang / zag gzhan dag byams pa dang / snying rje'i sems bskyed pa ni byang
192b6(mdo): chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can gzhan gi dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu
192b7(mdo): byung ba yin no// bdag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gus pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin ki/ sems can gzhan yongs su mya ngan las zla ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pas gus pa ni
192b8(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba yin no// bdag gi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab
192b9(mdo): tu byung ba yin no// bdag gis rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi// sems can thams cad kyi rjes su srung ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bdag thar par bya ba la brtson
193a1(mdo): ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can rnams thar bar bya ba la brtson pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo 'khor bas skyo ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i
193a2(mdo): rab tu byung ba ma yin gi sems can thams cad 'khor ba las grol bar bya ba la dga' ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo byang chub las 'das pa la dga' ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu byung
193a3(mdo): pa ma yin gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba yin no// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ sems can gzhan dag la snying rje chen po zhes bya ba'i tshig bla
193a4(mdo): dgas so// bu mo rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gi 'khrul pa la skyon du myi lta ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gzhan gi rnyed pa la phrag dog myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla
193a5(mdo): dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni bdag dang gzhan la gdung ba myed pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo ra/ ba tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gzhan la myi smod pa zhes bya ba'i
193a6(mdo): tshig tha dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ gan na sten pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni gzhan gi ltung ba myi gleng ba zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dag so//
193a7(mdo): bu mo rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba de ni/ nyes pa thams cad las 'byin pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dgas so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba ni gzhan la rag las pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpas gzhan la rag
193a8(mdo): ma las par bya'o// bu mos smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba gzhan la rag las pa lags 'jam dpal gyis spras pa bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni/ tshul khrims las
193a9(mdo): rag las pa yin te/ tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang myed do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba na ting nge 'dzin la rag las pa yin te/ brjed ngas pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang myed do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni
193b1(mdo): shes rab la rag las pa yin te/ brjed ngas pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang myed do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni shes rab la rag las pa yin te/ shes rab 'chal pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang myed do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni
193b2(mdo): rnam par grol ba la rag las pa yin te/ sems rnam par ma grol ba la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang myed do// bu mo rab tu 'byung ba ni/ rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba la rag las pa yin te/ rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong
193b3(mdo): ba myed pa la ni rab tu 'byung ba ci yang myed do// bu mos smras pa/ bums spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'byung ba/ gzhan la rag las pa mchis pa lags 'jam dpal
193b4(mdo): gis smras pa/ bu mo byang chub sems dpa' mi gzhan gi dring myi 'jogapas na/ gzhan las rag las pa myed pa ste/ rang gi las shes pa'i ye shes kyis/ 'dis gang ci shes pa de bdag gis kyang shes ya/
193b5(mdo): 'di gang ci smra ba de bdag kyang smra'o zhes gzhan dag gi dor mya blta bas/ na/ gzhan la rag las pa myed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gzho nu// ra gyur pas/ rab tu 'byung ba'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad
193b6(mdo): pa na legs par bshad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas rang rang gi gos dang / rgyan thams cad lus las phud de/ 'jam pa pal gzho nur gyur pa la phul nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
193b7(mdo): dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/ rab tu 'byung ba legs par bshad de/ bdag cag rnams kyis kyang / rab tu 'byung ba 'di bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ spang
193b8(mdo): 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod rta'i shing rta 'di la zhon la/ tshong dpon ki bu 'jigs byin la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ yongs su sbyin par gyis shig dang / de nyid kyis khyod rab tu
193b9(mdo): 'byung ba dang / bsnyen par rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas skye bo phal po che de dag 'di snyam du sems ste/ 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / 'dod chags dang ma bral ba gnyis lhan cig gnas su ji ltar rung snyam mo// de nas
194a1(mdo): bu mo des/ skye bo phal po che dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag 'dod chags dang / bral ba'i byang chub
194a2(mdo): sems dpa' ni/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa' sems can rnams dang lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba myed la/ 'dod chags dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs pho dag zhe sdang dang bral ba'i
194a3(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' ni/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang / lhan cig gnas kyang kha na ma tho ba myed la/ zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag gti mug dang bral
194a4(mdo): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang lhan gcig gnas kyang / kha na ma tho ba myed la/ gti mug dang / bcas pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag
194a5(mdo): nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams dang / lhan cig gnas kyang kha na/ ma tho ba myed la/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems can rnams
194a6(mdo): kyang 'dul bar byed do// grogs po dag 'di lta ste dper na/ ma ni bu dang lhan cig gnas kyang chags pa myed do// grogs mo dag de ba zhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad dang lhan
194a7(mdo): cig gnas kyang chags pa myed do// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na bcings pa las bkrol ba'i myi ni/ 'dod chags kyi kun tu khyad par la myi spyod do// grogs po dag de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' yang khams
194a8(mdo): gsum pa thams cad 'ching ba dang / 'obs lta bur 'du shes pas chags pa myed do// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal chos kyi 'bab stegs su ni bzhugs gting ni rnyed thar la ni phyen ma rig pa'i mun pa dang ni
194a9(mdo): bral te/ srid pa'i rkyen kyis nyon mongs pa 'jigs par lta ba ni legs par mthong nas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur ba'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas shing rta la gzhon kar tshi gas
194b1(mdo): su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// rang bzhin rnam dag chags pas ma chags shing // rtag tu byams sems sdang bar sdang ba myed// shes rab sngar shar dag ni gti mug rmongs dang zas// nyon mongs myed par shing rta bzhon par
194b2(mdo): bya// gang gis sngon cad bdag ni brgyal 'gyur cing // nor chags tshong dpon bu dang ldan gcig tu/ shing tar zhugs nas bskyed mos 'tshal song ba// 'dod pa'i rnam rtog de dag gang du sngo// ji ltar smin tshogs sdug
194b3(mdo): pos so khyogs nas// nyi ma'i 'od gzer lha ye lha ner myin// 'on kyang 'od zer de dag gar myi 'gro// sprin gis bsgribs pas snang ba myed du zad// de bzhin nyon mongs bsgribs pas byis pa kun// shes rab snang la blo
194b4(mdo): skye myed pa yang // shes rab yul gang na yang gnas pa myed// nyon mong sa yongs su shes pas shes par snang // nyon mongs gang nas 'ong ba 'ang ma yi na zhing // yul gi phyogs char 'gro ba 'ang ma yin te// tshul bzhin ma yin
194b5(mdo): ba las nyon mongs 'byung // tshul bzhin gis ni de dag 'byung myi 'a gyur// bor ba myed cing blangs pa 'ang yod ma yin// skyed pa myed/ cing bkag pa 'ang yod ma yin// gzhan la ma yin phyogs pa 'ang
194b6(mdo): ma yin te// chos mnyam nyid kyis bdag kyang rnam par dag/ 2bru mar smon ma mun par phyung ba na// mun pa yongs su song ba myed pa ltar shes rab kyis ni mun pa myed gyur na// nyon mongs zad gyur myed cing
194b7(mdo): 'byung ba 'ang myed// ji ltar sman pas nad pa gso ba na// de'i khams na 'jig par byed kyang // de'i blo bur nad ni zhi bar 'gyur// nad rnams gzhan yang 'byung ba myed pa ltar// de bzhin sman pa'i dam pa 'jam dbyangs gis
194b8(mdo): rigs pa'i tshul mkhyen sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis// sems can nyon mongs nye bar zhi mdzad kyang // chos rnams rnam par 'jig par mdzad pa myed// phung po 'di dag khams rnams 'di dag dang // skye mched 'di rnams gzhan du
194b9(mdo): 'gyur ba myed// gang dag sngon cad nyes ldan dug bcas pa// de dag da ni dug myed 'gyur ba myed// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal gis// tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas// yang 'jam dpal gzho
