195a1(mdo): nur gyur pa'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ yang 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bskor ba byas nas/ tshong dpon gi bu 'jigs byin dang / lhan cig tu shin rta la zhon te/ de lta bu'i 'byor da pa nyid kyis bskyed
195a2(mdo): mos tshal gi ser song ngo // 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas kyang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des la/ chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gis yang dag par bstan da yang dag par 'dzand du 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod
195a3(mdo): yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas so// yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin tu 'jug/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byas nas/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po dag gang dag
195a4(mdo): chos nyan par dga' ba rnams de yang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ de bzhin gshe gas pa'i spyan sngar deng shig/ de skad ces smras nas/ sa phyogs de nas langs te/ rang gi gnas ga la ba de logs su song ngo // de nas smad 'tshong ma'
195a5(mdo): bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lhan gcig tu bskyed mos tshal du phyind pa dang / der me tog chal bar bkram ste/ bdug pas gdugs/ bla re bres nas gdugs dang / rgyal
195a6(mdo): mtshan dang / ba dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyad te/ bza' ba dang / btung ba'i 'byor pa dag kyang bshams nas dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang / rjes su 'thun pa'i sil snyad dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu
195a7(mdo): dbyangs len pa byed cing / bskyed mos tshal na gnas par gyur da to// de dag gis zos shing thungs nas rab tu myos par 'gyur ba dang / smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal tshong dpon gi bu 'jigs byin gi phar par
195a8(mdo): sngas bcas te nyal lo// de nas bu mo des mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis rang gi lus rnyis par bstan nas/ des 'chi ba'i 'du shes bskyed do// de'i lus thams cad myi sdug par gyur da nas/ ro myags pa 'dra bar
195a9(mdo): snang zhing / de'i rna ba'i bu ga gnyis dang / myig gi dbang po dang / sna'i nang nas myi gtsang ba/ dri myi zhim pa dag 'byung zhing byung nas kyang lus thams cad la khyab par gyur da to// de'i kha nas kyang dri mnam po dag 'byung
195b1(mdo): ste/ dri mnam po de dag gis/ bskyed mos tshas de thams cad kyang khyab par gyur to// spu'i zhung bu thams cad nas kyang / khrag dang / nag mnam po dag 'dzag go// lto ba dang / lte ba'i dbus rdol pa nas/
195b2(mdo): kyang / mcher pa dang chu ma thams cad byung ngo // rkub dang 'doms nas kyang bshang gci dag 'byung zhing 'dzag go// de'i spyi bo nas kyang klad pa 'dzag go// rkang lag gi ser mo rnams la yang sngon po dag rgyu bar gyur to//
195b3(mdo): de nas tshong dpon gi bu 'jigs byin gis/ bu mo de'i lus la de lta bu'i gnas skabs su gyur pa dag mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang 'jigs skrag ste/ 'chad cing / skyabs myed rten myed dpung gnyen myed par gyur nas/
195b4(mdo): skyabs chol zhing 'jigs pa chen pos skyug par gyur nas/ 'dar zhing mongs 'debs par gyur to// de 'jigs pa chen po skyes pa'i rgyu ni gnyis te/ so so'i skye bo nyid yin pa dang / 'jigs pa'i skyon de dag
195b5(mdo): mthong ba'o// bdag re shig na bu mo 'di'i lan lan gyis// rgyal po ma skyes dgras bsad par 'ong ngo snyam nas/ des bu mo de/ ba ba nas bor te dong / 'bros par rtsal na'ang ma nus so// de'i
195b6(mdo): 'khor thams cad kyis kyang / 'jigs su rung ba'i 'jigs pa rtse na po de mthong nas/ bros par gyur to// de nas de gcig pu grogs myed par de ni shin tu 'jigs shing skrag nas bdag 'jigs skrag
195b7(mdo): pa chen po 'di las yongs su thar par byed pa/ lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am lha ma yin nam/ nam mtha' lding 'am/ myi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen pa 'am/ myi 'am myi ma yin pa 'am/ dge
195b8(mdo): skyong ngam/ bram ze su yod snyam du sems shing 'dug go// tshong dpon gi bu de yang dge ba'am ba yongs su ma sbyin pas/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bu mo de chos bshad pa dag kyang ma thos myi shes so// de nas 'jam
195b9(mdo): dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i byin kyi rlabs kyis bskyed mos 'tshal de'i shing ljon pa thams cad las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // 'jig rten thams cad yang dag myin/ ji ltar sgyu ma mthong ba bzhin// khye'u
196a1(mdo): ltar mtho 'gyur ba// chos rnams rang bzhin de yin no// sha dang khrag gis bskus pa ni// byis pa rnams kyi 'khrul pa ste// yang dag myin deng rnams brtags nas// myi mazhes byis pa chags par byed/
196a2(mdo): ci ltar myi mkhas myi zhig ni// dr-i nga sla tsa bum pa la// phyi rol ri mo bris pa bzhin// mgo la khyer te song ba las// 'gro ba de'i de yang ni// de yang ltung ste chag 'gyur nas// dri nga sma tsa mthong gyur te// chags pa myed cing 'bros
196a3(mdo): pa ltar// de bzhin byis pa/ mya mkhas pa/ bud myed rnams la yid zhen cing // zho dag gzugs dang dbyibs rnams la/ brtags nas de la chags par byed// lus kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa// de la khye'urab rtogs shig
196a4(mdo): dur khrod rul pa'i dra la ni// mkhas pa su zhig chags par 'gyur// yang dag myin la 'jigs myed kyis// khye'u khyod 'jigs par ma byed par// gang la khyod sngon rgyal 'gyur ba'i// chos rnams gi ni rang bzhin ltos//
196a5(mdo): chos kyi dam pa ston mdzad cing // 'jigs 'gyur 'jigs pa sel/ mdzad pa// shag kyi seng ge zhes bya ba'i// ston pa yang dag 'byung ba yod// 'dod pa myi rtag myi rten pa// glog 'od snang ba ci bzhin
196a6(mdo): te// snang yang yang dag ma yin pas// mkhas pa de la chags pa myed// ji ltar chu mi zhugs pa las// dbu ba brdos pa 'byung ba ya rgyu'i sbyor las skyes pa ste// de la byed pa po yang myed pa// de bzhin
196a7(mdo): mying dang gzugs rnams dang // las kyi sbyor las skyes pa ste// rgyu las byung ba yin pas na// byed pa po na gang yang myed// kha dog bzang po gar song zhing // gang gis khyod 'dir skrag pa'o// myi gtsang ba yang ga las 'od/
196a8(mdo): khye'u khyod de la mngon sum gis// chos rnams yul na myi gnas shang // de dag phyogs nas 'ongs pa 'ang myed// 'ong ba myed cing 'gro myed kyang // de dag rang bzhin ston par byed// 'di la byed po po myed cing // tshor ba po yang
196a9(mdo): 'di la myed// byed myed tshor ba po myed pa'i// chos rnams sgyu 'dra dngos po myed// rang gi las la rtogs shig dang // de yang 'di dang 'dra bas na// khye'u khyod gzhan gyi lus kyis ni/ 'dir yang skrag par ma byed cig// ci ltar
196b1(mdo): rmyi lam rmyis pa na// rtsed mo byed cing dga' bar ltar// de bzhin dga' ba'i rtsed mo kun// rmyi lam med mo byas dang 'dra// shag kya seng ge'i spyan sngar ni// khye'u gyad 'gro bar gyis shig dang // des ni khyod kyis 'jigs dang skrag/
196b2(mdo): pa dang bcas te 'byin par 'gyur// pha ma khyod kyi skyabs ma yin// mdza' bshes rtsa lag rnams kyang myan// de dag gis ni khyod bor nas// ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du 'gro// 'jigs 'gyur 'jigs par myed mdzad cing //
196b3(mdo): skyabs myed skyob pa'i sangs rgyas dang // chos dang tshogs mchog dge 'dul la// der ni skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// lha dang dri za myi rnams la// gang dag de la skyabs song ba// 'jigs pa kun las thar par 'gyur// bde 'gro
196b4(mdo): rnyed pa'i dka' ba myed// de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u des// tshigs su ba cad pa de dag thos nas/ dga' mgu zhing yid rangs te// 'jigs skrag ba dang bral nas/ dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ shi ba'i ro//
196b5(mdo): myags pa de bor nas// nags khrod de nas byung ngo // de nas bcom lda na 'das kyis tshong dpon gyi bu de gdul ba'i dbang gi phyir sku las 'o ra/ btu byung ste/ 'od des yul ma ka da thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur/
196b6(mdo): khye'u de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa ra pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba dang 'dra bar/ zi brjid dang dpal gis 'bar ba/ mdzes pa dga' bar bya ba
196b7(mdo): dbang po zha ba thugs zhi ba/ dul ba mchog mtshungs pa myed pa/ dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa/ gser gi mchod sdong ltar mngon du 'bar ba/ glang po che ltar dbang po dul cing / bsrungs pa mtsho ltar dang zhing gsal la/ rnyog pa
196b8(mdo): myed pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa/ nyan thos kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas chos ston cing bzhugs par rgya ba ring mo nas mthong ngo // de'i lam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po
196b9(mdo): che'i lan kan bres pa/ me tog bkram pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang khye'u de'i mdun du bgreng nas/ khye'u de la 'di skad ces smras so// khye'u khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong nas/ seMs
197a1(mdo): rab tu dang bar gyur pa ni/ rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa yang khyod kyis la dgongs kyis/ khye'u khyod lam 'dir zhugs la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig/ de nas khye'u/
197a2(mdo): de lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khye'u de la khye'u khyod kyis/ me tog 'di dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor cig ces
197a3(mdo): me tog man da ra ba thu ba gang yang byin no// de nas khye'u des me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gtor nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom
197a4(mdo): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gso yad to// bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la/ skyabs su mchi'o// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yang / bla na myed pa
197a5(mdo): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o// bcom/ ldan 'das bdag gis yul gi bzang mo/ rgyal pos thugs thugs/ su chud pa gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bgyi ba zhig/ dga' bar
197a6(mdo): ba'i slad du/ skyed mos tshal du/ khrid pa las/ bcom ldan 'das de mdog yal zhing myags te/ nye du'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang spangs nas bdag kyang 'jigs pa chen po skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni li lan
197a7(mdo): gse bdag rgyal pos bkum du myi mchi lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa khye'u ma dogs shig/ sangs rgyas la skyabs su song ba rnams la/ 'jigs pa phyis mya 'byung bas/ ngas khyod myi 'jigs pas/
197a8(mdo): 'gon du gnyer gos/ 'jigs pa ma skyed cig/ khye'u de lta mod kyi gzhi gang las 'jigs pa dang / skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi de yongs su spongs shig/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jigs pa dang skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi gang lag/
197a9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ni 'jigs pa dang skrag par 'gyur ba'i gzhi'o// nga'i snyam pa'i rgyal ni gzhi'o// lta ba'i kun nas ldang ba ni gzhi'o// sred pas lhag par chags
197b1(mdo): pa ni gzhi'o// ra 'dzin pa dang / nga'i di 'dzin pa ni gzhi'o// dngos po la mngon par zhen pa ni gzhi'o// yongs su 'dzin pa sa rtsod pa ni gzhi'o// 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i 'ching ba ni gzhi'o// myi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes/
197b2(mdo): pa ni gzhi'o// sdug bsngal ba bde bar 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o// myi sdug pa la sdug par 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o// bdag myed pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa ni gzhi'o// phung po rnams la yongs su 'dzind pa pa ni gzhi'o//
197b3(mdo): khams rnams la so sor myi rtog pa ni gzhi'o// skye mched rnams yongs su myi shes pa ni gzhi'o// lus la skyon tu myi lta ba ni gzhi'o// srog la mngon par dga' ba ni gzhi ste/ khye'u gzhi de dag las 'jigs pa dang skrag pa 'byung
197b4(mdo): bas de dag spang bar bya'o// khye'u khyod kyis bu mo de'i lus rnam par zhig pa mthong ngam// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ khye'u 'dus byas thams
197b5(mdo): cad na de ltar myi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba bdag myed pa/ rnam par/ 'gyur ba'i chos can/ myi brtan pa zer zug ma yin pa/ byis pa la/ dri pa/ log pa las byung ba/ ga pa las byung ba/ g.yo la
197b6(mdo): myed pa/ rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ myed pa las sdang bas sgyums lta bu'o// 'khrul par snang bas smyig rgyu lta bu'o// bzod ma nas ma skyes pas myig g.yor lta bu'o// las kyi rnam par sbyin pa chung myi
197b7(mdo): za ba'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan lta bu'o// 'pho ba myed pa'i tshul gis chu zla lta bu'o// sgra myed pa las smrar go bar byed pas brag cha lta bu'o// mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa'i sgo yin pas grim ma'i myi gzugs lta bu'o// rang bzhin
197b8(mdo): gis ya ma rA yin pas chang ba stong pa lta bu'o// gzung du myed pa'o// rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// rdzun pa'o// gzhi myed pa'o// gsog go// 'grib pa'i myed pa'o// rdzogs pa myed pa'o// khye'u de ltar na chos thams cad ni bdag po/
197b9(mdo): myed pa ste/ de la khyod mngon par zhen par myi bya'o// khye'u 'di ci snyam du sems/ khyod kyis 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i rtog pa dang / dpyod pa gang yin pa de dag ji ltar mthong / khye'us gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byis pa so so'i skye
198a1(mdo): kho rnams kyi 'dod chags dang ni kha dog dang / dbyibs bzang po las yongs su brtags pas skyes lags so// de ni 'phags pa'i chos 'dul ba la/ myi gtsang ba la stsogs pa so sor brtags pas myi 'byung ste/ bcom ldan
198a2(mdo): 'das de la myi rtog na/ 'dod chags kyi kun tu 'byung ba/ kun tu 'byung bar myi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khye'u legs so// legs so// 'di lta ste/ mya rtog cing rnam par mya
198a3(mdo): rtog pa 'di ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin yin no// khye'u khyod kyis bdag tu lta ba myed pa dang / gzhan du lta bar spro 'dogs pa myed pa dang / chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson par bya'o// khye'us gsol pa/ bcom
198a4(mdo): ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' chos la tshul bzhin du sems par brtson pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa lad pa/ khye'u byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin gyis
198a5(mdo): byang chub yongs su tshol lo// khye'u de bzhin du byang chub sems da/ pa' ni/ zhe sdang gi rang bzhin dang / gti mug gi rang bzhin dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyis byang chub yongs su tshol lo/
198a6(mdo): khye'u ji ltar 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dngos po myed pa de ltar chos thams cad la byang chub sems dpa'i shes pa 'dug go// khye'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams ni rtse ba myed pa gnas/
198a7(mdo): myed pa gzhi myed pa/ byed pa po myed pa/ nang dang phyi rol dben pa/ stong pa bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang bral ba/ mtshan ma myed pa dang / mtshan mar rtog pa ra
198a8(mdo): bral ba/ smon pa myed pa/ mngon par dga' ba myed pa dga' ba dang / sred pa dang bral ba/ mngon par 'du byed pa myed pa rang bzhin myed pa'o// khye'u 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug ji ltar ba de bzhin du/ chos thos
198a9(mdo): cad la byang chub sems dpa' shes pa 'jug go// khye'u gzhan yang tshul bzhin la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed pa thams cad ni byang chub yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni/ bstan
198b1(mdo): tu myed pa/ smon pa myed pa dang / rnam par rig pa myed pa dang / sgyu ma'i rang bzhin lta bu dang / nang ma yin pa dang / phyi rol ma yin pa dang / gzhan dang ldan pa ma yin pas/ gzugs myed pa ste/ khye'u de nyid byang chub seMs/
198b2(mdo): dpa'i byang chub yin te/ khye'u byang chub sems dpas/ rang gi sems rtogs pa ma rtogs par/ khong du chud par bya ba gzhan ci yang myed do// rang gi sems rtogs pa gang yin pa de nyid/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rtogs
198b3(mdo): gigis dben pas sem pa thams cad kyi sems dpe do// rang gi mas kyi ring bzhin gis/ seMs can thos cad kyi rang bzhin no// rang gi sems rnam par dag pas sems can thams cad kyi sems rnam par dag go// rang gi sems 'dod chags dang bral bas/ sems can thams/
198b4(mdo): cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang bral lo// rang gi sems la zhe sdang myed pas// sems can thams cad kyi sems la zhe sdang myed do// rang gi sems la gti mug myed pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la gta mug myed do// rang
198b5(mdo): ga sems la nyon mongs pa myed pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sem/ sa la nyon mongs pa myed do// de ltar rtogs pa gang yin pa de thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes rtogs pa yin no// khye'u de ltar tshul bzhin la
198b6(mdo): brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpas ni/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la rang bzhin gis kun nas nyon mongs pa myed par rab tu shes so// gang blo bur gi nyon mongs pas nye bar nyon mongs pas kyang sems kyi rgyud
198b7(mdo): la ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ba yang myed la/ chos kyi rigs pa'i lhag mthong gis/ de dag la yongs su gdung ba yang myed de/ des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ glo bur gi nyon mongs pa rnams ma mthong bas na/ kun
198b8(mdo): nas nyon mongs par myi 'gyur ro// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ tshob dpon ki bu 'jigs byin chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa skyes par gyur to// de nas smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal kis/ tshong dpon byi bu de
198b9(mdo): dul bar rig nas lha'i bu mo lnga brgya tsam gis yongs su bskor te/ sil snyan dang / pheka rdob pa dngaklu dbyangs len pa dag byed cing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs
199a1(mdo): la mgo bos phyog 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gi bu 'jigs byin la 'di skad
199a2(mdo): ces smras so// khye'u khyod kyis sring mo 'di shes saM/ spras pa 'jam dpal 'tshal lags so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ji lta bu shes de nas khye'u des 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la/ tshigs su bcad de
199a3(mdo): smras pa/ gzugs ni dbu ba rdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu'i chu bur bzhin/ 'du shes smyig rgyu lta bu ste// 'du byed rnams ni chu shing bzhin// rnam shes sgyu ma lta bu ste/ yongs su rtogs pas kun tu skyed// byis pas yang dag
199a4(mdo): myin brtags par// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// 'di lus myi g.yo bems po ste// pa dang mig pa lta bu lags// rnam she sa bstan du ma mchis te// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal ba'ang/
199a5(mdo): la sems can bdag ma mchis// srog dang gang zag ma mchis te/ lus 'di sugs pa tsam lags par// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// 'di la 'dod chags sdang ma mchis// gti mug 'byung
199a6(mdo): ba yang ma mchis te/ nyon mongs ma mchis dag ma mchis// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// tshul bzhin ma lags bskrad pa 'di// byis pa rnams kyis 'khrul pa ste/ mkhas pa de la
199a7(mdo): chags par/ de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// dper na 'di ni nags khrod na// shi ba'i ro ni mnam pa bzhin// gzugs ni rang bzhin de 'dra bar// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// 'di na sngon mthar
199a8(mdo): ma skyes te/ phyi mthar 'chi 'phor 'gyur ma mchis// da ltar byung ba ma mchis par// de ltar bdag gis yongs su 'tshal// 'di yis bdag ni brgyal bar 'gyur// myi gtsang ba yis bkrol bas na/ 'jam dbyangs/
199a9(mdo): rnam pa ji ltas kyang // 'di la lan klan rngo mya thog// mya 'gum 'chi 'pho ma mchis kyang // sems can yongs su smyin bgyi slad du/ bdag ni 'chi bar ston bgyid pas// su zhig byang chub tshol myi byed// ji ltar
199b1(mdo): bdag gis chags sdang dang // nyon mongs thams cad tshul bzhin myin// sems can kun gyi mtshan de 'di// 'di ni chos rnams chos nyid lags// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni//
199b2(mdo): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal ki sgo nas 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs/ kha dog du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang ser po dang / dkar po dang / btsod
199b3(mdo): dang / shel dang / dngul gi kha dog lta bu dag byung te/ de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu myed pa dag snang bas khyab byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i
199b4(mdo): gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ bcom ldangan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa mthong nas/ bstan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i skabs la btsugs te
199b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bco/ ma ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsolang to// de bzhin gshegs pa/ dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu dang
199b6(mdo): rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dum pa me dzad pa de'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ de nas de'i tshe tshin/ sa su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhyen la
199b7(mdo): ya mtshan myi mnga' bas// ston pa rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa myi mdzad na// 'di ltar khyod ni 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur pa yi// khyod kyi 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bdag cag shin tu 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal 'dzum mdzad par gyur pa mthong
199b8(mdo): nAs ni// lhar bcas 'gro la 'di dag the tsom skyes par 'gyur// the tsom gyur pa rnams kyis som nyi stsal slad dra du// myi dbang 'dzum po'i rgyu 'di bstan du gsol// gang gis da rang chos rnams ya ni yid bzhag gam// chos
199b9(mdo): nyid du ni rgyal ba la las mthong gyur tam// sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa gang gis dpe bgyis sam// bdag cag de dag nyan par 'tshal lo mya'i gtso// gang gis de ring bdud rnams gzhon dang bcas bcom 'am/
200a1(mdo): gang gis ston pa'i thugs ni de ring bgyes bgyis sam// gang gis de ring 'dus byas rnams kyi gting rtogs sam/ de dag mnyam par 'tshal gis the tsom bsal du gsol// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad pA/
200a2(mdo): rgyu ni nyan slad du// 'gro ba thams cad thal mo sbyar pa bgyis te sdod// rkang gnyis rnams kyi gtso bo thugs rje skyed mdzod la// the tsom 'gyur ba rnams kyi yid gnyis bsal du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
200a3(mdo): kun dga' bo khyod kyis smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mtho lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
200a4(mdo): sra lad pa/ kun dga' bo smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni/ sngon 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin tu bcug ste/ 'dis de las
200a5(mdo): chos thos nas/ chos rnams la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa thob/ par gyur to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs/ byin zhes bya ba 'di mthong ngam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
200a6(mdo): 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong la gso bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ni sa sngor bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
200a7(mdo): 'dzin tu bcug ste 'dis kyang nga las chos thos nas/ chos rnams la mthun pa'i bzod pa thob par gyur to// kun dga' bo spang 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'di ni/ bskal pa 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis
200a8(mdo): 'das pa'i 'og tu bskal pa rin cen 'byung zhes bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rin cen can zhes bya bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
200a9(mdo): rgyas rin cen 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'jig rten gyi khams de'i sems can rnams kyi long spyod dang / nye bar spyod pa ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi ma 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// de na byang chub sems
200b1(mdo): dpa' rin po che dag ma gtogs par/ rin po che gzhan 'byung bar myi 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshe'i tshad ni/ dpag tu myed par 'gyur ro// de bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/
200b2(mdo): pa na/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin ni/ byang chub sems dpa' yo tan rini rje 'od ces bya bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi mdzod 'dzind par byed do// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'od yongs su mya ngan las 'das
200b3(mdo): par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin cen 'od de la/ byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rin cen 'od 'di ni/ nga'i 'og tu bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/
200b4(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bkod pa yang / ngal ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'gyur ro// zhes lung
200b5(mdo): ston par 'gyur ro// smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal/ dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin gnyis lung bstan ma thag tu/ de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi zhams rnam pa drug/
200b6(mdo): tu rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur pa lung bstan pa bshad pa 'di bstan pa na/ srog chags brgyad stong gis tha na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to//
200b7(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mying mi lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ kun dka' bo
200b8(mdo): de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bkod pa chen po 'i le'u zhes bya bar zung shig/ 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ smad 'tsho ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal 'dul ba zhes bya ba ra yang zung zhig/
200b9(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa lang nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / smad 'tshong ma'i bu mo gser mchog 'od dpal dang / tshong dpon gyi bu 'jigs byin dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa dang / byang chub
201a1(mdo): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / myi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
201a2(mdo): pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gi mkhan po su len dra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban
201a3(mdo): de ye shes sdes zhus te/ gtan la phab pa// // / rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya man dzu shri bi ku rbi ta ba ri brta na ma ma ga yan su tra// bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam
201a4(mdo): dpal rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ni/ da bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das mnyan
201a5(mdo): yod na/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon myed zas sbyin kun dga'/ ra ba na/ dge slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po da nga thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun
201a6(mdo): chen po dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa dang / nas gtsang ma'i rigs kyi lA'i bu du ma dag dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor
201a7(mdo): zhing bdun gyis ltas nas chos ston to// de'i tshe lha'i bu 'domang po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur pa te 'dug go// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// de nas lha'i bu
201a8(mdo): 'od mang pos 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bdud par chad byed na/ 'jam dpal byang chub seMs
201a9(mdo): dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu 'od mang po la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu ci tsam du las rnams 'byung ba de tsam du bdud kyi las so//
201b1(mdo): ji tsam du smon pa dang / ji tsam du log par 'dzind pa dang / ji tsam du mchog tu 'dzin pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so// ji tsam du 'dod pa dang / ji tsam du shes pa dang / ji tsam du rlom sems dang / ji tsam du yongs su rtog
201b2(mdo): pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so// sbyin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so// tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus
201b3(mdo): dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi sems la mngon par zhen pa yang bdud kyi las so// sbyin pa rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa dang / bzod pa 'dzin pa dang / brtson 'grus len pa dang /
201b4(mdo): bsam gtan la mtshan ma dang / shes rab rgyu ba yang bdud kyi las so// dgon pa la dga' zhing mos pa'i sems dang btang snyoms su ltung ba yang bdu da kyi las so// 'dod pa nyung ba dang / chog shes pa dang / sbyangs
201b5(mdo): pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa rlom sems su byed pa yang ba dud kyi las so// bdag ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa/ bdag ni maH/ nam myed pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni spong ba myed pa la gnas pa
201b6(mdo): bdag ni spros pa myed pa la gnas pa/ bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bsgrub cing gnas pa'o snyam du rlom sems su byed cing rnam par rtog par yang bdud kyi las so// lha'i bu rtog pa dang rnam
201b7(mdo): par rtog pa dang yongs su rtog pa dang / mthong ba dang thos pa dang bye brag byed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas ji tsam pa de tsam du bdud kyi las so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdud kyi las gang las
201b8(mdo): byung / 'jam dpal gis smras pa/ lha'i bu bdud kyi las mi gyon pa las byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu brtson pa la bdud glags tshol gyis// myi brtson pa la bdud kyis ci zhig bya bar 'gyur te/ de nyid bdud kyi
201b9(mdo): las yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar brtson pa yin/ ji ltar na myi brtson pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ji tsam du gnyis la sbyor ba de tsam du brtson pa ma yin no//
202a1(mdo): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gnas pa ni gnyis la sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o// lha'i bu brtson pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ sbyor ba yang dag pa'i tshig bla dgas so// sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sbyor ba myed pa'i/
202a2(mdo): tshig bla dgas so// sbyor ba myed pa zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// 'di ni sbyor ba yang dag pa'i chog bla dgas so// lha'i bu gang na myig la myi sbyor ba dang / gzugs la myi sbyor ba 'di ni byang chub ses
202a3(mdo): dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gang rna ba la myi sbyor ba dang / sgra la myi sbyor ba dang / sna la myi sbyor ba dang / dri la myi sbyor ba dang / lce la myi sbyor ba dang / lus la myi sbyor ba dang / reg bya la myi sbyor ba dang / yid la
202a4(mdo): myi sbyor ba dang / chos la myi sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang nyon mongs pa thams cad la yang myi sbyor ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa
202a5(mdo): spangs pa'i phyir yang brtson pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang khams ka sum pa thams cad la yang myi sbyor la/ khams gsum du gtogs
202a6(mdo): pa'i sems can rnams kyang 'byung bar sbyor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sbyin la la rlom sems myed pa yang sbyor la/ sems can ser sna can sdud
202a7(mdo): par yang sbyor ba dang / tshul khrims la rlom sems myed par yang sbyor la/ sems can tshul khrims 'tshal ba sdud par yang sbyor ba dang / bzod pa la rlom sems myed par yang spyor la/ sems can gnod sems can
202a8(mdo): sdud par yang sbyor ba dang / brtson 'grus la rlom sems myed par yang sbyor la/ sems can le lo can sdud par yang sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan la rlom sems myed par yang sbyor la/ sems can rnams rnam par
202a9(mdo): g.yengs par sdud par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab la rlom sems myed par sbyor la/ sems can shes rab 'chal pa can sdud par yang sbyor ba 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa zhes bya'o//
202b1(mdo): gzhan yang stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed par yang sbyor la/ lta bar song ba thams cad dang / yang bral zhing lta bar song ba las rnam par grol ba yang ma yin pa ni/ stong pa nyid la sbyor ba ste/ stong pa nyid gang gis
202b2(mdo): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid des/ lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa dang / stong pa nyid gang gis lta bar gyur pa rnams stong pa'i stong pa nyid ngos chos thams cad stong par 'du shes shing / shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal
202b3(mdo): yang myed pa gang yin pa 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang mtshan ma myed pa la rlom sems myed par yang sbyor la/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing rnam par rtog/
202b4(mdo): pa las grol ba yang ma yin pa ni mtshan ma myed pa la sbyor ste/ sa par rtog pa gang gis mtshan ma myed pa la rnam par rtog pa'i rnam par rtog pa de yang mtshan ma myed pa dang / mnyam zhing rnam par rtog pa
202b5(mdo): de dang / mtshan ma myed pa yang mtshan ma myed par rnam par shes shing shes pa la/ lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang myed pa/ gang yi/ na ba 'di yang / byang chub sems dpa' sbyor ba yang dag pa'o//
202b6(mdo): gzhan yang smon pa myed pa la rlom sems myed par yang sbyor la/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor te// de smon lam 'debs kyang / sems kyi bag la nyal bar
202b7(mdo): myi byed cing / smon lam 'debs kyang smon lam gyis rgyu ba yang myed la/ skye yang skye zhing mtha' gnyis gar lta ba dang bral ba 'di lta ste/ rar 'dzind pa dang / nga'i ra 'dzin pa'i lta
202b8(mdo): pa dang bral bar gyurd cing/ skye yang skye la/ 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba dang yang bral bar yin te/ 'di shes shing shes pa la lhag pa'i nga rgyal yang myed pa/ gang yin pa 'di yang
202b9(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor ba yang dag pa'o// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa/ yang dag phul ni gar/ shes rab kyi shes pas
203a1(mdo): brtson pa yang med la/ thabs kyi shes pas dge ba'i chos thams cad srud par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa dang / srog
203a2(mdo): myed pa dang / gso ba myed pa dang / kar zag myed par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par yang shes rab kyi shes pas chos thams cad blang ba myed pa
203a3(mdo): dang / dor ba myed pa dang / yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer myed par yang sbyor la
203a4(mdo): thabs kyi shes pas sangs rgyas thams cad la bla mar bya ba dang / gus par bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / rim 'gro byed pa yang sbyor pa dang / shes rab kyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi/
203a5(mdo): zhing thams cad nam mkha' zhing du yang sbyor la/ thabasakyi shes pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa yongs/ su sbyong ba'i rgyan la yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi zhes pas
203a6(mdo): 'phags pa thams cad 'dus ma byas kyi bar du phye bar yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi zhes pas 'phags pa thams cad la bla ma dang gus pa dang / rim mo byed par yang sbyor gang/ shes rab kyi zhes pas// sangs rgyas
203a7(mdo): kyi sku bad pa myed pa so sor rtog par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / rgyan la yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi zhes pas 'du byed thams cad ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar sos
203a8(mdo): rtog pa yang sbyor la babs kyi shes pas/ bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas
203b1(mdo): sba ba dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / smon lam snang ba ston pam yang spor ba dang / shes rab kyi zhes pas mngon par shes pa skye ba byed na yang stso la// zhabs kyi shes pas// mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'grul
203b2(mdo): par sar spor ba dang / shes rab kyigs pas// phung po dang rnams dang / skye sa med ma skyes pa dang / kyi tshogs par yang spong sa// thabs kyi shes pas// phung po dang / lags dang / snre mche yongs su 'dod 'ar
203b3(mdo): yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi zhes pas/ srid pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs par byed par yang sbyor la// thabs kyi shes pas/ 'khor ba na sems can yongs su sbyin par byed par yang sbyor ba dang /
203b4(mdo): shes rab kyi zhes pas/ shes rab kyi myig la yang sbyor la// bab chos kyi zhes pas// lha'i myig mngon par sgrubs pa la yang sbyor bdang / gis rab kyi shes pas/ chos brjod du myed par khor du chud
203b5(mdo): bar byed par yang sbyor la/ babs kyi zhes pas de yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis// chos ston par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas/ don dang rjo so so yang dag par rig pa la yang sbyor la// thangs kyi zhes pas// nges pa'i
203b6(mdo): tshig dang / spobs pa so so la bdag par rig pa la yang myor ba dang / shes rab kyi zhes pas/ sems can gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa la yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes mas
203b7(mdo): so so ci rigs par chos ston par yang sbyor ba dang / shes rab kyi shes pas// sems can gyi spyod pa// brgyad khri bzhi stong khong du chud par byed par yang sbyor la/ thabs kyi shes pas// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang dag
203b8(mdo): babyed pa pa byung pa na pa'i bum chum po'i pang rnas bye pa pa dag ga ga sus so las so sa martsor sa pazhi das sa chu tsam pa se / don ni khropo kya semams
204a1(mdo): myi lci ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyor ba yang dag pa 'di bshad
204a2(mdo): pa legs so// legs so zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas lha'i bu 'od mang pos// 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas gang
204a3(mdo): ga phyir legs so zhes bya ba byin nas/ mi khyod dga' bar 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang sprul pas sprul pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin na/ sprul pa de la
204a4(mdo): tsaM dga' bar 'gyur ba lta yod dam/ lha'i bus spras pa/ jam dpal sprul pa la rjes su chags pa yang myed/ khong khro ba ya du myed na/ de la dga' bar 'gyur ba ci zhig yod/ 'jam dpal/
204a5(mdo): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang / sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa yo/ nga de'i mtshan nyid la// 'jam dpal yang de'i mtshan nyid yin
204a6(mdo): na de la legs so zhes bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci zhig yod pa'i lha'i bu 'di lnga ste dper na/ brag cha ni smra snyan ba dang / myi snyan pa rnams la rjes su chags par yang myi 'gyur
204a7(mdo): khong khro bar yang myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de bzhin du chos thams cad ni/ brag tsho'i ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yang de'i rang bzhin/ 'jam dpal yang de'i rang bzhin yin na/ de la legs
204a8(mdo): so zhes bya bas kho bo dga' bar 'gyur du ci yod/ lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas su la legs so zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu rnam par shes pa myi gnas par
204a9(mdo): ston pa dang / bstan pa thams cad sa su'i blo thogs par myi 'gyur ba dang / su sems can thams cad la sems can du 'du shes myi 'jug pa dang / su chos thams cad la chos su 'du shes myi 'jug pa dang / su
204b1(mdo): bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gnas la/ sbyor ba 'khor ba na yang gnas pa dang / su bdud kyi las khong du chud nas bdud kyi las kyang sangs rgyas kyi phrin las su shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las la mngon
204b2(mdo): par zhen na/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las kyang bdud kyi las su shes pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas legs pas legs so zhes bya ba gnang ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ja
204b3(mdo): dpal khyod ci la lta ba'i chos dang ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la legs so zhes bya ba gdang ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di snyam du sems gang mnyam pa nyid de la myi mnyam pa yang yod dam/
204b4(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal mnyam pa nyid la/ myi mnyam pa gang yang myed do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid gad mnyam pa de dang / mtshams myed pa mnyam mo// mtshams myed pa gang dang mnyam
204b5(mdo): ba de dang kho bo mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid gang mnyam pa de dang / de lta bar gyur pa rnams mnyam mo// lta bar gyur pa rnams gang dang / mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de
204b6(mdo): phyin ci log rnams mnyam mo// phyin ci log rnams gang dang mnyam pa de dang kho bo mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid ga pa dang mnyam ba de dang dmyigs pa mnyam mo// dmyig pa gang mnyam pa de dang
204b7(mdo): kho bo mnyam mo// mnyam pa nyid gang dang mnyam pa de dang / 'khor ba'i mtha' mnyam mo// 'khor ba'i gang dang mnyam pa de dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' mnyam mo// mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' gang mnyam pa de dang /
204b8(mdo): bdag gi mtha' mnyam mo// bdag gi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam mo// yang dag pa'i mtha' gangapa dang mnyam pade dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa'i mtha' mnyam mo// srid pa
204b9(mdo): dang / sred pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtha' mnyam mo// rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
205a1(mdo): gti mug gi mtha' mnyam mo// 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi mtha' kang dang mnyam pa de dang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang / 'dus
205a2(mdo): byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo// 'dus byas kyi mtha' gang dang / mnyam pa de dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' mnyam mo// 'dus ma byas kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa de dang / 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa mnyam ste/ lha'i bu
205a3(mdo): mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad mnyam mo// de la su 'chad pa dang / gang bshad pa dang / kapal bshad pa dang / su la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin pa'i chos de dag thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam ste/
205a4(mdo): nam mkha' yang 'dus ma byas yin pas/ nam mkha' na mnyam pa yang myed/ myi mnyam pa myed de/ su rjes su myi 'gro ba'i tshul gyis mnyam pa nyid 'di dag gi rjes su song ba de la de bzhin gshegs pas legs so zhes bya
205a5(mdo): ba gnang ngo // lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod legs so zhe/ sa bya ba dang / legs so zhes bya ba yin pa las bsams te/ chos bstand pa la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
205a6(mdo): lha'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pas/ byang chub kyi phyir 'jug pa ni legs pa'o// g.yo dang smras nye bar spyod pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// snyi brje chen pos sems can myi gtong ba ni/ legs pa'o// sems
205a7(mdo): can rnams la rnam par 'tshe ba ni legs pa'i ma yin pa'o// sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa myed pa'i sems ni legs pa'o// gnod sems kyi bsam pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// nyes 'byung ba myi 'chab cing 'chags
205a8(mdo): te/ rnam par 'byed la kun nas bsko rang pa myed par gnas pa ni legs pa'o// nyes byung ba 'chab pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// bdag gis 'thus pa la so sor rtogs pa ni legs pa'o// gzhan yang 'khrus pa'i
205a9(mdo): skyon tshol ba ni/ legs pa ma yin pa'o// byas pa gzo ba dang / byas pa shes pa dang / byas pa chud kyi gzon pa dang / byas pa lan tu phan 'dogs pa yi legs pa'o// byas pa myi gzo ba dang / byas pa myi shes pa dang
205b1(mdo): byas pa chud gzon pa dang / byas pa la lan du phan myi 'dogs pa ni/ legs pa ma yin pa'o// thos pa yang dag par sgrub pa ni legs pa'o// thos pa legs par sgrub pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// bslab pa yang dag
205b2(mdo): par blangs pas/ mnyam pa ni legs pa'o// bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa las 'da' ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// dben pa la sems gzhol zhing dben pa la dga' ba ni legs pa'o// 'du 'jil dga'
205b3(mdo): pa na legs pa'i ma yin pa'o// dgon pa la gnas par lus dang srog 'dor ba ni legs pa'o// lus dang srog la lte ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// 'phags pa'i rigs pa yang dag par dga' ba dang / rung ba rnams la chod rig pa
205b4(mdo): ni legs pa'o// chos myi shes shing 'dod pa tshe la/ sdig pa 'dod pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// nyam chung chung ba rnams la bzod cing dang du len/ pa mi legs pa'o// sems can rnams spa 'bebs pa ni legs
205b5(mdo): pa ma yin pa'o// 'tsho ba dag pa ni legs pa'o// snyoms ka/ sa can ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// skyabs su song ba rnams myi gto/ nga ba ni legs pa'o// skyabs su song ba rnams myi gtong ba ni lekra/
205b6(mdo): pa'o// skyabs su song ba rnams la 'khu ba ni legs pa ma yin ba'o// dam bcas pa las myi nyams pa ni tshig bden pa dang / ji ska da smras pa bzhin byed pa ni lags pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad
205b7(mdo): las slu ba na legs pa ma yin no// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni legs pa'o// dam pa'i chos spong ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// thos pa la ser sna myed cing chos la slob dpon gyis dpe 'khyud myed de/ zang zad/
205b8(mdo): byed par chos ston pa ni legs pa'o// chos la ser sna myed cing chos la slob dpo kya ma byung byed de/ bang zing dang 'brel pa'i sems kyis mos ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// sems can yongs su sbyin pa'i thabs da
205b9(mdo): ldan pa'i sdug bsngal ni legs pa'o// sems can la myi lta zhing thabs dang myi ldan pa'i dngos po ston pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// pha rol tu phyind pa drug tshol ba ni legs pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi myi 'thun
206a1(mdo): ba'i phyogs ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// shes pas byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa'o// nga rgyal gyis byas pa'i las rnams ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// mdza' ba bstan pa ni legs pa'o// ngan pa dang /
206a2(mdo): bshes pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la sten pa ni legs pa'o// myi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam du zhugs pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// sdig pa'i las thams cad myi spyod pa ni legs pa'o// sdig pAM/
206a3(mdo): las thams cad la zhugs pa ni myi legs pa'o// sna'i bu dmyigs pa can gyi rab tu byung ba ni/ sogs pa ma yin pa'o// stong pa nyid smra ba'i mngon par 'byung ba ni legs pa'o// 'jig rten rgyang phan po'i gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri ni
206a4(mdo): legs pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sde snod rab tu thob pa'i dam pa'i mchog gi gtam smra ba'i seng ge'i khri ni legs pa'o// tshul khrims 'chal pa sa dad pas byin pa spyad pa ni legs pa ma yin pa'o//
206a5(mdo): tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i 'thob pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshig/ sa su bcad pa thams cad ni legs pa'o// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can kyi byang chub ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// skrag pa'i nga rgyal myed par
206a6(mdo): shes pa brda' sprod pa ni legs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnam sa la gnod par sems pa ni/ legs pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston pa tsam du 'phangs par 'dzin pa ni sogs
206a7(mdo): pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i mying gis rnyed pas 'tsho ba ni legs pa ma yin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yang dag par sgrub pa rnyed pa ni legs pa'o// lha'i bu de ltar na mi tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i
206a8(mdo): bka' dang 'gal ba de tsam du thams cad legs pa ma yin pa'o// ji tsam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang 'thud pa de tsam du thams cad legs pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyong ci legs so zhes
206a9(mdo): bya ba'i chos la brtson nas/ 'on te legs pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu the bo ni legs so zhes bya ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin/ legs pa ma yin pa
206b1(mdo): zhes bya ba'i chos la bzod pa yang lnga yin no// de ci'i phyir nen/ gA'i bu mo so na chos thams cad la bzod pa ma yin pa'o// kwa'i bus smras pa/ 'das dpas khyod ci dge ba'i ngoms kyi brtson dam/ 'jam dpas
206b2(mdo): gyis smras pa/ sA'i bu kho bo ni dge ba'i chos la bcom pa yang ma yin/ myi dge ba'i chos la brtson pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so// myi dge ba zhes
206b3(mdo): bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so// myi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'di yang 'dus byas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod mi 'dus ma byas pa 'am/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gal te 'dus byas kyis
206b4(mdo): skrag pa sta na ni kho bo 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ro// sna'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal khyod ci 'dus byas kyis myi skrag gam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te yang dag par 'dus byas kyi yongs su grub pa
206b5(mdo): zhig mthong na ni/ 'o bo 'dus byas kyis skrag par 'gyur ro// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis yang dag par 'dus byas kyi yongs su grub pa ma mthong ngam/ 'jam dpal kyis smras
206b6(mdo): pa/ spu'i bu kho bo na yang dag par 'dus kyi chos yongs su grub pa mthong ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi yang ma yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dus byas su gtogs sam/ 'on te 'dus
206b7(mdo): byas su gtogs 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo na 'dus byas su rtogs pa ma yin/ 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na// gal te 'dus byas su gtogs par gyur na ni/
206b8(mdo): byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gal te 'dus ma byas su gtogs par gyur na ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal
206b9(mdo): gal te khyod 'dus byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin na/ khyod ji ltar shes par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ kapa de bzhin
207a1(mdo): gshegs pas sprulang pa 'dus byas su gtogs sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas su gtogs/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ni 'dus byas mu rtogs pa yang ma yin/ 'dus/
207a2(mdo): ma byas su gtogs pa yang ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa sprul pa'i chos kyi de bzhin nyid ji 'dra ba de 'dra bar kho bo shes par gyis shig/ lha'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshes
207a3(mdo): pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ gzugs la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa/ de ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa/ de ni 'dus byas
207a4(mdo): la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa/ de mi 'dus ma byas la gnas sam/ smras pa ma yin no// smras pa/ de bzhi na gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas/ smras pa/ 'jam
207a5(mdo): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni gang la yang myi gan sa so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par shes pa gang la gnas pa de la kho bo gnas par shes pa
207a6(mdo): bya'o// lha'i bu ste smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin nyid kyi 'ong ba myed pa dang / 'gro ba myed pa gang yin pa de nyid kho bo'i 'gro ba
207a7(mdo): de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'gro ba ste/ des ni kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang de ltar 'ongs pas/ de bas ni kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid ji lta bar kho bo yang de ltar
207a8(mdo): gnas te/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bu 'jam dpal zhes bya ba 'di ni/ de bzhin nyid ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// de bzhin nyid sems myed cing zhi ba'i
207a9(mdo): phyir/ 'jam dpal yang sems myed cing zhi ba ste/ des na kho bo de bzhin gshegs pa'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin nyid gang du btsal bar bya// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de
207b1(mdo): bzhin nyid ni lta bar song ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis rnams su btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ lta bar song ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis po gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu lta bA song ba drug bcu rtsa gnyis/
207b2(mdo): po dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa myi 'khrugs pa'i chos can gyi rnam par grol ba las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam
207b3(mdo): dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni sems can gyi sems can kyi spyod pa dang / bsam pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can thams cad kyi
207b4(mdo): spyod pa dang / bsam pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi yul du'o// lA'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi yul gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam
207b5(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sems can gi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma yin pa thams cad shes pa las btsal bar bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod ci ltar 'dir shes pa nyung bar
207b6(mdo): gyur pa de lta bur ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni sus kyang kun shes pa 'am/ rna ma par shes par myi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu
207b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes ni chags pa myed pa/ rnam par rtog pa myed pa brjod du myed pa/ bstan du myed pa/ sbyor ba byed pa tshig myed par/ sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba ste/ de sus
207b8(mdo): kyang kun shes par ram/ rnam par shes par myi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gal te sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kun shes par bya ba ma yin na/ nyan thos 'di dag gis kun shes par ga la
207b9(mdo): 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang phyir myi ldog pa la gnas par ka la 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang yi ge rnams kyis ye shes de bstan pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
208a1(mdo): kyi thabs te/ ye shes de ni yi ge myed pa'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na/ mye btsugs pa las mye myi 'byung ki// gtsub shing gtsugs pa las mye 'byung ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas
208a2(mdo): gal te thog pho nar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan na/ sems can gang gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes de/ kun shes par myi 'gyur bas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gtsugs
208a3(mdo): shing gi gtam gyis ye shes de bstan te/ ye shes de ni yi ge myed pa'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal gtsub shing gi gtam gang / 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ spu'i bu gang ji yang rung ste/ sdom pa ra/
208a4(mdo): yo byad bsnyungs pa'i gtam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i gtam dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la 'jug pa'i gtam 'di ni gtsub shing gi gtam zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gtsub
208a5(mdo): shing gi gtam ma yin pa'i gtam gang // 'jam dpal gyis smra/ sa pa/ lha'i bu gtam gang skye ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / gnas pa'i gtam ma yin pa dang / 'dren pa dang / se lad pa'i gtam yin
208a6(mdo): ba dang / gtam gang kun nas nyon mongs pa yongs su brjod pa 'i gtam ma yin pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i phan yon gyi gtam ma yin pa dang gtam gang 'khor ba la yid 'byung bar bya ba'i gtam ma yI
208a7(mdo): ba dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par dga' bar bya ba ma yin pa'i gtam dang / gtam yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ spang bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ bsgom par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon
208a8(mdo): sum du bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / gtam gang thob par bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa 'di ni/ lha'i bu dag pa snying po yod pa'i gtam mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal
208a9(mdo): gtam 'di lta bu brjod pa'i tshe/ myag gis myi rtsol bar bya ba'i phyir bdud sdig can 'dir myi 'ong ba ngo mtshar to// tshig de smras nas/ ring po ma lon par de'i mod la bdud sdig can steng gi bar snang la sprin chen po 'khrugs
208b1(mdo): par mngon par sprul nas/ sgra chen po 'ang ro phyung ba dang / des thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de sngangs skrag nas/ sgra skad kyi nga ro 'di lta bu su zhig gi snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzho/
208b2(mdo): nur gyur da pa la bka' stsal dpa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis bdud sdig can gyi 'gyur ba mthong ngam/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol da pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mtho lags so// de
208b3(mdo): nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas de'i tshe/ bdud sngag can bcing ba dam pos bcings ste/ sa'i steng du ltung ba de lta bu'i bsam pa bsams pa dang / bdag ni bcing ba dam pos bcings so// bdag ni bcings pa
208b4(mdo): dam pos bcings so zhes smra 'byind to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig pa can bcing ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i bcings pa gzhan yod de/ des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khyod kyis khong du ma chud do// de yang gang zhe
208b5(mdo): na/ 'di lta ste/ nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gyi 'ching ba dang / phyi na ci log gi 'ching ba dang / sred pa dang / lta ba'i 'ching ba ste/ sdig can 'di ni 'ching ba 'di bas ches dam pa'i chos 'ching ba dam po
208b6(mdo): gzhan yin te// des khyod rtag tu bcings kyang khong du ma chud do/ bdud kyis spras pa/ 'jam dpal thong shig dang bdag gi gnas su 'gro'o// yang bdud kyi las myi bya'o// 'jam dpal gyis smas
208b7(mdo): pa/ sdig can sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa khyod kyis bya dgos na/ kho bo ci'i phyir gtang / bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdud ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin na/ bdag gis
208b8(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ji ltar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ sdig can gang sangs rgyas kyi mngang pa bdud byed du bzhugs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs dang / shes rab kyi shes pa rnam par sprul
208b9(mdo): pa'o// gang sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar ma yin te gang bdud/ sangs rgyas kyi mjeb byed pa 'di ni rab tu ngo mtshar to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur da pas de'i tshe/ gang sdig
209a1(mdo): can sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan pa dang / 'gyur ba'i byin kyis rlabs de lta bu byin kyis brlabs so//
209a2(mdo): de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshe dang ldan pa bdag ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / kho bo dras pa lung bstan pas khyed kyi sems rangs par bya'o zhes tshig de skad smras so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig
209a3(mdo): can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can dge slong rnal 'byor da spyod pa'i 'ching ba gang yin// bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po bsam gtan gyi ro myang bar byed pa ni/ dge slong rnal 'byor de spyod pa'i 'ching
209a4(mdo): ba'o// zhi gnas de la chags pa dang / 'du shes myed 'du shes myin skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid la snying por 'du shes pa dang / lta bar song ba rnams la bas lad par 'du shes
209a5(mdo): pa dang mtshan ma myed pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / mtsha/ na ma rnams la bsald par 'du shes pa dang / smon pa myed pa la/ snying por 'du shes pa dang / smon lam la bstsal par 'du shes pa
209a6(mdo): dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la snying por 'du shes pa dang / 'kho ra ba las pas lad par 'du shes pa 'di dag ni btsun pa 'od srung chen po dge slong rnal 'byor de spyod pa'i 'ching ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun
209a7(mdo): ba 'od srung chen po lta bsdogs la nas/ stong pa nyid bsgom par bya ba ma yin gyi// lta bang song ba nyid stong pa nyid do// mtshan ma bsngal nas mtshan ma myed pa sgom par bya ba ma yin gyi/ mtshan ma'i ngo bo nyid
209a8(mdo): mtshan ma myed pa'o// smon lam stsal nas spod pa myed pa'ang sgom par bya ba ma yin gyi// smon lam gyi ngo bo nyid mtshan nyid kyis smon pa myed pa'o// 'khor ba stsal nas mya ngan las 'das pa bsgom par bya ba ma yin
209a9(mdo): gyi/ 'khor bar dmyigs pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o// btsun pa 'od srung chen po mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni 'du shes dang / rlom sems dang / mtshan ma la dmyigs pa thams cad la myi spyod pa ste/ mya
209b1(mdo): ngan las 'das pa ni skye ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / zad pa las ma yin gyi// rang bzhin gyis skye ba myed pa nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ dge slong lnga brgya nye bar len pa myed par zag pa rdzas
209b2(mdo): las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas gnas rten rab 'byor kyis dge slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag sus btul/ dge slong de dag gis smras pa/ gang thob pa yang myed la/ mngon par rdzogs
209b3(mdo): par sangs rgyas pa yang myed pas so// rab 'byor kyis spras pa/ btu lad pa de ji lta bu/ smras pa/ ji ltar gnas pa nyid kyi phyir/ cung zad kyang khrid pa yang myed ma khrid pa yang myed de/ ji ltar gnas pa bzhin du shes
209b4(mdo): pa dang / bskyed pa yang myed/ bkag pa yang myed de/ mnyam pa nyid du shes pa de ltar bdag cag btul lo// dge slong de dag gis bstand pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu stong nyis brgya chos rnams la chos kyi myig rdul
209b5(mdo): myed cing dri dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas brtan rab 'byord gzhan yang bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces sdig can ji ltar na dge slong sbyin gnas yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor
209b6(mdo): nam dge slong len pa yang myed gnod pa yang phye dad cing dang yang cad las kyang yongs su spyod pa na'o// btsun pa rab 'byor da gang dge slong gang la byin pa de la sgyu ma'i blo dang / gang len pa de la myig g.yor gyi
209b7(mdo): blo dang / nye bar len pa'i sems dang / nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems kyis kyang / yongs su myi spyod pa'i dge slong 'di lta bu ni sbyin gnas pa yin no// sha ri'i bus spras pa/ sdig can bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin
209b8(mdo): dang 'khrugs pa myed par gsungs pa gang yin bdud kyis smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dgang la brten nas shin tu zad pa'i phyir zad pa yang zad par myi byed/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir skyes
209b9(mdo): pa yang myi skyed/ myong ba myed pa yang myong bar myi byed de/ chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis snyoms par 'jug par shes la/ shes nas kyang tshor ba thams cad 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par
210a1(mdo): 'jug cing / mnyam par yang mthong la cung zad kyang mthong ba yang myed/ myi mthong ba yang myed pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin 'khrugs pa myed par gsungs pa'o// mo'u 'gal gyi bus
210a2(mdo): smras pa/ sdig can ji lta na na dge slong sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po nam dge slong chos thams cad la sems rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid du shes la
210a3(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid la mngon bar zhen pa yang myed cing / sems bzod pa nas rnam par grol ba'i sems la 'ching bar yang myi byed/ grol bar yang myi byed/ sems gzugs myed pas chos thams cad gzugs
210a4(mdo): byed par shes sems gnas myed pas chos thams cad gnas myed par mthong // sems 'dzin pa myed pas chos thams cad 'dzin pa myed par shes kyang / sems kyi sems shes pa yang myed la/ sems kyi ngo bo nyid
210a5(mdo): kyi rang bzhin gyis chos thams nA kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rang ba zhin gyis/ gzhan gyi dri la myi 'jog par dbang thob par ni mos pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i yin te/ btsun pa mo 'u 'gal gyi bu chen po
210a6(mdo): dge slong de lta bu ni sems can thams cad la dbang thob pa yin no// gang pos smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar na/ dge slong yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin/ bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa gang po
210a7(mdo): rnams dge slong gas gzhan las chos thams cad shes kyang / gzhan dang gzhan ma yin pa'i sems la mngon par zhen pa yang myed// chos thams cad sgro btags par ston/ yi ge dang skad dang dbyangs dang / tshig gi lam
210a8(mdo): thams cad kyang brag cha lta bur shes chos nyan pa thams cad kyang sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar mthong / gang gi lus kyi rnam par rig byed kyang chu zla dang 'dra bar mthong / nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang yongs su rtog pa las byung bar
210a9(mdo): shes chos 'ga' zhig gzung ba'i phyir ram/ gtang ba'i phyir ram/ shin tu bzla ba'i phyir ram/ thob par bya ba'i phyir yang chos myi ston// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po rnams la yang dbang thob cing
210b1(mdo): legs so zhes bya ba la re ba byed la zang zing myed par chos ston cing / rang gi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes te/ sems
210b2(mdo): rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par shes nas/ phung po'i bdud las dben par mthong ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i bdud la bcom par 'du shes pa dang / 'chi ba dag gis bdud la ma skyes pa dang / mya skye bar gnas
210b3(mdo): pa dang / lha'i bu'i bdud la g.yo ba dang / rlom sems thams cad dang bral bar gyur da pa yin te/ dge slong de lta bu ni yongs su dag par chos ston pa yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa/ sdig can ji ltar dge
210b4(mdo): slong 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin/ bdud kyis spras pa// btsun ba nye bar 'khor dge slong gis na chos thams cad shinang tu dul bar shes te/ nyes pa rnams kyis thog ma'i sngon gyi mtha' yang dben par mtha' shes
210b5(mdo): la nyes 'byung ba rnams kyi 'gyod pa yang sel cing / dam por myi byed de/ de dag la gang gis mtshams myed pa rnams kyang / rnam par gnon na/ cho ga dang / tshul khrims la log par zhugs
210b6(mdo): pa phran tshegs lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de lta bu'i chos kyi tshul gyis rnam pa yang nye bar sgrub// nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la yang mkhas blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams la yang / kun nas nyon mongs par
210b7(mdo): 'gyur ba ma yin pa dang / 'byung bar shes nyon mongs pa nang du yang myi ston/ phyi rol du yang ma yin/ gnyi ga myed par ma yin te/ nyon mongs pa zhong du chud pa nyid nyon mongs pa myed par shes shing /
210b8(mdo): nyon mongs pa yang myi sel// nyon mongs pa myed par yang myi sgrub// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang sprin dang / char sprin 'dra bar shes te/ ye shes dang lhag mthong gis gtor nas/ phyogs dang yul du
210b9(mdo): 'gro ba yang myed/ gnas pa yang myed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chu zla dang 'dra ste/ yongs su rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis nye bar ston pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni mun pa'i spyod yul te/
211a1(mdo): shes rab kyi spyod pas myi sdang bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa rnams ni chom rkun dang mkha' 'gro ma dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'dra ste/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pas/ brtags na
211a2(mdo): gnas pa ma yin pa dang / nyon mongs pa rjes ni glags tshol ba ste/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas 'phel ba dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i shes pas yid la 'jug par myi byed pas/ sus
211a3(mdo): nyon mongs pa rnams 'di 'dra bar shes te/ sems can nyon mongs pas/ kun nas nyon mongs par gyur pa rnams la snying rje zhing bdag myed pa dang / sems can myed pa mngon sum du gyur pa na/ 'dul ba 'dzin pa yang
211a4(mdo): dag pa zhes bya'o// de ltar nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gyi 'dod pa bdud sdig can de la kun dris nas/ bdud sdig can gyi sa kyang de dag thams cad kyi don gtan la phab pa bstan pas sems rangs
211a5(mdo): par gyur da to// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs 'khor de nyid du/ 'dus par gyurd te 'dug pa des bdud sdig can de la 'di skad/ ces smras so// sdig can 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas nI/
211a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las bshad zin kyis khyod kyang spobs par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyis sa gang / de skad ces smras pa dang / bdud sdig can gyis lha'i bu
211a7(mdo): mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu nyi shu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul so// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnal 'byor de spyod pa rnam par grol ba 'dod cing 'khor bas
211a8(mdo): skrag pa rnams la sten pa dang / sten pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa ni bdud kyi las so// stong pa nyid la so sor rtog cing sems can dmyal bar 'dor ba yang bdud kyi las so// 'dus ma byas la so sor rtog cing / 'dus
211a9(mdo): byas kyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su skyo ba yang bdud kyi las so// bsam gtan skyed cing bsam gtan rnam par ldog pa tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so// chos ston cing chos nyan pa rnams la snying rje chen po mya skyed pa yang bdud kyi/
211b1(mdo): las so// yon tan dang ldan pa dang / sbyin gnas tshol zhing tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khro ba yang bdud kyi las so// nyan thos kyi rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam ston cing / theg pa chen po'i gtam 'tshal ba yang bdud kyi las
211b2(mdo): so// zab mo gtam 'chab cing gtam sna tshogs ston pa yang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i' lam shes kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su myi tshol ba yang bdud kyi las so// rab tu brtson pa'i sngags pa
211b3(mdo): brjod kyang sems can myi brtson pa rnams mngon par myi sbyor ba yang bdud kyi las so// dge ba'i rtsa ba thogs kyang byang chub kyi sems mngon du myi byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// lhag mthong kyi rnal 'byor da dang ldan pa gnas kyang /
211b4(mdo): sems can rnams lhag mthong yang dag par 'dzin du myi 'jug pa yang ba dud kyi las so// nyon mongs pa ma lus par zad pa tshol zhing 'khor ba'i rgyun kyi nyon mongs pa rnams la smod pa yang bdud kyi las so// shes rab
211b5(mdo): kyis rnam par dpyod cing / snying rje chen po la dmyigs pa myi 'dzin pa/ yang bdud kyi las so// thabs dang myi ldan par dge ba spyod pa thams cad kyang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod myi chos gyi
211b6(mdo): 'jig rten rgyang phan pa'i gsang tshig 'dzin pa'ang bdud kyi las so// ma nga du thos kyang gzhan gyis shes kyis dogs te/ chos la slob dpon da pe mkhyud byed pa yang bdud kyi las so// 'jig rten pa'i dgos pa'i
211b7(mdo): zhal ta byed cing / mang du thos pa myi tshol ba 'ang bdud kyi las so// byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa skal pa mnyam pa rnams la myi sten/ myi snyen da/ bsnyen bkur myi byed/ nyan thos
211b8(mdo): dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/ skal pa myi mnyam pa la dga' ba 'ang bdud kyi las so// gang gi tshe brgya byin nam/ tshangs pa 'am/ 'jig rten skyong ba 'am/ rgyal po 'am/ chod
211b9(mdo): dpon nam/ khyim bdag gyi longs spyod dang / nor dang / rin po che dang / dbang phyug ga che bo nyid du gyur da pa de'i tshe/ chos kyi che ba nyid dang / ldan pa rnams la myi sten/ myi snyen pa bsnyen bkur myi byed pa 'di dag ni/
212a1(mdo): lA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las yang dag phul nyi shu'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdud sdig can la/ sdig can khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi las 'di dag
212a2(mdo): legs par bshad pa ni legs so// legs so// legs so zhes bya ba byin no// byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bdud kyi las 'di rnams thos shing / thon nas kyang rnam par spong ba de dag/ byang chub sems dpa'
212a3(mdo): byed pa'i chos nyi shu thob par 'gyur ro// nyi shu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / 'khor ba yongs su myi skyo ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / sangs
212a4(mdo): rgyas 'byung ba mnyes par byed pa dang / pha rol tu phyi nad pa rnams nyan pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang skal ba mnyam pa dang / gzungs rab tu thob pa dang / spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /
212a5(mdo): mngon par shes pa shes pa dang / chos thos pa nyan pa dang / tshe// rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems mngon tu 'gyur ba dang / rtag/ tu rgyun myi 'chad par rab tu 'byung ba rnyed pa dang / dal ba phun sum
212a6(mdo): tshogs pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub pa dang / bas dang shes rab kyi shes pas sems can sdud cing // yongs su 'dzin pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang / g.yob
212a7(mdo): myed cing spu myed pa dang / phangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / sems can thams cas khong khro ba myed pa ste/ byang chub yongs su sbyin par byed pa'i chos nyi shu po 'dri dag thob par 'gyur ro//
212a8(mdo): de nas spu'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod la bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bya ba gnang ba ni/ sdig can khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do//
212a9(mdo): bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di la kho bos rnyed pa ci zhig legs par rnyed/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu 'di lta ste dper na myi gang 'byung po babs pas bstan pa de ni mya de'i 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/ de ni 'byung po de'i 'gyur
212b1(mdo): bar blta'o// lha'i bu de bzhin du kho bo yang 'jam dpal gyis byin gyis rlabs nas ston gyi/ 'di kho bo'i skyes bu'i chal du ni/ myi lta'o// swa'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan dang ldan
212b2(mdo): zhing sangs rgyas kyi seng ge'i khre la 'dug ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa dang ldan zhing chos ston pas dka' bar ma gyur tam/ bdud kyis smras pa/ khyod kyis ni the bo brgyan par mthong ba lta na/ kho bos ni bcing ba dam/
212b3(mdo): pos bdag bcings par shes so// lha'i bus spras pa/ sdig can 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la bzod pa gsol cig dang / de nas gtong bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bdud kyis lpan
212b4(mdo): bu mtshams bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la bzod pa gsol myi dgos so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la 'khrug pa myed do//
212b5(mdo): khro ba myed pa'i phyir ro// gang dag 'khrug cing khro ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol dgos so// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can byang chub se/ mas dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ji 'dra/ bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i
212b6(mdo): bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa ni/ rnam pa bcu gnyisas te/ gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bcos ma ma yin pas pas ma pa'i bzod pa dang / zhong khro ba myed pa'i sems kyis/ lhag
212b7(mdo): pa'i bsam pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad la myi slu bas g.yo myed pa'i bzod pa dang / dbul zhing phongs pa yongs su skyob pas snying bache bas snying rje ba'i bzod pa dang / ldog pa myed pas ji skad smras pa
212b8(mdo): de bzhin du byed pa'i bzod pa dang / lta bar song ba dang bral bas stong pa nyid kyi 'azod pa dang / chos nyid la rten pa'i nges par sems pa'i bzod pa dang / bdag myed pas zab mo'i bzod pa dang / 'phags pa skye'o
212b9(mdo): rjes su 'jug pas mthun pa'i bzod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'thun pas yang dag pa'i bzod pa dang / sems can thams cad rjes su srung bas ngo byed pa yang myed la/ myi mthun par 'am
213a1(mdo): myed pa'i bzod pa dang / myi skye ba'i chos sa bzod pa rab tu thob pa'i phyir skye ba myed cing 'byung ba myed pa'i bzod pa ste/ lnga'i bu 'di dag mi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa dam pa bcu gnyis so//
213a2(mdo): lha'i bus spras pa/ sdig can khyod gal te/ dkrol na dga' 'gyur ram// bdud kyis spras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo dga' ste/ mchog tu dga'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa
213a3(mdo): la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bdud sdig can thong shika dang / rang gi gnas su 'gro'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod su
213a4(mdo): zhig gis bcingasagang las dgrol// bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag ni sus bcings myi shes so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can khyod ji ltar bcings pa myed la/ bcings par
213a5(mdo): 'du shes pa de bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang / myi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes// sdug bsngal la bde 'du shes dang / bdag myed pa la bdag tu 'du shes myi sdug pa la sdug par 'du
213a6(mdo): shes/ gzugs myed pa la gzugs su 'du shes tshor ba myed pa dang / 'du shes myed pa dang / 'du byed rnams myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa myed pa la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rjes
213a7(mdo): dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes so// sdig can khyod dgrol na gang nas dgrol bdud kyis smras pa/ bdag na geng las kyang myi dkrol lo// smras pa sdig can de bzhin du gang dag rnam par grol ba yang / yang dag pa ma
213a8(mdo): yin pa'i 'du shes yongs su ma gtogs par gapa las kyang rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba myed de/ de dag yongs su shes pas/ rnam par grol ba zhes bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/ byin gyi brlabs de bsrung
213a9(mdo): pa dang sdig can de yang rang gi gzugs dang ldan par bdag gis shes so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi badzad pa byas pa legs so legs so/
213b1(mdo): bdud kyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung chen po 'di ni kho bo'i yul ma yin gyi/ 'di ni 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa'i yul du blta'o// de nas lha'i bu mtshams bzangs kyis 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smraso//
213b2(mdo): 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gang du btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams su btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na// gal te
213b3(mdo): sems can rnams na bar ma gyur na/ sman pas kyang bya bar myi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams nyon mongs pas gzir bar ma gyur na/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang mdzad par myi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ja/
213b4(mdo): dpal gang byung na sangs rgyas 'byung / 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lnga'i bu skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba byung na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de dag spang ba'i don tu sangs rgyas bcom
213b5(mdo): ldan 'das rnams la 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyed nas/ chos bskye da pa de gang / chos bkag pa gang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
213b6(mdo): lha'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub brnyes nas/ chos gang nga bskyed par yang byed/ bkag pa yang myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha bu chos thams cad ni skye ba ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// /
213b7(mdo): lha'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni rang bzhin gyis ngo bo nyid kyis skye ba myed pa'i tshig bla dgas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa sum tshogs pa
213b8(mdo): yan/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ gang dmyigs pa'i lta bas chos gang la yang kun tu myi spyod pa'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ ji ltar na skrag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
213b9(mdo): gang dang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chags pa myed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa phun sum tshogs pa yan/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang 'dor
214a1(mdo): la sems can thams cad yongs su myi gtong ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ ji ltar ston pas bstan pa bzhin du
214a2(mdo): smra ba cing sems can thams cad kyang / tshul khrims la 'god la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyang myi 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam
214a3(mdo): dpal gyis smras pa/ gang chos thams cad shin tu zad pa'i mtshan nyid du shes na/ sems can thams cad kyi gnod sems dang / khro ba dang za ba spangs pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyend pa nyid kyi cho ga myi 'dor ba'o// lha'i bus
214a4(mdo): smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' chos gang gi phyir brtson 'grus rtsom pa'i chos de ni 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag
214a5(mdo): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ste/ de nyid shin tu yang dag par rjes su myi/ mthong la/ sems can thams cad kyi le lo spang ba'i phyir/ btso/ na 'grus gces pa yang myi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa
214a6(mdo): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan phun sum tshogs pa yin 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis snyoms par zhugs par shes kyang / sems can tham cad kyi nyon mong
214a7(mdo): pa 'dul ba'i phyir yang bsam gtan byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rgyu ba myed pa thob par 'gyur te/ spros pa
214a8(mdo): thams cad dang bral zhing sems can thams cad kyi lta ba spangs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyis rnam par dpyod pa na ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab phun sum tshogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar byang
214a9(mdo): chub sems dpa' byams pa la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mthong ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
214b1(mdo): snying rje la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la/ las kyi rnam par smin par myed par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba la gnas pa yI/
214b2(mdo): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la dga' ba yang mya skyed la mya dga' ba yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' btang snyoms la gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal
214b3(mdo): gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams cad la gnyis dang bral bar 'gyur ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' la byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos
214b4(mdo): thams cad sgyu ma lta bur byung bar shes pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa'as chos thams cad padag myed
214b5(mdo): par mthong ba na'o// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi mchog yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam chos thams ca/ da gzung ba myed pa dang / gzhi myed par shes pa na'o// lha'i bus
214b6(mdo): smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos pa yi na 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par shes na myi sdang mya smag skrag pa
214b7(mdo): myi 'gyur zhing go cha chen po myi 'dor ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems nges pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad ring du srid pa yang ma yin/ sred
214b8(mdo): pa'i bag la nyal gyis nye bsnyen pa yang ma yin pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'grogs na bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam bdag dang gzhan myi dmyigs pas
214b9(mdo): lus dang ngag dang yid kyis gzhan la gnod pa mya byed pa na'o// spo'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bka' blo bde ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams sgrub cing
215a1(mdo): tshig ji smras pa bzhin byed pa'i na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'thun par 'dzind pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi sems dang 'thun pa'i phyir sems na
215a2(mdo): thams cad kyis spo ba las myi 'gyur zhing / sems can thams cad dang 'thun pa gnas pa'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
215a3(mdo): dpa sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i phyir/ nad yang nye bar zhal pha rol tu rgyu ba la yang rgyu ba na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dad pa dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
215a4(mdo): smras pa/ nam chags pa thams cad la yang spyod la/ nam cha klas pa thams cad la zhen pa myed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdza' ba brtan pa yin/ 'jam dpag
215a5(mdo): gyis spras pa nam sangs rgyas kyi rigs mya gcod pa na'o// lha'i bus spras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pag/ zo ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ nam ji ltar byas
215a6(mdo): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba chud myi gzon pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa shes pa yin/ 'jam de pal gyis smras pa/ nam theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mya byed pa na'o//
215a7(mdo): lha'i bus smras pa// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod pa nyung ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ nam rang gi nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mya 'dod la sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rnams spangs
